Our Story

It wasn't until mid-college where I realized how much waste is consumed in the development of clothing, how resources that are currently available were not taken advantage of, and how different fabrications can negatively impact the environment and our human health.

column2: >Stacy Longo Sustainable Apparel, is a line dedicated to c
column3: >reate fashion that does not negatively impact the environment and human health. Please support to save the earth! I'm excited
column4: > to get the chance from this point forward, to develop zero-waste pattern making, working with new eco fabrics and local factories.  I hope each one of you who read this, can support and contribute - even the smallest donation would be much appreciated!

column1: The Impact

column2: >The line isn't about helping my dreams come true. It's endless possibilities as to what cutting back the waste can do for our earth. I really believe the domino effect, once you enlighten one person, they will enlighten another.

column1: Local production: Think of all the gas and energy that is used to transport your products! If your producing abroad, how often can you really go overseas? How do you know if your workers are being treated properly? This allows us to visit our local factory as often as needed, cut out the middle-man and be responsible for not only supporting local business but also the possibility of creating more work for our country.

Zero Waste Patternmaking: This is a concept used where in the patternmaking process the main goal is to completely eliminate ANY waste. All fabric that is laid out and ready to be cut, will be consumed by your patterns. (The above image I created, represents that!)

column1: ","Our Story

It wasn't until mid-college where I realized how much waste is consumed in the development of clothing, how resources that are currently available were not taken advantage of, and how different fabrications can negatively impact the environment and our human health.

Stacy Longo Sustainable Apparel, is a line dedicated to create fashion that does not negatively impact the environment and human health. Please support to save the earth! I'm excited to get the chance from this point forward, to develop zero-waste pattern making, working with new eco fabrics and local factories.  I hope each one of you who read this, can support and contribute - even the smallest donation would be much appreciated!
The Impact

The line isn't about helping my dreams come true. It's endless possibilities as to what cutting back the waste can do for our earth. I really believe the domino effect, once you enlighten one person, they will enlighten another.
Just a few quick points!:

Local production: Think of all the gas and energy that is used to transport your products! If your producing abroad, how often can you really go overseas? How do you know if your workers are being treated properly? This allows us to visit our local factory as often as needed, cut out the middle-man and be responsible for not only supporting local business but also the possibility of creating more work for our country.

Zero Waste Patternmaking: This is a concept used where in the patternmaking process the main goal is to completely eliminate ANY waste. All fabric that is laid out and ready to be cut, will be consumed by your patterns. (The above image I created, represents that!)
What We Need & What You Get

It's important that everything gets done correctly - if the funds raised does not meet the goal amount then certain of the below points will be on the back burner for now. Please help me get all the below accomplished!
Sustainable fabrics such as soy, tencel, hemp, bamboo & more.
Examining Zero-Waste pattern making
Local production
Fabric Sourcing & Research
Add-ons to Website Development to make it User-Friendly for you!
Proper Trademarking
Create a resourceful fabric/trim library
Photographing the Line - hopefully work with emerging Photographers!
Participating in Local Fairs
Future development of other sustainable products

Pick out something nice for you, a friend, a family member or all 3 to the right of this campaign page!  I have worked for months and months to network with amazing emerging artists who were so generous to donate their products! Each artist has great items that they want to present to YOU, and that is what this is about - Supporting Emerging Artists!
Other Ways You Can Help

Please help spread the world with the help of social media - Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr & more! You don't need Facebook or Twitter to donate, so please also spread the word by email and word of mouth as well!
Type in ""Stacy Longo Sustainable Apparel"" in your Facebook search and follow us on Twitter @stacylongo.
Our Generous ""Perk"" Donators - Big ""Thank you""!

We've integrated some of the  best wireless technology in our most loved silhouette. Combining high-end sound quality with luxury materials &
column2: design. The listening experience is personal. Our new studio mixer app allows you to tune and create the perfect sound setting for every moment. Wired or Wireless, listen to superior audio without compromise.

column1:
40 mm Dual Wireless Drivers- tuned for superior wireless sound qualityNo compromise in sound quality Bluetooth 4.2 · AAC codec
That is a lot.
Capacity: 18 hours for all day play!For when you're on the moveOn device controls - volume, song, phone control, connectFor when you need crystal clear calls.
Adjust the bass, fine-tune your sound, create your own preferences for the perfect listening experience. Choose from different presets for optimal sound during every moment of the day.

We’ve moved the headband adjustment internally to eliminate hairs getting caught.All leathers and fabrics are stain resistant. 
We’ve angled the ear cups 5 degrees to allow earrings to be worn and to alleviate pressure during long periods of use. We use hand crafted metals and jewlery making techniques to seemlessly integrate the electronics, while limiting the use of plastics. 
The ear cushions are filled with memory foam. Which take shape to your ears for a noise isolating fit. 
We have used new stronger tooling, every nut and bolt is tuned and engineered to withstand heavy use and impact.
​
​
Why FRENDS?
Frends is the first and most bespoke women's headphone brand in the world. Combining the best quality engineered sound in the most beautifully designed interchangeable headphones.
What is the Battery life of the headphone?
The Studio Wireless battery life is approx. 12 hours
Tell me more about the studio app?
Our new studio app allows you to adjust the sound of the headphones using our unique studio mixer.
What is the Charging time for the headphone?
The new Taylor Studio Wireless are fully charged in 3 hours
What is the Warranty for the headphone?
FRENDS issues a 1 year warranty policy covering any manufacturing issue.
Is the Studio Wireless compatible with Apple Products?
Yes, FRENDS is Apple certified.
Is the Studio Wireless compatible with Android products??
Yes, however the features of the 3-button microphone are limited to the middle button to answer/end calls and start/stop songs.
Can I still use my existing cap collection previous cap sets?
Absolutely. The Studio Wireless features the interchangeable FRENDS with Benefits cap system.
What is studio sound?
Studio Sound is our best sounding wireless headphones yet. All new 40 mm drivers whave been tailored for superior wireless Audio.
What is AAC?

AAC (Advanced Audio Coding) is the successor to the MP3 format. AAC delivers far better sound quality than MP3 and is the preferred output on your favourite platforms (Youtube, Iphone, Ipad, ITunes and more)
How do you pair?
Press and hold the bluetooth button for approx. 10 seconds, you will hear ‘power on’.
Continue holding the bluetooth button, you will hear ‘pairing’.
Open the bluetooth settings menu on your device, select ’FRENDS’
Once pairing is complete, you will hear ‘CONNECTED’.
How do I change the caps?

Place your palm over the cap and twist counter-clockwise. The cap will unlock. Do this for both caps. Match the new cap with the words “Top” and “Right “ or “Left” (shown underneath the cap) with the same side headphone, place on top of the headphone and twist clockwise to lock it in. Do the same for the other side.
What material is the pouch?
The pouch is made from Protein Leather which is luxury Vegan option!
What materials are the headphone made up of?
We use the highest quality hand-Crafted Metal, Lambs Leather Headband, Protein Leather Ear Cushions and a Fabric Chord
Are the headphones suitable to use during exercise?
Yes. Our headphones are made for comfort and also for all head shapes. We've made them fully adjustable to suit your needs.
Can I connect my headphones to my MacBook?
Yes, you can connect your headphones to any Bluetooth pairing device.
Can I use the headphone to make calls?
Yes, the Studio Wireless features 2 built in microphone to allow calls.

I’M BRINGING SASSY BACK!
Who says only moms and big toy companies can create successful, meaningful kid products?
Sass Factory is an “auntie” created clothing line &
column2: web experience for young girls, inspired by the age-old paper doll pastime. I like to call it a “play on fashion”. Get it?? :-)

column1: Sass Factory Me-Ts allow kids to develop their own fashion sense, by providing t-shirts that are customizable and totally unique.  Using Velcro appliqués, kids get to make creative choices and express their own sense of style, all while wearing wholesome, age-appropriate clothing (which moms love!).
…BACK HOME, THAT IS!

Behind the fun, sassy exterior, there’s a more earnest purpose. Sass Factory wants to improve lives by supporting ecosystems that create gainful employment in our communities. That’s why we’ve taken three important, exciting steps:

1) We’re bringing manufacturing home to the US! Previously made in Asia, now, Sass Factory Me-Ts are being made in America.  We’re excited to help support the creation of jobs in America, especially given the struggles Individuals and families in the US have experienced during the tough economy. In fact, if we spent just 1% more on American made products, 200,000 new jobs would be created!

2) We’re purposefully working with a manufacturing partner that creates jobs for single moms. Nearly 40% of single moms in the US are below the poverty line, an appalling statistic.  Our manufacturing partner, American MoJo, provides higher wages, funded child care, healthcare, retirement plans, education, and career training to single moms.

3) We’re also fortunate to have found a packaging partner that creates jobs for people with disabilities.  1 in 5 Americans have a disability—yet they are 4 times more likely to be unemployed than the general population.  Our packaging partner, PRIDE Industries, provides support, training and opportunities to help people with disabilities overcome obstacles and benefit from meaningful employment.
HOW YOU CAN HELP
Your contribution will fund the following activities:
1. US manufacturing and packaging of our fall/winter Me-T line, which includes extending our line to size 3/4 and to long-sleeve Me-Ts to meet customer demand.

2. Expanding distribution into retail so that we can reach our customers in person. 

Ultimately, supporting this project will help Sass Factory grow and continue to support our partners in creating gainful employment in communities in the US.
WHAT’S IN IT FOR YOU?
Besides the knowledge that you’re helping a small business support job creation and use sustainable business practices, we have a series of rewards for you!
Contribute and get:

• $10 - Sassy Keychain + Thank-You Video! 
• $25 - 2 Sass Factory Appliqué sets + Sassy Keychain + Thank-You Video 
• $50 -1 Sass Factory Me-T of your choice + 1 Sass Factory Appliqué Set of your choice + Sassy Keychain + Thank-You Video 
• $100 - 1 Sass Factory Me-T of your choice + 5 Sass Factory Appliqué Sets of your choice + Sassy Keychain + Thank-You Video 
• $300 - 1 Sass Factory Me-T of your choice + 20 Sass Factory Appliqué Sets of your choice + Sassy Keychain + Thank-You Video 
• $600 - 2 Sass Factory Me-Ts of your choice + 40 Sass Factory Appliqué Sets of your choice + Sassy Keychain + Thank-You Videos 
• $1,000 - Design and Name a brand new Dress-Up Outfit Appliqué set + 2 Sass Factory Me-Ts of your choice + 40 Sass Factory Appliqué Sets of your choice + Sassy Keychain + Thank-You Video 
• $2,000 - Design and Name a brand new Dog Appliqué set + 2 Sass Factory Me-Ts of your choice + 40 Sass Factory Appliqué Sets of your choice + Sassy Keychain + Thank-You Video 
• $2,500 - Design and Name a brand new Pet Appliqué set + 2 Sass Factory Me-Ts of your choice + 40 Sass Factory Appliqué Sets of your choice + Sassy Keychain + Thank-You Video 
• $5,000 - Design and Name a brand new Sass Factory Me-T Character + 2 Sass Factory Me-Ts of your choice + 40 Sass Factory Appliqué Sets of your choice + Sassy Keychain + Thank-You Video
THE SASSY KEYCHAIN
This is not a final photo, but the keychain will look something like this. It may be in a different color, have a different sassy slogan on it and have our logo on it.
Sassy Keychain
The ME-T

Each Sass Factory Me-T comes with a Dog Appliqué and a Dress-Up Outfit Appliqué set included. 

To select your Me-T:
1) First choose the Sass Factory Character you want on your Me-T:
Sass Factory Characters
2) Second, select the size you want, noting Sass Factory Me-T shirts are intentionally fitted, not baggy fit:
Sizing Chart for Sass Factory Me-Ts
3) Then select the color and sleeve length you want:
Sample Short Sleeve Sass Factory Me-Ts
Sample Long Sleeve Sass Factory Me-T Sketches
THE APPLIQUÉS
Below are the 20 Sass Factory Dog and Dress-Up Outfit Appliqué Sets you can choose from:
Sass Factory Appliqués
HOW IT ALL BEGAN

The most frequent question I get is about how I came up with the Sass Factory concept. It’s really quite simple:  I was trying to put a smile on my niece’s face on a rainy day. Long story short, I made her a t-shirt which featured characters she could “dress up,” and she was absolutely thrilled, When her friends saw her wearing her unique t-shirt, I soon developed a small demand for these t-shirts.  And things just grew from there. But, most importantly, the t-shirt itself ended up putting a smile on my fashio”niece”ta’s face.
MY DREAM

On a more personal note, let me start by telling you that a lot of blood, sweat and tears have gone into creating Sass Factory. I’ve had great days and I’ve had lousy days as a result of this sassy creation that I love so much. But what makes it worth it is not only the passion I have for the products and witnessing the delight when customers discover and/or receive them, but also the vision I have and hold onto for the future of Sass Factory.

As you’ve probably gathered by now, I’m passionate about creating opportunities for gainful employment, regardless of an individual’s circumstances. My dream for Sass Factory is to one day make it the happiest place in the world to work. I would love to see Sass Factory grow into a place with flexible work opportunities that fit the lifestyles of its employees, a fun and creative work environment with a multitude of options.

I want the company to be results-driven, while allowing each employee to decide the right level of autonomy or direction for them. I want a workplace full of encouragement and support, where performance success is measured by your passion and accomplishments, not by how many hours you clock.
However, as a realist, I know achieving this dream requires time, effort, persistence and money. I hope you see it as a dream worth backing and one day, perhaps even living.
SPREAD THE WORD
Here’s how you can help spread the word about our Indiegogo campaign:
1) Share our link with your Facebook friends: You can do this by directly posting the following link and image or sharing our Indiegogo posts directly from the Sass Factory Facebook fan page:

Sass Factory paper doll inspired shirts for girls are not only fun, but also socially conscious! Help back their Indiegogo project for discounted pricing and advance purchasing for their Fall/Winter line! http://bit.ly/PZ6w4X
Use this image on your Facebook post!
2) Tweet about us: Make up your own tweet or use one of ours!
• Sample Tweet 1: I just backed @SassFactoryFans on @Indiegogo http://bit.ly/PZ6w4X
• Sample Tweet 2: @SassFactoryFans Back that Sass Up! I know I did on @Indiegogo http://bit.ly/PZ6w4X

3) Tell your friends: Pick a few of your closest friends and family members who would support this cause and send them a personal email about our product and the missions we support, and requesting their support. Ask them to tell a few of *their* friends to do the same thing. In my experience, good people know good people and word of mouth is extremely powerful!
4) Post one of these sassy badges on your blog or web site and link them back to this page http://bit.ly/PZ6w4X
Sass Factory on Indiegogo Badge 1
Sass Factory on Indiegogo Badge 2
GRATITUDE WITH ATTITUDE
Just kidding – I wouldn’t dream of dishing out sassy attitude when expressing how much I appreciate your support.
Being a wannabe “aunt”repreneur is challenging and it’s only been possible through the kindness, generosity and help of people like you, who have helped me along the way.
THANK YOU for checking out my Indiegogo campaign and for your generosity as a backer. I’m bursting with gratitude for your support!
***INTERNATIONAL BACKERS***

Please add a tad bit extra to your pledge to cover international shipping costs. I hope to one day get to a place where Sass Factory can ship for free, and when I do, you will be added to a free shipping list for eternity!

For pledges between: 
• $10 - $49: Please add $2.00 
• $50 - $299: Please add $10.00 
• $300 - $599: Please add $25.00 
• $600 and above: Please add $50.00
<h2><strong>THANK-YOU &amp

P.S. If you haven’t already, I’d love if you would “Like” Sass Factory on Facebook and follow Sass Factory on Twitter (@SassFactoryFans) so I can keep you up-to-date on progress and share some of sassy stories. We'll be giving away one of our Sassy Me-Ts at the end of our Indiegogo campaign to the Sass Factory Facebook followers, so make sure you Like the Sass Factory page!

• $10 - Sassy Keychain + Thank-You Video!  • $25 - 2 Sass Factory Appliqué sets + Sassy Keychain + Thank-You Video  • $50 -1 Sass Factory Me-T of your choice + 1 Sass Factory Appliqué Set of your choice + Sassy Keychain + Thank-You Video  • $100 - 1 Sass Factory Me-T of your choice + 5 Sass Factory Appliqué Sets of your choice + Sassy Keychain + Thank-You Video  • $300 - 1 Sass Factory Me-T of your choice + 20 Sass Factory Appliqué Sets of your choice + Sassy Keychain + Thank-You Video  • $600 - 2 Sass Factory Me-Ts of your choice + 40 Sass Factory Appliqué Sets of your choice + Sassy Keychain + Thank-You Videos  • $1,000 - Design and Name a brand new Dress-Up Outfit Appliqué set + 2 Sass Factory Me-Ts of your choice + 40 Sass Factory Appliqué Sets of your choice + Sassy Keychain + Thank-You Video  • $2,000 - Design and Name a brand new Dog Appliqué set + 2 Sass Factory Me-Ts of your choice + 40 Sass Factory Appliqué Sets of your choice + Sassy Keychain + Thank-You Video  • $2,500 - Design and Name a brand new Pet Appliqué set + 2 Sass Factory Me-Ts of your choice + 40 Sass Factory Appliqué Sets of your choice + Sassy Keychain + Thank-You Video  • $5,000 - Design and Name a brand new Sass Factory Me-T Character + 2 Sass Factory Me-Ts of your choice + 40 Sass Factory Appliqué Sets of your choice + Sassy Keychain + Thank-You Video
THE SASSY KEYCHAIN
This is not a final photo, but the keychain will look something like this. It may be in a different color, have a different sassy slogan on it and have our logo on it.
Sassy Keychain
The ME-T
Each Sass Factory Me-T comes with a Dog Appliqué and a Dress-Up Outfit Appliqué set included.   To select your Me-T:
1) First choose the Sass Factory Character you want on your Me-T:
Sass Factory Characters
2) Second, select the size you want, noting Sass Factory Me-T shirts are intentionally fitted, not baggy fit:
Sizing Chart for Sass Factory Me-Ts
3) Then select the color and sleeve length you want:
Sample Short Sleeve Sass Factory Me-Ts
Sample Long Sleeve Sass Factory Me-T Sketches
THE APPLIQUÉS
Below are the 20 Sass Factory Dog and Dress-Up Outfit Appliqué Sets you can choose from:
Sass Factory Appliqués
HOW IT ALL BEGAN

The most frequent question I get is about how I came up with the Sass Factory concept. It’s really quite simple:  I was trying to put a smile on my niece’s face on a rainy day. Long story short, I made her a t-shirt which featured characters she could “dress up,” and she was absolutely thrilled, When her friends saw her wearing her unique t-shirt, I soon developed a small demand for these t-shirts.  And things just grew from there. But, most importantly, the t-shirt itself ended up putting a smile on my fashio”niece”ta’s face.
MY DREAM

On a more personal note, let me start by telling you that a lot of blood, sweat and tears have gone into creating Sass Factory. I’ve had great days and I’ve had lousy days as a result of this sassy creation that I love so much. But what makes it worth it is not only the passion I have for the products and witnessing the delight when customers discover and/or receive them, but also the vision I have and hold onto for the future of Sass Factory.

As you’ve probably gathered by now, I’m passionate about creating opportunities for gainful employment, regardless of an individual’s circumstances. My dream for Sass Factory is to one day make it the happiest place in the world to work. I would love to see Sass Factory grow into a place with flexible work opportunities that fit the lifestyles of its employees, a fun and creative work environment with a multitude of options.

I want the company to be results-driven, while allowing each employee to decide the right level of autonomy or direction for them. I want a workplace full of encouragement and support, where performance success is measured by your passion and accomplishments, not by how many hours you clock.
However, as a realist, I know achieving this dream requires time, effort, persistence and money. I hope you see it as a dream worth backing and one day, perhaps even living.
SPREAD THE WORD
Here’s how you can help spread the word about our Indiegogo campaign:
1) Share our link with your Facebook friends: You can do this by directly posting the following link and image or sharing our Indiegogo posts directly from the Sass Factory Facebook fan page:

Sass Factory paper doll inspired shirts for girls are not only fun, but also socially conscious! Help back their Indiegogo project for discounted pricing and advance purchasing for their Fall/Winter line! http://bit.ly/PZ6w4X
Use this image on your Facebook post!
2) Tweet about us: Make up your own tweet or use one of ours!
• Sample Tweet 1: I just backed @SassFactoryFans on @Indiegogo http://bit.ly/PZ6w4X
• Sample Tweet 2: @SassFactoryFans Back that Sass Up! I know I did on @Indiegogo http://bit.ly/PZ6w4X

3) Tell your friends: Pick a few of your closest friends and family members who would support this cause and send them a personal email about our product and the missions we support, and requesting their support. Ask them to tell a few of *their* friends to do the same thing. In my experience, good people know good people and word of mouth is extremely powerful!
4) Post one of these sassy badges on your blog or web site and link them back to this page http://bit.ly/PZ6w4X
Sass Factory on Indiegogo Badge 1
Sass Factory on Indiegogo Badge 2
GRATITUDE WITH ATTITUDE
Just kidding – I wouldn’t dream of dishing out sassy attitude when expressing how much I appreciate your support.
Being a wannabe “aunt”repreneur is challenging and it’s only been possible through the kindness, generosity and help of people like you, who have helped me along the way.
THANK YOU for checking out my Indiegogo campaign and for your generosity as a backer. I’m bursting with gratitude for your support!
***INTERNATIONAL BACKERS***

Please add a tad bit extra to your pledge to cover international shipping costs. I hope to one day get to a place where Sass Factory can ship for free, and when I do, you will be added to a free shipping list for eternity!
For pledges between:  • $10 - $49: Please add $2.00  • $50 - $299: Please add $10.00  • $300 - $599: Please add $25.00  • $600 and above: Please add $50.00
THANK-YOU & STAY SASSY!!

P.S. If you haven’t already, I’d love if you would “Like” Sass Factory on Facebook and follow Sass Factory on Twitter (@SassFactoryFans) so I can keep you up-to-date on progress and share some of sassy stories. We'll be giving away one of our Sassy Me-Ts at the end of our Indiegogo campaign to the Sass Factory Facebook followers, so make sure you Like the Sass Factory page!",10.0,0,"1 Campaign

your friends will all get the design you hoped for. I want everyone to know that getting the T-shirts printed is my no. 1 priority, all else comes after. So whether I reach my goal or not there is still a way for some/all to get the design of their choice.
For any questions regarding the above please feel free to contact me at: melbielgma@gmail.com

column1: Mel Biel/ FWB Apparel (Fighters with Belief):

Hello and welcome all to my campaign. My name is Mel and I'm hoping to one day launch my very own T-shirt line called FWB Apparel. The best way for me to sum up FWB Apparel is by saying that it's art/illustration with a voice, your voice. Through this ""voice"" you get the chance to express what you fight for and believe in, alongside a cool ""kick-ass"" character design. These designs are inspired by Comic Book Super Heroes, Anime and Capcom's Street Fighter games.

Now when it comes to T-shirts and T-shirt printing, I definitely like screen printing just as much as anyone else but I'm also a big fan of heat pressing which is what lead to this campaign. I already own a heat press and so the next step (besides a printer) is to purchase a 24'' Vinyl cutter. With this machine I can cut a variety of designs and patterns that wouldn't otherwise be possible, so in other words it's a must have. That's where you and your donations come in.

column2: >

column1: Thoughts...

All of life's events are seldom (if at all) random. When you choose one of these Tees, whether it be because of the character design or the expression, I believe that there is a more personal reason behind it. I believe that there is a certain something within that becomes ""magnetically"" attracted to what it sees as a common, familiar, essential and relatable part of itself, a connection of some kind.

At the moment none of my characters have a back-story (their ""Bios"" are empty) which isn't a bad thing since there's plenty of people to ""fill that void"". In other words your beliefs, your experiences, your good times, bad times, your pasts, presents, and futures have now become these character's unique back-stories. Congratulations on becoming/being official back-story writers for FWB Apparel, as all that is required is to enjoy the GOD given privilege to be unfeigned and diligent writers of your fate.
Your support fuels progress...

When you contribute to this campaign you will be doing one if not all of the following:
Helping me in getting the T-shirts screen printed for you,
Helping me purchase a 24"" vinyl cutter,
Helping me get one step closer to launching FWB Apparel (online store),
Helping with other costs (present &
column2: future) related to the T-shirt line

column1: <h3><strong>Q&amp
What colors will the Tees be available in?

Gentlemen: Light Blue, Sport Grey, Pistachio, Vegas Gold, White
Ladies: Light Blue, Sport Grey, Pistachio, Light Pink, White
(Colors dependent on availability)
What are the sizing options for the Tees?

Gentlemen: S, M, L, XL (add $3 for larger sizes)
Ladies: XS, S, M, L, XL (add $3 for larger sizes)
(Tee size dependent on availability)
If your goal is reached before your campaign ends will there be a chance to ""unlock"" other designs?
Yes, after every $325 past my goal a new design will be unlocked.
How many of your designs are ""T-shirt"" ready?
As much as 40.
If your campaign is successful do you plan on campaigning again?
Yes, as this is only the first step of many. I will need to raise more funds to start my business, be in business and stay in business.
When your T-shirt line officially launches, which method of printing will you be using to print the Tees, Heat Pressing or Screen Printing?

Both, although I'm more of a fan of Heat Pressing right now. The only difference will be that all Heat Pressing will be done by me and and the Screen Printing will be done by a Screen Printing company of my choosing. In the future I plan on doing both.
How and when will I be able to choose the design, color and size I want for the T-shirts.
Towards the end of the campaign you will be sent an Order Survey where you will be able to select the design, color and size of the Tees.
How can I get in touch for any questions, concerns or feedback I might have?
Email, Twitter, Facebook. Check the links below.
Other things you can do to help:
Post, Post again and then Post some more. Please help get the word out. Post on Twitter, Facebook and the countless blogs that are out there. This is a really great way of contributing.
Whether you're just browsing, visiting or contributing, Thank You and may The Messiah and The Father bring blessings upon you and your family.

Email: melbielgma@gmail.com

<h2><b style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 0)
Butterfly Bow Tie is the first bow tie made from glass and filled with various contents. It is an exclusiviste accessory, unique in the world by its ingenious concept and content.

Our goal is to replace the classic bow tie with an original and bold one. Butterfly Bow Ties are as precious as jewels, that's why we assure that every bow tie is impeccable, so it can last for a lifetime.
Wearing a bow tie has never been more spectacular! Say YES to this contemporary jewelry! Help us to make a true art of wearing the Bow Tie.
Our products - Perks
<div>

Butterfly Bow Ties are unique worldwide thanks to their original concept, a glass bow tie filled with different types of ingenious content: coffee, beads, Swarovski crystals, mix of pepper, colorful microspheres, feathers, scarves, shiny dust, colorful liquid and many others.
These bow ties are modern jewelry, especially handcrafted for bold people who appreciate originality and have a well-defined style of dress.
<div>
Butterfly Bow Tie:
·
A
luxury accessory made from glass at an affordable price
·
High
quality materials, so so it lasts a lifetime
·
Unique
concept, extravagant appearance, a spectacular invention
· Different sizes and shapes: circular, spiral, with rounded/ pointed/ straight ends, heart
· Ingenious contents: coffee, pepper mix, Swarovski crystals, colorful liquid, beads, microspheres, shiny dust, feathers, meter, scarves, pins, pills
· Adjustable neckband
· Packed in a special box designed to protect the glass from any impact
Perks
<div>
1. Butterfly Bow Tie Coffee Beans - 57 $
2. Butterfly Bow Tie Black Feathers - 59 $
4. Butterfly Bow Tie Colours - 67$
6. Butterfly Bow Tie Double Heart - 69$
7. Butterfly Bow Tie Classic - 70 $
8. Butterfly Bow Tie Golden Leaf - 89$
9. Butterfly Bow Tie Precious - 99$
10. MiniCollection Butterfly Bow Tie (9 bow ties) - 450$
Our mission
New Website
As our accessories are handcrafted from glass, it is really difficult to capture them in photos because of the reflexion of the light.

That’s why we need a new website that would allow our clients to see the bow ties at 360 degrees, in order to get a better look at the content, to have the opportunity to zoom in or zoom out and to experience how the bow tie really looks like.
Offline shop
We would love to develop our brand and to have the opportunity
to open a store in an important shopping center. We want
to create a community for the fashion lovers and this would be much easier if
we'd have the chance to interract with our clients, not only online but also in
the offline environment.
Because the glass bow tie is
truly an invention, we would love to observe people's reaction and listen to
their opinions regarding these unique bow ties.This way we can find out what
they think about this classy accessory, and we can continue to innovate and
improve our designs.We truly believe that such an unique concept
deserves to be known worldwide, and the store would be the
first big step in creating an international brand out of Butterfly Bow Tie.
New collection
Our first collection was just the first step in our mission to
change the classic bow tie with a revolutionary one and to make the glass bow
tie an insidpensable accessory for gentlemen. To launch our next collections, we need a minimum number of ordered bow ties for every design, in order to start the production at the glass workshop.
How can you help us?
- Just order some of
our bow ties from the perks placed on the right side of this page
- Share our campaign in
social media
How can I buy?
On the right side of the campaign, you can see some of our
bow tie designs and their prices. You have to click on the perk corresponding
to the bow tie you like. You can find the pictures of each model above in the description.
Do you ship worldwide?
Yes, we ship worldwide and the shipping cost is supported by
the client. The shipping cost will be paid only when you will receive the package.

When I will receive the ordered bow ties?

We'll start to ship the bow ties immediatly after the campaign is over.
How can I contact you?
You can contact us through a comment at our project or via
e-mail, at butterflybowtiecampaign@gmail.com.
We will answer you in 24 hours. Also, you can contact us on our Facebook page.

About
The Line &amp
Greetings all of you STRAPPING beauties and gents!  (Get it,
strapping??  Shoes??  And the tone is set…).  We are Heather and Lindsay, creators of the
Pippa France shoe brand!  We're just a couple of Interior Designers who
happened to fall in love with textiles and prints and are now setting out to
initiate our dream of becoming Shoe Designers!
A bit more about our creations: Our line is American hand-made (yay!
Economy!) and the FIRST ladies lux shoe collection (that we know of!) to be
based solely off prints.  We’ve done a
lot of work over the last couple years - from trademarks to shoe making courses,
to sale samples, and more!  We are continuously
expanding our knowledge of our product, and we are anxious to get these babies
on ladies’ feet EVERYWHERE!  For now, we
start small with a planned Spring collection of eight styles we hope to launch
in 2015. Nothing great was ever achieved alone, however, and our dream is no
different!  Here is where YOU Pippettes
come in!  Thank you ALL in advance for
your continued support and enthusiasm for our line!  We seriously cannot make this happen without
that piece of the puzzle.
What We Need &
What You Get
Our shoes are made-upon-order, but we still need stock materials!  This includes a run of custom lasts for our
Megan style, extra fabrics, leather hides, and any buckles or hardware.  We are also planning to foster sales through
an ecommerce website (already have the domain!) but we aren’t so
technically-savvy!  We have our goals for
our initial collection in mind, but we know Rome was not built in a day!  We are excited to see what doors may open up
with this endeavor, and we will re-evaluate the business plan as needed to
reflect what we are fortunate to raise. The important thing is we’ve gotten out
there.  More details below!
·
Fabric = $1,100
·
Leather = $1,000
·
Accessories = $500
·
“Megan” Run of Lasts = $500
·
Website and Hosting (an estimate) = $600
·
Shoe Boxes (an estimate) = $300
·
Consulting Services for Patternmaker = $800
The Impact
We firmly believe in a world where people can wake up every morning and
do what they love, a world where the monotonous soul-less cliché of the 9 to 5
is something foreign.  Quality shoes is
our love, and we’d never be able to build on our foundation without the help of
contributors like you.  We hope to one
day be able to pay it forward so others may reach their true potential and
chase their dreams.  In the meantime, we
hope to bring a splash of personality (and maybe a few smiles along the way) to
ladies feet all over America,
one step at a time! (Pun intended!)
Other Ways You Can
Help
Hey, if we had money, we wouldn’t be asking for any! (‘2 Broke Girls’
ain’t got nothin’ on us!).  So we
completely understand not everyone is able to contribute.  Fortunately, there are other (and maybe even
more powerful) ways you can help a couple gals out!  Simply spread the word to anyone you think
would be excited to hear about our print-full little shoe line and remember,
Indiegogo has some easy-to-use share tools, too!
We cannot put into words how much this process has meant to us over the last
few years.  Yes, there were highs AND
lows, but nothing has touched us more than the immense support we have received
and the strength it has fed us to push forward.
It starts with an idea mixed with some passion and patience, but it’s
the support system that ultimately helps to get that idea off the ground.

THANK YOU ALL!

strapping??  Shoes??  And the tone is set…).  We are Heather and Lindsay, creators of the
Pippa France shoe brand!  We're just a couple of Interior Designers who
happened to fall in love with textiles and prints and are now setting out to
initiate our dream of becoming Shoe Designers!
A bit more about our creations: Our line is American hand-made (yay!
Economy!) and the FIRST ladies lux shoe collection (that we know of!) to be
based solely off prints.  We’ve done a
lot of work over the last couple years - from trademarks to shoe making courses,
to sale samples, and more!  We are continuously
expanding our knowledge of our product, and we are anxious to get these babies
on ladies’ feet EVERYWHERE!  For now, we
start small with a planned Spring collection of eight styles we hope to launch
in 2015. Nothing great was ever achieved alone, however, and our dream is no
different!  Here is where YOU Pippettes
come in!  Thank you ALL in advance for
your continued support and enthusiasm for our line!  We seriously cannot make this happen without
that piece of the puzzle.
What We Need &
What You Get
Our shoes are made-upon-order, but we still need stock materials!  This includes a run of custom lasts for our
Megan style, extra fabrics, leather hides, and any buckles or hardware.  We are also planning to foster sales through
an ecommerce website (already have the domain!) but we aren’t so
technically-savvy!  We have our goals for
our initial collection in mind, but we know Rome was not built in a day!  We are excited to see what doors may open up
with this endeavor, and we will re-evaluate the business plan as needed to
reflect what we are fortunate to raise. The important thing is we’ve gotten out
there.  More details below!
Fabric = $1,100
Leather = $1,000
Accessories = $500
“Megan” Run of Lasts = $500
Website and Hosting (an estimate) = $600
Shoe Boxes (an estimate) = $300
Consulting Services for Patternmaker = $800
The Impact
We firmly believe in a world where people can wake up every morning and
do what they love, a world where the monotonous soul-less cliché of the 9 to 5
is something foreign.  Quality shoes is
our love, and we’d never be able to build on our foundation without the help of
contributors like you.  We hope to one
day be able to pay it forward so others may reach their true potential and
chase their dreams.  In the meantime, we
hope to bring a splash of personality (and maybe a few smiles along the way) to
ladies feet all over America,
one step at a time! (Pun intended!)
Other Ways You Can
Help
Hey, if we had money, we wouldn’t be asking for any! (‘2 Broke Girls’
ain’t got nothin’ on us!).  So we
completely understand not everyone is able to contribute.  Fortunately, there are other (and maybe even
more powerful) ways you can help a couple gals out!  Simply spread the word to anyone you think
would be excited to hear about our print-full little shoe line and remember,
Indiegogo has some easy-to-use share tools, too!
We cannot put into words how much this process has meant to us over the last
few years.  Yes, there were highs AND
lows, but nothing has touched us more than the immense support we have received
and the strength it has fed us to push forward.
It starts with an idea mixed with some passion and patience, but it’s
the support system that ultimately helps to get that idea off the ground.
THANK YOU ALL!",0.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","New York, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/pippa-france-handmade-luxury-shoes/pica

Campaign Summary

Our goal is to have regular income for our global initiatives. Previously this has limited the reach of each project, but through this Indiegogo we fix that! 

This campaign opens a new door so we can deliver 2,000 more Love Packs, help children in coffee farming communities in Honduras, and serve 200 homeless in San Francisco! 

Visit our website for additional details: www.shopcrosswordsusa.com

WE'VE ADDED A STRETCH GOAL! HIT $3,000 WE ROLL OUT THE SECOND DESIGN IMMEDIATELY!

The Person
Fresh out of college I was diving deep into Corporate America. Working
full time in marketing, coordinating the youth worship team at my
church, and traveling across the globe. Somewhere between two years ago

and here my plans changed.


The Dream
After many nights spent at 35,000 feet, hours spent picking coffee, days
hiking the Andes, weeks planning The Christmas Project, and months
spent in Africa, one desire became clear. A desire to use my business
experience to empower people. To create opportunity. To deliver

compassion. To make a difference.

The Potential

The
one constant I found in my world travels is that people seek
opportunities to rise, to be empowered. In Honduras we will create
economic opportunity for entire communities to be lifted out of poverty.
In the USA we are sourcing our shirts to keep our manufacturing
capabilities going! We're in a unique position to do good at home and

abroad.

The Causes

Our global initiatives are about
creating economic opportunity and delivering compassion. We commit 20%
of our profits to changing the world and building a better tomorrow.
We're working with our production partners to create high quality
products. In addition, we're working with our global partners to create
opportunities for people to earn fair wages and to gain access to

critical life resources.

The Reality

CrossWordsUSA
has continued to evolve and refine in to what you see today. From hand
screening shirts on a folding table to transforming communities in
Honduras, this dream has never been more real. We look forward to
continuing our existing relationships, as well as developing new global
initiatives. Together lets create opportunities for economic empowerment
and deliver compassion to the world.
Other Ways You Can Help

We completely understand if you are not able to financially support us. We'd still like to invite you to join us on our journey of changing the world. You can help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!

Please use the share tools on this campaign to share on facebook, instagram, twitter, and linkedin! We look forward to sharing our success stories with all of you as we get to an all system go!

Help fund Randy Rose's hip replacement

Wrestling historians and fans alike, can remember turning on their television in the 80's and watching wrestlers fighting for Championship Gold and each other!  One of the great memories of that time,  was the strong emergence of the Tag-Team division.  One of the leading teams of that era was The Original Midnight Express, consisting of Randy Rose , Dennis Condrey and Norvell Austin, soon became the NWA Tag Team champions and later down the road,  AWA World Tag Team champions. One of their most notable feuds would pit the The ""Original"" Midnight Express, managed by a fresh faced Paul E. Dangerously, against a ""newly"" formed Midnight Express managed by Jim Cornett. Towards the end of the 80's the feud came to an end and Randy went on to Georgia All-Star Wrestling and the Global Wrestling Federation where he would later retire.  After his retirement Randy went on to help local charities, most notably the Mucscular Dystrophy Association(MDA).

Due to the rough and tumble lifestyle led by these athletes, over time, their bodies suffer the effects of wrestling. That being said, Randy Rose's hip has deteriorated to the point of needing a full hip replacement surgery.  Randy will be having this surgery at the end of October 2013.  Being that insurance for wrestlers is limited, if non existent, this Indiegogo account has been created.  We would like to ask you, the fans, to please give back if you can to a man who gave a majority of his career to you.  We are asking for $8500 to help Randy have this surgery, mend and ultimately be pain free. If for any reason we cannot reach this goal totally for Randy, the money raised will still assist him going towards the surgery. This account, along with a P.O. Box (P.O. Box 222, Acworth, Ga. 30101) has been set up where you can make your donation in the form of PayPal, cash, check or money order payable to R&
column2:
R Lifts c/o Randy.  Please look and see below what Randy Rose will give you in return for your donation(s).  Thank you for your time reading this and your donation, it is GREATLY appreciated!

","Help fund Randy Rose's hip replacement

What is the Ultimate City Jacket?

3 in 1, a truly functional and versatile jacket that adapts to any weather or life circumstances. The Parachute system is a proprietary technology allowing you to make your jacket shorter with just a simple hand movement.

Adjust your sleeves for a perfect fit, store everything you need to carry in specially designed pockets and let everybody appreciate your stylish look. In case you don’t need a jacket, you can always take it with you as a bag carrying your belongings.

Automatic Length Reduction System

Making your Ultimate City Jacket shorter is always useful when you need protection from the rain, more comfort in your movements or for when you just simply want to change your style on the fly.

 

Adaptable Sleeves

Your jacket should always fit you regardless of any circumstances. With the Ultimate City Jacket, you can adjust the length of your sleeves for a perfect fit you need. /

Transforms into a bag

In the case, you don’t need a jacket, you still can always use it as a bag and take with you in case it gets cold outside.

Built-in Wallet for Credit Cards and Cash

Don't like carrying your bulky wallet with you? Or you are afraid of losing it somewhere? With the Ultimate City Jacket, it's not a problem. Keep your cards and cash secure in a special built-in wallet.
 

10+ Pockets to Keep You Organized

With the Ultimate City Jacket you can take all the stuff you may need for a day out with you and keep it organized in specially designed pockets.

'

 

Why we've created the Ultimate City Jacket?
column3:
showinfo=0"">

We've been developing functional clothes for more than 3 years. Almost a year ago we started working on the Ultimate City Jacket when we couldn’t find an outerwear that would be specially designed for the city lifestyle. 

As we developed the product, we tested and improved every feature giving the users the sense of multifunctional and truly versatile outerwear that adapts to any life scenario. Now we are seeking support from the Kickstarter community to make this amazing jacket available globally for all customers who want to feel comfortable in their own cities.

WHAT HAPPENED

Hiya, i'm Charlotte, a self-employed jewellery designer and businesswoman. In December I moved from Bristol back to my parents in Hemel. Since then I have poured the bulk of my savings into building a brand new workshop to carry on my now 5 year strong business Black Heart Creatives. This included building a cabin, installing electrics, furniture, a workbench, and flooring. My laser was still in Bristol whilst this was going on and my lovely friends at Yeah Laser have been cutting my orders for me
column2: however this is not cost efficient for my largely custom business, and has been eating away at my profits.  Last month my trusty laser was shipped to me, but it turns out it did not survive the move.

column1: My laser is a decade old, so fixing it is not simple or a long term solution. I've had an estimate that even short term repairs would cost around £1000, maybe even more. I've already spent a lot of money repairing this laser and it is not good business sense to continue throwing money at it.
THE LASER
I need £3500 in order to buy
column3: products_id=128"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">my new lovely laser from the amazing people at HPC, get it shipped and installed in my workshop.

column1: I am asking for the full amount as I need to use what's left of my savings to keep outsourcing my customers orders until the new laser arrives (which is approximately £70-100 a week) and pay for things like materials, postage and photographer for the new collection, in order for the business to keep ticking over.
REWARDS FOR YOUR HELP
Exclusive Black Heart Creatives pieces that you cannot and will not ever be able to get anywhere ever again yo!
HOW YOUR BACKING WILL HELP

Currently I am totally without a laser, so I can start earning money again! But it will also mean I can expand what I am currently doing. From starting as a totally self taught etsy business making some money making name necklaces, to featuring in Vogue, I can safely say that Black Heart Creatives is a successful business, and I have been running it full time since 2014.  Moving to self employment was a scary but important move for me personally as I became unable to work a traditional job as I was diagnosed with Fibromyalgia, and hemiplegic migraines (the list goes on and on I won't bore you). This means I am 'unreliable' to normal employers, and being able to set my own hours, and days and limits means I can keep working.

My recent change in personal circumstances mean I am now on a single income, and as challenging as that is, I know Black Heart Creatives is sustainable if I can cut my own pieces. My business plans for this year have already been hindered by the lack of my own laser. A newer faster better laser will enable me to do higher quality, more advanced technical pieces, and would mean that I could meet the requirements of the retailers and museums who have expressed interest in stocking my pieces . I would hate to throw away all the hard work I have put in to the business. Your help would mean that not only would this small business continue, but it would grow too.
OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

If you can't contribute, then that is ok! What you could do for me, is share the campaign. Share it on your facebook, twitter, instagram, snapchat, pinterest, WhatsApp group, whatever social media or communication tool you are using, it would mean the absolute world to me if you could do that.
Thank you so much for looking and helping.

Who are the Wastelanders?
The Wastelanders give St Louis fans of MLS a chance to come together and cheer for the league, no matter which team they support.
We also work to show that St Louis is an ideal market for an MLS team and to show that a team and it's fans will have a positive impact on our community.
Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.
Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?
<div>
Our Goal

By raising our goal of $1,500 we will be able to order scarves and t-shirts without any one person having to make a large initial investment.

In addition we will use these funds for promotional material which will help to spread the word of St Louis soccer.

And finally, if enough is raised we will use excess funds to sponsor the America Scores St Louis Soccer Dribble. America Scores partners with urban schools to provide a high quality, team-based program that integrates soccer, poetry and service-learning. Our innovative approach improves students’ health, academic achievement and civic engagement.
<div>
You Score
If you help to fund our campaign you'll get some sweet rewards:

$25 - You'll recieve a free Wastelanders scarf

$50 - A scarf AND t-shirt will be yours

$100 - Scarf, t-shirt, and a bottle of Wastelanders Signature Ale
Give over $100 and you'll not only get all of that, but you'll also get our undying love and appreciation.

We've seen the impact a supporters group like the Sons of Ben in Philadelphia can have. Not only did they bring a team to their city, they helped to bring their city together.

With your help Wastelanders can do the same.

be sure to go to our website www.wastelandersstl.com and register to become a member on the ""How to Join"" page.

Also check us out on facebook:
www.facebook.com/wastelandersstl

and Twitter
www.twitter.com/wastelandersstl

Thank you for taking a look at our Indiegogo Project. Mestre MMA Gear is a brand new line of apparel for MMA, BJJ, martial artists and enthusiasts! Our unique team of highly trained martial artists also happen to be experienced graphic artists as well. The word 'Mestre' is the Portuguese word for 'Master' and simply represents the drive in all of us not to necessarily become masters one day, but to push ourselves to be the best we can be in all areas of life.
We have infused the classic warrior spirit with Mestre MMA Gear artwork that is a cross between anime and grunge, between quality training gear and amazing artwork.
Our current designs have already been purchased by fans from around the world, even some that just loved the designs but participate in other sports or none at all.

We have been fulfilling orders through a middle company or companies for a few years, but  we will be flying to meet with several factories in Taiwan and Korea. Our designs are unique enough, and fan base large enough that they warrant dealing directly with a manufacturer who can do all of the work from start to finish in one location, and who will be able to produce the quality and quantity of orders we need in a shorter period of time.
Why Do We Need Funding!?
Problem #1  - We fulfill orders through printing companies that highly restrict our ability to expand our market base due to overhead cost.

Solution #1 - We will be meeting with factories in Taiwan and Korea, three hours from our location in Okinawa, Japan, which can produce clothing, gi uniforms, gloves, hats and much more with high quality and quick turnaround.

Problem #2 - Quick mass production of designs is difficult. Our printing company has about a 4-6 week turnaround no matter the size of the order. Not only do have to pay a bit more for clothing, but we also have to pay for shipping from California to Okinawa, and pay customs taxes to the Government of Japan as well. So, although we make a profit, it is tough to grow exponentially and expand the clothing line.

Solution #2 - Once production commences in Taiwan or Korea we will be able to produce a large amount of apparel with a turnaround of 10-14 days including shipping to Okinawa. Initially we want to enter the large scale global market with five of our designs. The five designs will create a positive flow to fund future projects.
Problem #3 - As a new clothing company we still have to make a name for ourselves. We have a small, loyal customer base, but need to expand.
Solution #3 - Fund the marketing campaign, prizes, giveaways perks through FB, GooglePlus, Twitter, Pinterest, Instagram and Youtube as well as Sponsor a few fighters and teams around the world.

We appreciate all of our fans and partners that have been working alongside of us, supporting us, and representing Mestre MMA Gear. We look forward to working with you and supporting you and your martial arts journey into the future with more designs for not just rasguards, but gi uniforms, sparring gear, fight shorts and more. First, we will start where we are, use what we have and do all we can before offering those items in 2014.
DESIGNS and PERKS:

column2: >HONORABLE MENTION for a $5.00 or More Contribution:
column3: > We will be putting your name on the back of our commemorative campaign tshirt as a super thank you for all of your help.

column1: LOGO UNIFORM PATCH for a $15 or More Contribution: We will send you one of our colorful Mestre MMA Gear patches that you can place on your BJJ uniform, fight shorts, Capoeira pants, gear bag, etc.

COMMEMORATIVE TEE SHIRT for a $25 or More Contribution: This perk will be be our uniquely designed Indiegogo Campaign tee that will feature your name on the back of the shirt as a thank you for supporting a dream come true. You will also receive a uniform patch.

RASHGUARD for a $60 or More Contribution: Choose from one of our 3 first round release, uniquely designed training and competition rashguards below. Stand out from the crowd with  fresh, new gear in class and get a uniform patch. You can also view some of the rasghuards that will be coming out soon, by taking a look at our gallery.

FIGHTER SPONSORSHIP for a $500 or More Contribution: If you are a fighter in need of some sponsorship then look no further. Mestre MMA Gear will send you each of designs for the period of a year and officially sponsor you as a fighter, instructor or grappler, school owner, or martial arts store.
WHO ARE WE:

We are both former military members who have now made a life in Japan, one as a professional martial artist instructor and fighter, musician, artist, performer and entrepreneur, and the other as an artist, designer and entrepreneur. Due to our military backgrounds, education and business experiences we are well able to run the clothing line financially, strategically, artistically and logistically.*9*-

","Thank you for taking a look at our Indiegogo Project. Mestre MMA Gear is a brand new line of apparel for MMA, BJJ, martial artists and enthusiasts! Our unique team of highly trained martial artists also happen to be experienced graphic artists as well. The word 'Mestre' is the Portuguese word for 'Master' and simply represents the drive in all of us not to necessarily become masters one day, but to push ourselves to be the best we can be in all areas of life.
We have infused the classic warrior spirit with Mestre MMA Gear artwork that is a cross between anime and grunge, between quality training gear and amazing artwork.
Our current designs have already been purchased by fans from around the world, even some that just loved the designs but participate in other sports or none at all.

We have been fulfilling orders through a middle company or companies for a few years, but  we will be flying to meet with several factories in Taiwan and Korea. Our designs are unique enough, and fan base large enough that they warrant dealing directly with a manufacturer who can do all of the work from start to finish in one location, and who will be able to produce the quality and quantity of orders we need in a shorter period of time.
Why Do We Need Funding!?
Problem #1  - We fulfill orders through printing companies that highly restrict our ability to expand our market base due to overhead cost.

Solution #1 - We will be meeting with factories in Taiwan and Korea, three hours from our location in Okinawa, Japan, which can produce clothing, gi uniforms, gloves, hats and much more with high quality and quick turnaround.

Problem #2 - Quick mass production of designs is difficult. Our printing company has about a 4-6 week turnaround no matter the size of the order. Not only do have to pay a bit more for clothing, but we also have to pay for shipping from California to Okinawa, and pay customs taxes to the Government of Japan as well. So, although we make a profit, it is tough to grow exponentially and expand the clothing line.

Solution #2 - Once production commences in Taiwan or Korea we will be able to produce a large amount of apparel with a turnaround of 10-14 days including shipping to Okinawa. Initially we want to enter the large scale global market with five of our designs. The five designs will create a positive flow to fund future projects.
Problem #3 - As a new clothing company we still have to make a name for ourselves. We have a small, loyal customer base, but need to expand.
Solution #3 - Fund the marketing campaign, prizes, giveaways perks through FB, GooglePlus, Twitter, Pinterest, Instagram and Youtube as well as Sponsor a few fighters and teams around the world.

We appreciate all of our fans and partners that have been working alongside of us, supporting us, and representing Mestre MMA Gear. We look forward to working with you and supporting you and your martial arts journey into the future with more designs for not just rasguards, but gi uniforms, sparring gear, fight shorts and more. First, we will start where we are, use what we have and do all we can before offering those items in 2014.
DESIGNS and PERKS:
HONORABLE MENTION for a $5.00 or More Contribution: We will be putting your name on the back of our commemorative campaign tshirt as a super thank you for all of your help.
LOGO UNIFORM PATCH for a $15 or More Contribution: We will send you one of our colorful Mestre MMA Gear patches that you can place on your BJJ uniform, fight shorts, Capoeira pants, gear bag, etc.

COMMEMORATIVE TEE SHIRT for a $25 or More Contribution: This perk will be be our uniquely designed Indiegogo Campaign tee that will feature your name on the back of the shirt as a thank you for supporting a dream come true. You will also receive a uniform patch.

RASHGUARD for a $60 or More Contribution: Choose from one of our 3 first round release, uniquely designed training and competition rashguards below. Stand out from the crowd with  fresh, new gear in class and get a uniform patch. You can also view some of the rasghuards that will be coming out soon, by taking a look at our gallery.

FIGHTER SPONSORSHIP for a $500 or More Contribution: If you are a fighter in need of some sponsorship then look no further. Mestre MMA Gear will send you each of designs for the period of a year and officially sponsor you as a fighter, instructor or grappler, school owner, or martial arts store.
WHO ARE WE:

We are both former military members who have now made a life in Japan, one as a professional martial artist instructor and fighter, musician, artist, performer and entrepreneur, and the other as an artist, designer and entrepreneur. Due to our military backgrounds, education and business experiences we are well able to run the clothing line financially, strategically, artistically and logistically.*9*-",5.0,0,"1 Campaign

MixPixie is the world's first personalised music store.  In just 18 months of trading we've made over 40,000 personalised CDs, but we're not stopping there...oh no.

Music is personal to us all.  Do you remember making mix tapes for friends in the good old days?  Anyone can burn music these days but generally the audio quality is poor and the systems we play our music on is even poorer.  What's more when we buy compilation albums, we only love two or three of the tracks on them.

column2: >

column1: Did you know that over 60% of all music bought in the UK is done so as gifts?  But how do you give a download?  Email a track: Dull.  Buy a voucher: Boring. Create a CD on your computer: Looks budget...Please let us introduce the answer to all your problems: The Personalised Mix Tape MP3 player.
Each Mix Tape MP3 Player comes with headphones and a USB cable

column2: >

column1: Here are the stats:
1. It can hold up to 2 GB of songs (that's about 30-40 tracks).
2. You can personalise the front and back of the MP3 player with your text.
3. You can personalise the bespoke gift box.

4. You can order it pre-loaded with specific songs of your choice for your recipient to tell them ""I Love You"", ""I'm Sorry"", ""Good Luck"" etc. By the way, we've got 13 million to choose from! Or you can add your songs at home whichever you prefer.
5.  It comes with a set of headphones and a USB cable.
6. Use the USB cable to charge the player and drag and drop any tracks from your PC or Mac onto the player on wav or MP3 format.
7. It's an affordable gift.
8. It's high quality and has a great sound.
9. It's tiny and fits inside the palm of your hand.
10. It's the coolest thing since...well...mix tapes.
The Mix Tape MP3 Player
Risks and challenges

We think we've done all of the hard work already so that if you brilliant people at Indie Gogo help us acheive our goal and reach £15,000 in funding, we’re confident that the chances of successfully launching these fantastic products are very high: we've sourced all of the different materials from all over the world, we've made prototypes, we've got our fingers jammed in printers...you name it.

The process will start by getting our techie guys to write the software so that people like you can make a personalised mix tape MP3 player really easily. Then we need to develop a custom cutting template (called a dye) to cut out the personalised packaging for each and every MP3 player, on our high-tech cutting machine. Then, we can order the various stock parts and start making the MP3 players just the way you want them.

We feel 100% confident that we can acheive our goal of launching these products in September 2013 with your support.

The Story
The idea for my give-back backpack company materialized in 2010 when I hopped on a plane to spend four-and-a-half months traveling and volunteering with kids in developing countries.
After a two-decade career designing products for luxury beauty brands (including Ralph Lauren Fragrances, Bobbi Brown Cosmetics, and Sephora), I wanted to do something more impactful with my life.
That something came after spending time in schools and orphanages in some of the world’s poorest countries – Tanzania, India, Cambodia, Vietnam and Laos.

At an orphanage in India, I handed out pencils to a classroom of excited students. Their immense gratitude for something so simple blew my mind. Throughout the course of my journey, I realized that the children I met are like millions of others around the world. They are eager for an education but lack basic supplies. I returned to San Francisco determined to help so I switched career paths and put my background in product development to use.
<div>
Bixbee - ""The Brand""

We launched Schoolbags for Kids in 2011 with a line of spectacular backpacks for kids. Moms couldn’t resist our adorable and ergonomic designs—and we were an immediate hit with the Mommy Bloggers and press too (Today Show, Huffington Post, Parents, even Wired featured our backpacks in their recent 2012 Holiday Gift Guide).
Now, with a little re-branding, a few design tweaks and some fantastical collections we want to introduce the Bixbee brand but WE NEED YOUR HELP TO LAUNCH! The funds raised will help to manufacture and market the new Bixbee line. The more backpacks we sell, the more schoolbags with supplies we donate.
Our products have been featured in:
<div>
Unique Horizontal Design

Recent studies have shown that 64% of kids suffer from back pain, in most cases due to overloaded or ill-fitting backpacks. Our patent pending, ergonomic design keeps the weight of the backpack at waist level and allows for easy reach of books and supplies. Several compartments keep items well-organized and allow weight to be evenly distributed throughout. Our backpacks are lightweight at only 2 lbs (1 kilo), alleviating any extra load. Made with rugged 600-denier polyester, they are water-resistant and built to last.

Kids come in all different sizes, so we believe that backpacks should too! That’s why we offer both large and medium sizes on all backpack styles. Flyer backpacks come in size small and are perfect for a preschooler or kindergartner.
<div>

column2:
>Large Size Backpack: 15” wide x 6” deep x 12” high - Recommended for kids over 4 ft tall
Medium Size Backpack: 13” wide x 5” deep x 11.5” high - Recommended for kids between 43”-49” tall
Small Size Backpack: 12” wide x 4” deep x 9.5” high – Recommended for kids between 36”-42” tall
>All Bixbee products are tested Lead, Phthalates and PVC free

column1: The PERKS!
After selecting a perk, please let us know which items you would prefer (style, color, size) by leaving us a comment.
The Team

Here at Schoolbags for Kids headquarters we each wear several hats, so our responsibilities change day to day. We’re a small yet talented and tenacious group committed to offering a high quality product with a passion to help those with less achieve more.

Video Credit: Christian Amundson
Graphic Facilitator: Giselle Chow 
Photo Credit: Michelle Jones
