** NEWS 11/15 **

Pledges will be managed through BackerKit. After you pledge you will be able to add on items like custom lace accents to Alex, additional pairs of panties, and tote bags. 

****

Hello there! We’re Valid, a bunch of queer people making stuff for queering life. We’re best known for our jewelry, featuring flags of various queer and gender variant communities – from asexual to transgender. When one of our founders started questioning their gender, we started to notice that tucking options were... not great. They were either expensive and not really functional, frighteningly expensive and on backorder, or a nightmare of DIYing and guessing at sizes.

Post Secondary is here to fix that. We’ve spent over a year designing and testing an undergarment designed explicitly to comfortably conceal a phallus all day long, even in fairly extreme circumstances. We call them Alex. Alex doesn’t have any weird, chafing seams. Alex isn’t designed by a cis-guy with a fetish. Alex is made from breathable fabric, so you don’t overheat. Best of all, Alex is priced so that trans folks can actually afford to own them.

Right now, we have a fully functional Alex prototype. We've done extensive testing and we’re happy with how it fits and how it functions. We need your help to get Alex in the hands of the folks who need it, because we’ve run into a few problems.

Problem 1: There is almost no market research on transfeminine or gender neutral folks out there. We know how many we need for our minimum order, but we don't know if that will be enough and what sizes are most wanted. By buying here, you'll help us get a better idea of what to produce for our first run.

Problem B: The clothing industry works on an economy of scale. The more we initially order, the more affordable each pair becomes. Our goal is to make Alex as affordable as possible. We're using Indiegogo to spread the word about Alex even further, so that folks who otherwise never would have heard about Alex can get a pair of their very own.

Trans and gender nonconforming people have enough struggles. Finding underwear that they can wear all day and still be cute shouldn’t be one of them.

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

Here’s the deal: to make these affordable, we need to order a bunch of them. We’re asking for $9,520 dollars. Of that amount, 78% covers the production of Alex and the other rewards, 10% covers our shipping of the rewards, and 12% covers Indiegogo’s fees, taxes, patent application, and other assorted fees.

We’ve opted to go with flexible funding for this project. We hope to exceed our goals, but even if we don’t, we’ve made sure that our budget ensures that everyone who orders Alex from us will get their underwear.

As we pass our initial goal we will be able to add more sizes (youth sizing!), order more pairs to lower the overall price, add lace and more colors, and begin the final design and sample production for the next piece in the Post Secondary line.

Easy enough, you say, but what’s in it for me? Well, that’s easy! We have several reward perks for you to choose from. We’ve got buttons and tee shirts! But most importantly, we’ve got Alex.

Meet Alex:

column1: <li>Comfortable<ul>
<li>One of the many R&amp
column2: D test drives included tucking in these for 14 hours at Emerald City Comic Con  -  “I don’t have to give these back do I?”

column1: • We’ve positioned the seams so they don’t rub anywhere sensitive

• Breathable
    • That means no more heat exhaustion from your undies
• These are made with a couple of great fabrics that allow them to stretch where needed and stay put where they need to hold.
<li>Boyshort Cut<ul>
• Cute
• Looks good on pretty much every human
• Gender neutral cut
<li>Great Hold<ul>
• These were tested at varying levels of physical activity to see how well they kept things tucked. Even at high levels of bending, lifting, sitting, standing and walking, Alex performed beautifully.
• The most active day (and 14 hours of wear) led to “very slight shifting” and a “minor bump” at the end of the day (7 hours after the last adjustment).

• Cute Colors
    • Our initial run will be three colors: Black, Red, and Antique Rose

• Great Size Range
    • Our initial run will include 7 sizes: XS to 3XL

Need help figuring out your size? Send us an email and we'll help get you the right size.

Thank You to Forever New!

One of the things we looked into while developing these panties was how to keep them looking and feeling good longer. Knowing the wear that regular detergents put on transmasculine binders, we wanted to tackle that from the start. While reading an article about the Queen of England's bras we found out about an American company called Forever New. They make fabric care especially designed for fine garments, and Oh My Gosh does it work amazing! We decided to carry this great product to go with our line of shapewear, and when we told Forever New about what we were working on they generously offered to send sample packs of their original &
column2:
unscented fabric wash for us include with every pair of Alex pre-ordered through this campaign. That's right, whether you bought 1 pair or 7, for yourself or to be donated (see below), every pair will come with a packet of this wonderful fabric wash.

Cisgender Ally Support

We can hear you thinking, wow, Alex sounds great, but I’m a cis person, so I really don’t need one. I wonder how I can help?

That’s easy. We have a set of perks that let you donate a pair (or 3 or 7) to a trans person who can’t afford it. We trans, nonbinary, and genderqueer folks tend to earn less than our cis/straight counterparts, so we’ve partnered with Point of Pride, a delightful non-profit organization who connect trans people in need with gender affirming garments and breast forms. Every person who selects that perk will be donating a pair directly to a trans person who otherwise wouldn’t be able to get one.

The Impact

Look, there aren’t a lot of options for transfeminine folks out there, and even fewer for people who just don’t have a gender. Alex is the first step in remedying that. We’ve done everything in our power to make Alex affordable and available. With your help, no one will have to resort to duct taping their phallus in place unless they want to. Plus, the better this campaign does, the more affordable these underwear will become.

Not only that, but we’re ready to start rebuilding other gender affirming undergarments. We have plans for panties that add hips (see below), affordable tucking panties with lace and fun patterns, and a ground up rebuild of the chest binder.

Retailer Options

Are you a store that serves transgender, nonbinary, and genderqueer people? Are you looking for tucking panties that aren't terrible or terribly expensive? We have some great packages built for retailers, so that you can outfit your store to outfit your customers. If you are interested in getting these details, please contact us.

Shipping Details

All clothing perks will be shipped by USPS Priority (Domestic &
column3:
International) so that all items include tracking numbers. We understand that this makes international shipping expensive, but without tracking we cannot guarantee you will receive your package. If you are an international backer concerned about shipping fees, we recommend teaming up with nearby friends to become a supporter so that you can split shipping costs.

Risks &
column4:
Challenges

Because we've done so much of the groundwork before coming to you, there are surprisingly few challenges to overcome for Alex. We have a garment manufacturer that we trust to do the final manufacturing, and we know their work is good because they supplied us with our prototypes. We’re working with a Los Angeles designer and production manager (who specializes in undergarments) to ensure that everything goes smoothly.

Shipping is always a challenge, but this is not our first crowdfunding rodeo. We’ve run a very successful Kickstarter campaign with our sibling company, Optimystical Studios, and we’ve worked with a lot of other crowdfunding campaigns as perk suppliers. We’re prepared for all of the usual hiccups that come with shipping specifically and crowdfunding in general.

Even if we’re wildly successful, we’re still ordering garments in quantities that are tiny for the industry. That’s okay, because the garment manufacturer we’re working with is set up for both tiny to enormous orders. There is always the risk that they could go out of business before our campaign finishes (they have been in business for 27 years, so this seems unlikely), or that they become overwhelmed with other projects. It’s okay, our production manager has two alternate manufacturers lined up just in case.

In a worst case scenario, we’ll let you know that there will be a delay in shipping and keep everyone in the loop about what’s going on. As we have met our goal, everyone will be getting their perks, even if we hit a delay.

Other Ways You Can Help

We get it, money is always tight. That’s okay. Let people know what we’re up to. Share the project on the social media platform of your choice, talk to your friends about it, contact your local Queer Straight Alliance and make sure they’ve heard about it!

Do you know buyers for stores that stock other gender affirming garments? Let them know that we would love to supply them with the best tucking panties on the market!

Word of mouth is great, and we appreciate you all talking about us.

What Else Is In The Works?

We've already started work on the 2nd piece of Gender Affirming Shapewear in our Post Secondary line, their name is Morgan. And Morgan is here to give you some curves.

Morgan will be a longer leg version of the Alex tucking panty with built in hip pockets designed to hold the custom silicone hip &
column5:
butt pads we have already designed (we had custom molds made, it was awesome!).

Many transfeminine folks have already found that using hip and butt pads designed for cis women don't work particularly well because of the difference in muscle shape. So we worked with several bodies to create a pad that gives a nice curve that won't come off as comical. Because it's silicone warms up like your body, moves with you, and can be washed unlike foam pads.

When we hit this 2nd Stretch Goal we will be able to pay our designer to start patterning Morgan, doing the size grading, and creating the samples for us to test drive. That will put us well on our way to a production run of Morgan, with included pads.

Other Questions?

We have a page dedicated to Post Secondary and Alex on our website. We've posted about our process so far and what we want to do in the future with this line. If you have more questions, please contact us and we will respond as fast as possible.

","** NEWS 11/15 **Pledges will be managed through BackerKit. After you pledge you will be able to add on items like custom lace accents to Alex, additional pairs of panties, and tote bags. ****Hello there! We’re Valid, a bunch of queer people making stuff for queering life. We’re best known for our jewelry, featuring flags of various queer and gender variant communities – from asexual to transgender. When one of our founders started questioning their gender, we started to notice that tucking options were... not great. They were either expensive and not really functional, frighteningly expensive and on backorder, or a nightmare of DIYing and guessing at sizes.Post Secondary is here to fix that. We’ve spent over a year designing and testing an undergarment designed explicitly to comfortably conceal a phallus all day long, even in fairly extreme circumstances. We call them Alex. Alex doesn’t have any weird, chafing seams. Alex isn’t designed by a cis-guy with a fetish. Alex is made from breathable fabric, so you don’t overheat. Best of all, Alex is priced so that trans folks can actually afford to own them.Right now, we have a fully functional Alex prototype. We've done extensive testing and we’re happy with how it fits and how it functions. We need your help to get Alex in the hands of the folks who need it, because we’ve run into a few problems.Problem 1: There is almost no market research on transfeminine or gender neutral folks out there. We know how many we need for our minimum order, but we don't know if that will be enough and what sizes are most wanted. By buying here, you'll help us get a better idea of what to produce for our first run.Problem B: The clothing industry works on an economy of scale. The more we initially order, the more affordable each pair becomes. Our goal is to make Alex as affordable as possible. We're using Indiegogo to spread the word about Alex even further, so that folks who otherwise never would have heard about Alex can get a pair of their very own.Trans and gender nonconforming people have enough struggles. Finding underwear that they can wear all day and still be cute shouldn’t be one of them.What We Need & What You GetHere’s the deal: to make these affordable, we need to order a bunch of them. We’re asking for $9,520 dollars. Of that amount, 78% covers the production of Alex and the other rewards, 10% covers our shipping of the rewards, and 12% covers Indiegogo’s fees, taxes, patent application, and other assorted fees.We’ve opted to go with flexible funding for this project. We hope to exceed our goals, but even if we don’t, we’ve made sure that our budget ensures that everyone who orders Alex from us will get their underwear.As we pass our initial goal we will be able to add more sizes (youth sizing!), order more pairs to lower the overall price, add lace and more colors, and begin the final design and sample production for the next piece in the Post Secondary line.Easy enough, you say, but what’s in it for me? Well, that’s easy! We have several reward perks for you to choose from. We’ve got buttons and tee shirts! But most importantly, we’ve got Alex.Meet Alex:

column1: Comfortable
One of the many R&D test drives included tucking in these for 14 hours at Emerald City Comic Con  -  “I don’t have to give these back do I?”
We’ve positioned the seams so they don’t rub anywhere sensitive
BreathableThat means no more heat exhaustion from your undies
These are made with a couple of great fabrics that allow them to stretch where needed and stay put where they need to hold.
Boyshort Cut
Cute
Looks good on pretty much every human
Gender neutral cut
Great Hold
These were tested at varying levels of physical activity to see how well they kept things tucked. Even at high levels of bending, lifting, sitting, standing and walking, Alex performed beautifully.
The most active day (and 14 hours of wear) led to “very slight shifting” and a “minor bump” at the end of the day (7 hours after the last adjustment).
Cute ColorsOur initial run will be three colors: Black, Red, and Antique Rose
Great Size RangeOur initial run will include 7 sizes: XS to 3XL

Need help figuring out your size? Send us an email and we'll help get you the right size.Thank You to Forever New!One of the things we looked into while developing these panties was how to keep them looking and feeling good longer. Knowing the wear that regular detergents put on transmasculine binders, we wanted to tackle that from the start. While reading an article about the Queen of England's bras we found out about an American company called Forever New. They make fabric care especially designed for fine garments, and Oh My Gosh does it work amazing! We decided to carry this great product to go with our line of shapewear, and when we told Forever New about what we were working on they generously offered to send sample packs of their original & unscented fabric wash for us include with every pair of Alex pre-ordered through this campaign. That's right, whether you bought 1 pair or 7, for yourself or to be donated (see below), every pair will come with a packet of this wonderful fabric wash.Cisgender Ally SupportWe can hear you thinking, wow, Alex sounds great, but I’m a cis person, so I really don’t need one. I wonder how I can help?That’s easy. We have a set of perks that let you donate a pair (or 3 or 7) to a trans person who can’t afford it. We trans, nonbinary, and genderqueer folks tend to earn less than our cis/straight counterparts, so we’ve partnered with Point of Pride, a delightful non-profit organization who connect trans people in need with gender affirming garments and breast forms. Every person who selects that perk will be donating a pair directly to a trans person who otherwise wouldn’t be able to get one.The ImpactLook, there aren’t a lot of options for transfeminine folks out there, and even fewer for people who just don’t have a gender. Alex is the first step in remedying that. We’ve done everything in our power to make Alex affordable and available. With your help, no one will have to resort to duct taping their phallus in place unless they want to. Plus, the better this campaign does, the more affordable these underwear will become.Not only that, but we’re ready to start rebuilding other gender affirming undergarments. We have plans for panties that add hips (see below), affordable tucking panties with lace and fun patterns, and a ground up rebuild of the chest binder.Retailer OptionsAre you a store that serves transgender, nonbinary, and genderqueer people? Are you looking for tucking panties that aren't terrible or terribly expensive? We have some great packages built for retailers, so that you can outfit your store to outfit your customers. If you are interested in getting these details, please contact us.Shipping DetailsAll clothing perks will be shipped by USPS Priority (Domestic & International) so that all items include tracking numbers. We understand that this makes international shipping expensive, but without tracking we cannot guarantee you will receive your package. There is always the risk that they could go out of business before our campaign finishes (they have been in business for 27 years, so this seems unlikely), or that they become overwhelmed with other projects. -For French translation please scroll about half way down.

                    

Introducing the long awaited Distinct 3 Vintage Racing Style Watch Series.

We’ve always been inspired by the things, people and places we admire, so for our latest limited-edition pieces, we decided to travel back to the 1960’s era car races.
From the sweet revving sound, to the exciting smell of petrol and burnt tires, to Le Man 24 hour race, where bold and fearless drivers race the unbelievably fast cars. This is where, everywhere is quite except you hear the extremely loud engines and your own heartbeat. Hands sweating, teeth grinding, eyes wide open and heads turning for 24 hours.


 

A great watch is not just about a good design and movement. Precision machining, great finishing and quality materials are also what make a watch high quality and beautiful.

High polished case, double domed sapphire crystal, decorated quality movement, 3D dial and the super comfortable Italian leather perforated racing style straps make the Distinct 3 watches ""Distinct"". The name says it all. 

 

Distinct 3 Grand Prix

 

Ferro &
column2:
Company 

We have spent the past 18 months designing the Distinct 3 watches, inspired by the most aggressive car races in history, where unbelievably fast cars and bold drivers race for 24 hours none-stop to push their limits fearlessly.

 
 

As years went by, we have listened to our fans requests. They have been asking about introducing a Distinct watch model with a smaller case with an upgraded movements and a sleeker design. So, we got to our drawing board in late 2018 and came up with the new Distinct 3 models.




 

 

 

All Distinct 3 pre-ordered from are backed by a whopping 5 Year International Warranty! How cool is that!



 

Distinct 3 will be available in 3 styles (GLF Series / Grand Prix Series / Petrol Series) and 3 different movements (Swiss ETA 2824 Automatic,  Miyota 9015 Japan Automatic and Swiss Ronda 715 Quartz). Each movement will be  limited to 1000 units.

DISTINCT 3 MODEL  GLF LE MANS 

Available in Swiss Automatic ETA 2824 Automatic,  Miyota 9015 Japan Automatic and Swiss Ronda 715 Quartz). 

 
 

DISTINCT 3 MODEL Grand Prix

Available in Swiss Automatic ETA 2824 Automatic,  Miyota 9015 Japan Automatic and Swiss Ronda 715 Quartz). 

 

 

DISTINCT 3 MODEL Petrol

Available in Swiss Automatic ETA 2824 Automatic,  Miyota 9015 Japan Automatic and Swiss Ronda 715 Quartz). 

 

 The dials of Quartz models are the same as the Automatic models. The only difference is that the word ""Automatic"" is not shown.

 

 Look compelling day and night with Super Luminova powerful C3 lume on the dial.

 

 



 

Case: 42 mm

 Lugs: 22 mm

 Lug to lug: 48 mm

 Thickness: 13.1 mm including top crystal

 Crown: 8 mm / Screw in 

 Dial Opening: 36 mm

 Case Material: High Grade Stainless Steel Polished finish

 Crystal: Scratch Resistant Domed Sapphire Crystal with Anti-reflective Coating / Quartz models will be with Flat Sapphire Crystal

 Back Case: Screw Down Stainless Steel / display back 

 Lume: Super Luminova C3

 Straps: Finest Italian Leather / perforated racing style / comfort fit

 Water Resistance: 100 Meters (10 BAR)

Movement:  Automatic Swiss ETA 2824 Automatic,  Miyota 9015 Japan Automatic and Swiss Ronda 715 Quartz). Each movement will  / Automatic Japan Miyota 9015 with in-house decorations / Swiss Quartz Ronda 715

Please note that if ETA movement is not available, Sellita SW200 will be used which is the exact same movement from a different Swiss company.

 

 

The Distinct 3 watches are constructed with polished 42 mm Stainless Steel Cases that house an Automatic Swiss ETA 2824,  Miyota 9015 Japan, or Swiss Ronda 715 Qaurtz  movements. The Distinct 3.0 series also come with comfortable and soft perforated racing style Italian leather straps with stainless steel pin buckle.

 

 

 

The double domed scratch resistant sapphire crystal (for automatic models) with double sided anti-reflecting coating protects the revamped Motorsports inspired dial and reduces the reflection for better time reading. Quartz models will come with flat sapphire crystal.

 

 

The high performance machinery that our partnering manufacturers use can make small details with perfection such as the onion style crown with our ""F"" logo:



The dual layered dial with tapered edge pushes the boldness and sportiness look of this watch design further.

Although these watches are designed for driving and casual wear, they are 100 meters water resistant.



 

At Ferro &
column3:
Company, we only use the highest-grade materials to make sure that all our watches far exceed our fans expectations. For this reason, we have decided to choose 3 great movements as below:

Swiss ETA 2824 Movement

The ETA 2824  is one of the most well-known and most recognized movements in the watch industry. It has 26 jewels with 38 hours of power reserve.  ETA 2824 movement will keep your time  accurate for a very long time.

 

 Miyota Caliber 9015 Japan Automatic Movement


 

The Miyota caliber 9015 is a 24 jewel automatic Japan movement equipped with a ball bearing rotor, a second stop and a date with a quick-change circuit, this movement works very precisely with 28,800 half oscillations per hour. Furthermore, the movement has a shock absorber, a Swiss anchoring inhibitor and a manual hoist. The reserve is 42 hours. 

 

 Swiss Ronda 715 Quartz Movement

Ronda 715 quartz movement has a very long battery-life (up to 10 years) and is very well known for its accuracy and longevity.

This is the back case of the Quartz models

 

 

FAST AND LEGENDARY


 

The epic, day-long race that winds through the little French hamlet in Northwest France is officially called 24 Hours of Le Mans (24 Heures du Mans in French), but those in the motoring world simply refer to it as “Le Mans"". It has been called the most thrilling 24 hours in motor sports.

 

 

Le Mans has seen  speed records broken again and again (up to 405 k/ph), and plenty of unbelievably fast super cars. It has long been at the forefront of automotive pioneering and innovation issuing from major car companies, spurred on by a desire to beat their rivals out for the claim to the illustrious championship, and status as the most rugged, durable super car maker in the world. It is a deep, and rich history, full of innovation and brilliance, wild stories, sometimes catastrophic mishaps. To understand Le Mans is to understand the history of European – and eventually American – auto racing at large
column4:
to see how the tides shifted, trends started, and how companies rose and fell from prominence like spokes on a wheel. 



 

Distinct 3 watch is so smart that it can tell you the time with just one hand!

One hand watches are very unique in style and are getting quite popular.

The 12-hour dial is divided by 144 markers. Each marker represents 5 minutes.

The combination of the bold 15, 30 and 45-minute markers and the prominent needle pointer make it easy to read time.  By looking at the single hand watch you can tell the time within +/- 2 to 5 minute discrepancy .

Below are some examples: 




 

It's easy to have customers but it is mighty hard to have FANS that spread their love.





 

AS SEEN ON

 



Ferro &
column5: Company is an independent direct to consumer, Canadian watch brand established by 2 brothers and watch aficionados in Vancouver, British Columbia. Since its inception in 2015, Ferro &amp
column6:
Company has shipped thousands of high-quality watches to fans all over the world. Today the company consists of a dedicated team of watch loving professionals who strive to give its customers the best experience possible from start to finish.



 


 

November 2018: Design Phase

Feb-December 2019: Test Phase making sure watches are working prefectly

Feb 2020 : Kickstarter Live

March 2020: Indiegogo

April 2020 : Tooling phase

May 2020: Manufacturing starts

July 2020: Assembly and Quality Control

August 2020: Shipping and delivery to our backers


 

As the final design / tech drawings , prototyping and testing phases have been successfully accomplished, we are finally confident and ready to manufacture the watches for our backers. We have the manufacturer and other part suppliers ready to make the watches with our green signal. All we need is your support. In order to bring Ferro &
column7: Company Distinct 3 watches to your wrists, we need to meet our factory's minimum order quantity requirement
column8: and this will only be possible with your support. By making a pledge, you will secure a high quality Ferro &amp
column9:
Company high quality  Watch at a special Kickstarter price.

Reserving Your Watch:

You can reserve your  Ferro &
column10:
Co. Watch LTD Edition production batch, by making a pledge. Simply click on the green button (on top right)  that states ""back this project"" and follow the screen.

Be a part of Ferro &
column11:
Co. Watches movement. Make a change and make it possible to bring this campaign to life.

Thank You

Thank you all for taking your time to view this project . We hope that you are as passionate as we are about Ferro &
column12:
Co. watches and make your pledge in order to receive your super awesome unique watch(es). 

 

FRENCH VERSION

Présentation de la très attendue série de montres Distinct 3 Vintage Racing Style

 

Nous avons toujours été inspirés par les choses, les gens et les lieux que nous admirons. Pour nos dernières pièces en édition limitée, nous avons donc décidé de remonter aux courses automobiles des années 1960.

Du doux bruit de roulement, à l'odeur excitante de l'essence et des pneus brûlés, aux 24 heures du Man, où des pilotes audacieux et intrépides font la course de voitures incroyablement rapides. C'est là que, partout, tout est calme, sauf que vous entendez les moteurs extrêmement bruyants et les battements de votre propre cœur. Les mains suent, les dents grincent, les yeux sont grands ouverts et la tête tourne pendant 24 heures.



 

Une grande montre n'est pas seulement une bonne conception et un bon mouvement. Un usinage de précision, une finition de qualité et des matériaux de qualité sont aussi ce qui fait qu'une montre est belle et de grande qualité.

Le boîtier poli, le verre saphir à double bombé, le mouvement de qualité décoré, le cadran 3D et les bracelets super confortables en cuir italien perforé de style course font des montres Distinct 3 des montres ""Distinct"". Le nom dit tout.


 

Des objectifs ambitieux

Les gratuités sont géniales, tout comme nos Objectifs! Parce qu'ils sont des cadeaux gratuits pour tous les supporters lorsque nous atteignons le montant de chaque objectif.

Ajoutez du peps à votre montre lorsque nous atteignons notre premier Objectif.

Une fois le second objectif atteint, nous publierons la troisième! Cela signifie plus de gratuités de notre part. Tout ce que vous avez à faire, c'est de nous aider à y parvenir en partageant ce projet avec vos amis et votre famille. Il vous suffit de cliquer sur l'un des boutons ci-dessous.

 

Garantie

Tous les produits Distinct 3 pré-commandés par Kickstarter sont couverts par une garantie internationale de 5 ans ! C’est cool, non ?!

Options modèles

Distinct 3 sera disponible en 3 styles (GLF Series / Grand Prix Series / PetrolSeries) et 3 mouvements différents (Automatique Suisse ETA 2824, Miyota 9015 Automatique Japonaise et Ronda 715 Quartz Suisse). Chaque mouvement sera limité à 1000 unités.

MODÈLE DISTINCT 3 DE GLF LE MANS

Disponible en mouvements à quartz Automatique Suisse ETA 2824,  Automatique Japonaise Miyota 9015 et Ronda 715 Suisse. 

 

MODÈLE DISTINCT 3 DE GRAND PRIX

Disponible en mouvements à quartz Automatique Suisse ETA 2824, Automatique Japonaise Miyota 9015 et Ronda 715 Suisse.



 

MODÈLE DISTINCT 3 DE PETROL
 

Disponible en mouvements à quartz Automatique Suisse ETA 2824, Automatique , Automatique Japonaise Miyota 9015 et Ronda 715 Suisse.

 

 

Regardez de jour comme de nuit avec le puissant Luminume C3 Super Luminova sur le cadran.

 

Spécifications


 

 Boîtier : 42 mm

 Entrecornes : 22 mm

 Taille du cadran : 48 mm

 Épaisseur : 13.1 mm avec  crystal

 Couronne :  8 mm

 Ouverture du cadran : 36 mm

 Matériau du boîtier : Stainless Steel Polishe

 Verre : Verre saphir bombé résistant aux rayures avec revêtement anti-reflets / les modèles à quartz seront dotés d'un verre saphir plat 

 Boîtier arrière : Acier inoxydable vissé / dos de l'écran 

 Lume: Super Luminova C3

 Bracelets : Cuir italien le plus fin / style de course perforé / ajustement confortable 

 Résistance à l'eau : 100 Meters / 10 BAR

 Mouvement : Swiss ETA 2824 Automatique  / Japon Miyota 9015 Automatique  / Swiss Ronda 715 Quartz

 


 

Les montres Distinct 3 sont construites avec des boîtiers en acier inoxydable poli de 42 mm qui abritent un mouvement suisse automatique ETA 2824,  ou japonais Miyota 9015, ou suisse Ronda 715 à quartz, et se connectent aux confortables et souples bracelets en cuir italien perforé de style course avec une boucle à ardillon en acier inoxydable via des attaches de type fil de fer.







La machinerie de haute performance utilisée par les fabricants partenaires permet de réaliser à la perfection de petits détails comme la couronne de style oignon avec notre logo ""F"" :

Le cadran à double couche avec bord effilé pousse encore plus loin l'audace et l'aspect sportif de ce design de montre.

Les mouvements

Chez Ferro &
column13:
Company, nous n'utilisons que des matériaux de la plus haute qualité pour nous assurer que toutes nos montres dépassent de loin les attentes de nos fans. Pour cette raison, nous avons décidé de choisir 3 grands mouvements pour ces montres : Le mouvement automatique suisse ETA 2824 le plus populaire au monde, , le mouvement automatique japonais Miyota 9015 et le mouvement à quartz suisse Ronda 715.

Calibre suisse ETA 2824​ Mouvement automatique

Le calibre ETA 2824 est l'un des mouvements les plus connus et les plus reconnus de l'industrie horlogère. Il dispose de 26 rubis avec 38 heures de réserve de marche. Le mouvement ETA 2824 gardera votre temps précis pendant très longtemps.

 

 

Calibre japon miyota 9015 Mouvement automatique

Le calibre Miyota 9015est un mouvement japonais automatique à 24 rubis qui a été introduit pour la première fois en 2009. Il s'agit d'un développement révolutionnaire du calibre 8015. Equipé d'un rotor à roulement à billes, d'un second arrêt et d'une date avec un circuit de changement rapide, ce mouvement fonctionne de manière très précise avec 28 800 demi-oscillations par heure. De plus, le mouvement est équipé d'un amortisseur, d'un inhibiteur d'ancrage suisse et d'un palan manuel. La réserve de marche est de 42 heures. Le mouvement est un chef-d'œuvre technique en raison de sa faible hauteur totale de seulement 3,9 mm.

Calibre suisse Ronda 715 Mouvement quartz

Le mouvement à quartz Ronda 715 a une très longue durée de vie de la pile (jusqu'à 10 ans) et est très connu pour sa précision et sa longévité.

 

 

L’inspiration

RAPIDE ET LÉGENDAIRE

La course épique d'une journée qui se déroule dans le petit hameau français du nord-ouest de la France est officiellement appelée 24 heures du Mans, mais le monde automobile l'appelle simplement ""Le Mans"". Ce sont les 24 heures les plus palpitantes du sport automobile.

 

Comment lire l'heure

La montre Distinct 3 est si intelligente qu'elle peut vous indiquer l'heure avec une seule aiguille!

Les montres à une main ont un style unique et sont de plus en plus populaires.

Le cadran des 12 heures est divisé par 144 index. Chaque marqueur représente 5 minutes.

La combinaison des marqueurs gras de 15, 30 et 45 minutes et de l'aiguille proéminente permet de lire l'heure facilement. En regardant la montre à une aiguille, vous pouvez lire l'heure avec un écart de +/- 2 à 5 minutes.

Vous trouverez ci-dessous quelques exemples :

Calendrier

Co. et que vous vous engagez à recevoir votre (vos) montre(s) unique(s) super géniale(s).

Risks and challenges

We have sourced and worked with a very reputable watch manufacturer in Hong Kong that is mainly focused on manufacturing luxurious quality watches. Our communications have always been smooth and fast as they have many professional technicians available. We have set the delivery time to August of 2020 to ensure that all backers will receive their watches on time as promised. This delivery date will enable us to overcome any problems that might occur during manufacturing or delivery. To ensure that every watch is created to standard and delivered in time, we will be maintaining constant contact with the factory during the entire process of production. No matter what, we will update our backers during the production.

","-For French translation please scroll about half way down.                    Introducing the long awaited Distinct 3 Vintage Racing Style Watch Series.We’ve always been inspired by the things, people and places we admire, so for our latest limited-edition pieces, we decided to travel back to the 1960’s era car races.From the sweet revving sound, to the exciting smell of petrol and burnt tires, to Le Man 24 hour race, where bold and fearless drivers race the unbelievably fast cars. This is where, everywhere is quite except you hear the extremely loud engines and your own heartbeat. Hands sweating, teeth grinding, eyes wide open and heads turning for 24 hours. A great watch is not just about a good design and movement. Precision machining, great finishing and quality materials are also what make a watch high quality and beautiful.High polished case, double domed sapphire crystal, decorated quality movement, 3D dial and the super comfortable Italian leather perforated racing style straps make the Distinct 3 watches ""Distinct"". The name says it all.  Distinct 3 Grand Prix Ferro & Company We have spent the past 18 months designing the Distinct 3 watches, inspired by the most aggressive car races in history, where unbelievably fast cars and bold drivers race for 24 hours none-stop to push their limits fearlessly.  As years went by, we have listened to our fans requests. They have been asking about introducing a Distinct watch model with a smaller case with an upgraded movements and a sleeker design. So, we got to our drawing board in late 2018 and came up with the new Distinct 3 models.   All Distinct 3 pre-ordered from are backed by a whopping 5 Year International Warranty! How cool is that! Distinct 3 will be available in 3 styles (GLF Series / Grand Prix Series / Petrol Series) and 3 different movements (Swiss ETA 2824 Automatic,  Miyota 9015 Japan Automatic and Swiss Ronda 715 Quartz). Each movement will be  limited to 1000 units.DISTINCT 3 MODEL  GLF LE MANS Available in Swiss Automatic ETA 2824 Automatic,  Miyota 9015 Japan Automatic and Swiss Ronda 715 Quartz).   DISTINCT 3 MODEL Grand PrixAvailable in Swiss Automatic ETA 2824 Automatic,  Miyota 9015 Japan Automatic and Swiss Ronda 715 Quartz).   DISTINCT 3 MODEL PetrolAvailable in Swiss Automatic ETA 2824 Automatic,  Miyota 9015 Japan Automatic and Swiss Ronda 715 Quartz).   The dials of Quartz models are the same as the Automatic models. The only difference is that the word ""Automatic"" is not shown.  Look compelling day and night with Super Luminova powerful C3 lume on the dial.   Case: 42 mm Lugs: 22 mm Lug to lug: 48 mm Thickness: 13.1 mm including top crystal Crown: 8 mm / Screw in  Dial Opening: 36 mm Case Material: High Grade Stainless Steel Polished finish Crystal: Scratch Resistant Domed Sapphire Crystal with Anti-reflective Coating / Quartz models will be with Flat Sapphire Crystal Back Case: Screw Down Stainless Steel / display back  Lume: Super Luminova C3 Straps: Finest Italian Leather / perforated racing style / comfort fit Water Resistance: 100 Meters (10 BAR)Movement:  Automatic Swiss ETA 2824 Automatic,  Miyota 9015 Japan Automatic and Swiss Ronda 715 Quartz). Each movement will  / Automatic Japan Miyota 9015 with in-house decorations / Swiss Quartz Ronda 715Please note that if ETA movement is not available, Sellita SW200 will be used which is the exact same movement from a different Swiss company.  The Distinct 3 watches are constructed with polished 42 mm Stainless Steel Cases that house an Automatic Swiss ETA 2824,  Miyota 9015 Japan, or Swiss Ronda 715 Qaurtz  movements. The Distinct 3.0 series also come with comfortable and soft perforated racing style Italian leather straps with stainless steel pin buckle.   The double domed scratch resistant sapphire crystal (for automatic models) with double sided anti-reflecting coating protects the revamped Motorsports inspired dial and reduces the reflection for better time reading. Quartz models will come with flat sapphire crystal.  The high performance machinery that our partnering manufacturers use can make small details with perfection such as the onion style crown with our ""F"" logo:The dual layered dial with tapered edge pushes the boldness and sportiness look of this watch design further.Although these watches are designed for driving and casual wear, they are 100 meters water resistant. At Ferro & Company, we only use the highest-grade materials to make sure that all our watches far exceed our fans expectations. For this reason, we have decided to choose 3 great movements as below:Swiss ETA 2824 MovementThe ETA 2824  is one of the most well-known and most recognized movements in the watch industry. It has 26 jewels with 38 hours of power reserve.  ETA 2824 movement will keep your time  accurate for a very long time.  Miyota Caliber 9015 Japan Automatic Movement The Miyota caliber 9015 is a 24 jewel automatic Japan movement equipped with a ball bearing rotor, a second stop and a date with a quick-change circuit, this movement works very precisely with 28,800 half oscillations per hour. Furthermore, the movement has a shock absorber, a Swiss anchoring inhibitor and a manual hoist. The reserve is 42 hours.   Swiss Ronda 715 Quartz MovementRonda 715 quartz movement has a very long battery-life (up to 10 years) and is very well known for its accuracy and longevity.This is the back case of the Quartz models  FAST AND LEGENDARY The epic, day-long race that winds through the little French hamlet in Northwest France is officially called 24 Hours of Le Mans (24 Heures du Mans in French), but those in the motoring world simply refer to it as “Le Mans"". It has been called the most thrilling 24 hours in motor sports.  Le Mans has seen  speed records broken again and again (up to 405 k/ph), and plenty of unbelievably fast super cars. It has long been at the forefront of automotive pioneering and innovation issuing from major car companies, spurred on by a desire to beat their rivals out for the claim to the illustrious championship, and status as the most rugged, durable super car maker in the world. It is a deep, and rich history, full of innovation and brilliance, wild stories, sometimes catastrophic mishaps. To understand Le Mans is to understand the history of European – and eventually American – auto racing at large
column17: to see how the tides shifted, trends started, and how companies rose and fell from prominence like spokes on a wheel.  Distinct 3 watch is so smart that it can tell you the time with just one hand!One hand watches are very unique in style and are getting quite popular.The 12-hour dial is divided by 144 markers. Each marker represents 5 minutes.The combination of the bold 15, 30 and 45-minute markers and the prominent needle pointer make it easy to read time.  By looking at the single hand watch you can tell the time within +/- 2 to 5 minute discrepancy .Below are some examples:  It's easy to have customers but it is mighty hard to have FANS that spread their love. AS SEEN ON Ferro & Company is an independent direct to consumer, Canadian watch brand established by 2 brothers and watch aficionados in Vancouver, British Columbia. Since its inception in 2015, Ferro & Company has shipped thousands of high-quality watches to fans all over the world. Today the company consists of a dedicated team of watch loving professionals who strive to give its customers the best experience possible from start to finish.  November 2018: Design PhaseFeb-December 2019: Test Phase making sure watches are working prefectlyFeb 2020 : Kickstarter LiveMarch 2020: IndiegogoApril 2020 : Tooling phaseMay 2020: Manufacturing startsJuly 2020: Assembly and Quality ControlAugust 2020: Shipping and delivery to our backers As the final design / tech drawings , prototyping and testing phases have been successfully accomplished, we are finally confident and ready to manufacture the watches for our backers. We have the manufacturer and other part suppliers ready to make the watches with our green signal. All we need is your support. In order to bring Ferro & Company Distinct 3 watches to your wrists, we need to meet our factory's minimum order quantity requirement

We hope that you are as passionate as we are about Ferro & Co. watches and make your pledge in order to receive your super awesome unique watch(es).  FRENCH VERSIONPrésentation de la très attendue série de montres Distinct 3 Vintage Racing Style Nous avons toujours été inspirés par les choses, les gens et les lieux que nous admirons. Pour nos dernières pièces en édition limitée, nous avons donc décidé de remonter aux courses automobiles des années 1960.Du doux bruit de roulement, à l'odeur excitante de l'essence et des pneus brûlés, aux 24 heures du Man, où des pilotes audacieux et intrépides font la course de voitures incroyablement rapides. C'est là que, partout, tout est calme, sauf que vous entendez les moteurs extrêmement bruyants et les battements de votre propre cœur. Les mains suent, les dents grincent, les yeux sont grands ouverts et la tête tourne pendant 24 heures. Une grande montre n'est pas seulement une bonne conception et un bon mouvement. Un usinage de précision, une finition de qualité et des matériaux de qualité sont aussi ce qui fait qu'une montre est belle et de grande qualité.Le boîtier poli, le verre saphir à double bombé, le mouvement de qualité décoré, le cadran 3D et les bracelets super confortables en cuir italien perforé de style course font des montres Distinct 3 des montres ""Distinct"". Le nom dit tout. Des objectifs ambitieuxLes gratuités sont géniales, tout comme nos Objectifs! Parce qu'ils sont des cadeaux gratuits pour tous les supporters lorsque nous atteignons le montant de chaque objectif.Ajoutez du peps à votre montre lorsque nous atteignons notre premier Objectif.Une fois le second objectif atteint, nous publierons la troisième! Cela signifie plus de gratuités de notre part. Tout ce que vous avez à faire, c'est de nous aider à y parvenir en partageant ce projet avec vos amis et votre famille. Il vous suffit de cliquer sur l'un des boutons ci-dessous. GarantieTous les produits Distinct 3 pré-commandés par Kickstarter sont couverts par une garantie internationale de 5 ans ! C’est cool, non ?!Options modèlesDistinct 3 sera disponible en 3 styles (GLF Series / Grand Prix Series / PetrolSeries) et 3 mouvements différents (Automatique Suisse ETA 2824, Miyota 9015 Automatique Japonaise et Ronda 715 Quartz Suisse). POLYGIENE Technology : Antimicrobial Silver salt treatment. Polygiene treated textiles do not need to be washed as often, which saves water, energy, time and money as well as improve the lifespan of a product. With Polygiene you can wear more, wash less and be climate smart!

column1: This slim fit organic cotton T is so comfortable Natalie (our model, and resident baker of cakes) immediately ordered two for herself and Saul (our model, and wheel-builder) didn't want to take it off.

It is a 185 gsm in a very high quality knit, with all the details a premium t shirt should have: matching rib collar on a v neck, taped back neck and shoulder seams, bartacked overlocking on the sleeves and hem for durability.
<ul>
<li>
Natalie is the perfect Medium according to our fit chart, and a Medium is the size she is modelling.
<li>
Saul would generally be a Medium but he preferred the Large, which looks great and feels great too.
Check out the fitting guide ..if you like a looser fit, just go up a size from what you normally wear.

column1: The Nzo Lightweight Neck Gaiter is blocking harmful UV rays to protect your skin. With an ergonomic design for the outdoors, this lightweight shield keeps your skin safe in the blistering sun or cold weather.
PERFECT FIT FOR USE WITH YOUR FAVORITE SPORTS: No matter who you are or what your hobby is, this Nzo Lightweight gaiter tube is a perfect design for adventures for a bargain price!

UV SUN PROTECTION FOR EXTENDED WEAR: The Nzo Lightweight Gaiter is blocking harmful UV rays to protect your skin. With an ergonomic design for the outdoors, this lightweight shield keeps your skin safe in the blistering sun or cold weather.
MOISTURE WICKING, QUICK DRYING: The super elastic fabric has moisture wicking technology to keep you dry. You’ll stay warm in colder weather, resistant to the elements, always at prime performance.

LIGHTWEIGHT AND DURABLE: The convenient stretch fabric fits comfortably, like a second skin – it is the perfect addition to your outdoor gear for running, hiking, cycling, yoga, walking, snowboarding, cross-country skiing, sailing, fishing and so much more!
* DUSTERS
* BUNDLES
<div style=""text-align: center
NZO dusters will be packed using the Hydropol® patent, providing a sustainable solution to plastic end of life.

The bag is super resistant, marine safe and biodegradable. Hydropol® is a clear and flexible food-grade plastic that dissolves completely in hot water. Once dissolved, Hydropol® biodegrades to a benign biomass, carbon dioxide and water, and can be safely flushed away with wastewater.
We are proud to partner with Aquapak in providing a more sustainable outlook for the textile and e-commerce industries.
<div>
<div>
Original authentic design for trail fanatics
Nzo has been based in Rotorua, making things for mountain bikers, since 1998. Our big idea when we started was if we make stuff that we like, we were pretty sure some other people would like it too.

21 years down the trail we still have that same idea, and we are still designing things in Rotorua that find a home with trail fanatics all over the world. Every Nzo product we sell is designed by us and tested individually by the people who own the company.
We’ve had incredible experiences bike-packing in every kind of landscape. We have been mountain biking since the sport got started.
We love being outdoor and we love having the right gear. Our mission is to design timeless and functional gear.
We take the lessons learned from decades of making stuff for mountain bikers and apply them to the perfect pair of pants for anybody heading outdoors.

Gaz Sullivan (Founder) learned to ride a bicycle at age 5, and started racing bikes at 14. He represented his club, his region, and his country, before switching his attention to a career in graphic design. He got into mountain biking as soon as it was invented, and has been involved in the sport ever since.
Glen Anderson (Founder) used a bike for transport while she developed a career in the design and manufacturing of apparel.
When we started thinking about the right kit for mountain biking the sport had yet to define itself - there was literally
Olivier Courret (Partner &
column2: Director)is up most mornings at 4.30 to live a triathlete life. Olivier has spent 20 years working in the sports industry - designing, innovating, procuring, and manufacturing performance and technical sportswear for brands in Asia and France.

column1: Simon Tsang, our Marketing Guy who has a passion for crafting the hoppiest ale to canyon carving on a sunny day joins the team with his Marketing background. Helping NZO launch our first Kickstarter and driving the campaign forward. His valuable input
brings us confidence in smashing our first Kickstarter!

Suzanne Lim our pilot during the whole Kickstarter project. She is a freediver athlete who has her own freediving company in Asia. During the product development, pre-campaign, campaign and post campaign, she coordinates and organises the workflow
Kenneth Lam - Brought our NZO dusters to life with amazing campaign visuals. From concept to creation, videography to photography, he can do everything. Except hiking, but for us, he did that too.
<h3>Risks &amp

We have been designing gears for mountain bikers, since 1998. With our team, we launched our line of durable outdoor wears in New Zealand, our hometown. Since then, we gain an extensive experience in manufacturing high-quality durable apparel as well as fulfilling lots of orders worldwide. 
We produced, modified, revised quite a few samples of the Duster pants until we feel like we have the best possible product we can offer. 
We have already queued our manufacturers and booked the fabric to ensure production as soon as we are funded. 
Our fulfilment platform is already operational and has been tested to ensure smooth and traceable delivery process. 
But sometimes things happen and as much as we are prepared, some issues are just unavoidable like fabric delays due to yarn being stuck in customs. 
We add time buffer for these events, but sometimes it's not enough. 
Be reassure that we are deeply committed to and excited about delivering, on time, a high-quality product that we know you'll enjoy for a long time to come.
Thank you for your support!

POLYGIENE Technology : Antimicrobial Silver salt treatment. Polygiene treated textiles do not need to be washed as often, which saves water, energy, time and money as well as improve the lifespan of a product. With Polygiene you can wear more, wash less and be climate smart!

This slim fit organic cotton T is so comfortable Natalie (our model, and resident baker of cakes) immediately ordered two for herself and Saul (our model, and wheel-builder) didn't want to take it off.

It is a 185 gsm in a very high quality knit, with all the details a premium t shirt should have: matching rib collar on a v neck, taped back neck and shoulder seams, bartacked overlocking on the sleeves and hem for durability.
Natalie is the perfect Medium according to our fit chart, and a Medium is the size she is modelling.
Saul would generally be a Medium but he preferred the Large, which looks great and feels great too.
Check out the fitting guide ..if you like a looser fit, just go up a size from what you normally wear.
Jeremy (our model here) is wearing a Size Medium Cotton T and Medium - Tall Dusters (Numbers are in cm)

The Nzo Lightweight Neck Gaiter is blocking harmful UV rays to protect your skin. With an ergonomic design for the outdoors, this lightweight shield keeps your skin safe in the blistering sun or cold weather.
PERFECT FIT FOR USE WITH YOUR FAVORITE SPORTS: No matter who you are or what your hobby is, this Nzo Lightweight gaiter tube is a perfect design for adventures for a bargain price!

UV SUN PROTECTION FOR EXTENDED WEAR: The Nzo Lightweight Gaiter is blocking harmful UV rays to protect your skin. With an ergonomic design for the outdoors, this lightweight shield keeps your skin safe in the blistering sun or cold weather.
MOISTURE WICKING, QUICK DRYING: The super elastic fabric has moisture wicking technology to keep you dry. You’ll stay warm in colder weather, resistant to the elements, always at prime performance.

LIGHTWEIGHT AND DURABLE: The convenient stretch fabric fits comfortably, like a second skin – it is the perfect addition to your outdoor gear for running, hiking, cycling, yoga, walking, snowboarding, cross-country skiing, sailing, fishing and so much more!
* DUSTERS
* BUNDLES
NZO dusters will be packed using the Hydropol® patent, providing a sustainable solution to plastic end of life.

The bag is super resistant, marine safe and biodegradable. Hydropol® is a clear and flexible food-grade plastic that dissolves completely in hot water. Once dissolved, Hydropol® biodegrades to a benign biomass, carbon dioxide and water, and can be safely flushed away with wastewater.
We are proud to partner with Aquapak in providing a more sustainable outlook for the textile and e-commerce industries.
Original authentic design for trail fanatics
Nzo has been based in Rotorua, making things for mountain bikers, since 1998. Our big idea when we started was if we make stuff that we like, we were pretty sure some other people would like it too.

21 years down the trail we still have that same idea, and we are still designing things in Rotorua that find a home with trail fanatics all over the world. Every Nzo product we sell is designed by us and tested individually by the people who own the company.
We’ve had incredible experiences bike-packing in every kind of landscape. We have been mountain biking since the sport got started.
We love being outdoor and we love having the right gear. Our mission is to design timeless and functional gear.
We take the lessons learned from decades of making stuff for mountain bikers and apply them to the perfect pair of pants for anybody heading outdoors.

Gaz Sullivan (Founder) learned to ride a bicycle at age 5, and started racing bikes at 14. He represented his club, his region, and his country, before switching his attention to a career in graphic design. He got into mountain biking as soon as it was invented, and has been involved in the sport ever since.
Glen Anderson (Founder) used a bike for transport while she developed a career in the design and manufacturing of apparel.
When we started thinking about the right kit for mountain biking the sport had yet to define itself - there was literally

Olivier Courret (Partner & Director)is up most mornings at 4.30 to live a triathlete life. Olivier has spent 20 years working in the sports industry - designing, innovating, procuring, and manufacturing performance and technical sportswear for brands in Asia and France.

Simon Tsang, our Marketing Guy who has a passion for crafting the hoppiest ale to canyon carving on a sunny day joins the team with his Marketing background. Helping NZO launch our first Kickstarter and driving the campaign forward. His valuable input
brings us confidence in smashing our first Kickstarter!

Suzanne Lim our pilot during the whole Kickstarter project. She is a freediver athlete who has her own freediving company in Asia. During the product development, pre-campaign, campaign and post campaign, she coordinates and organises the workflow
Kenneth Lam - Brought our NZO dusters to life with amazing campaign visuals. From concept to creation, videography to photography, he can do everything. Except hiking, but for us, he did that too.
Risks & Challenges

We have been designing gears for mountain bikers, since 1998. With our team, we launched our line of durable outdoor wears in New Zealand, our hometown. Since then, we gain an extensive experience in manufacturing high-quality durable apparel as well as fulfilling lots of orders worldwide. We produced, modified, revised quite a few samples of the Duster pants until we feel like we have the best possible product we can offer. We have already queued our manufacturers and booked the fabric to ensure production as soon as we are funded. Our fulfilment platform is already operational and has been tested to ensure smooth and traceable delivery process. But sometimes things happen and as much as we are prepared, some issues are just unavoidable like fabric delays due to yarn being stuck in customs. We add time buffer for these events, but sometimes it's not enough. Be reassure that we are deeply committed to and excited about delivering, on time, a high-quality product that we know you'll enjoy for a long time to come.
Thank you for your support!",53.0,1,"1 Campaign

NAKED TREE | WALLET | CARDHOLDER

Our NAKED TREE WALLETS AND CARDHOLDER are made out of premium cork fabric, which is 100% vegan, sustainable and eco friendly. Our production is based in Austria, our mission is to provide an incredible product for making our world a little bit better. For this reason we plant worldwide one tree for every sold wallet. Join now our community for making the world green again.
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
The minimalistic design offers all functions you need:
<ul>
• holds even your big notes
• features a coin pocket
• four card slots for up to 12 cards
• micro SD card holder
• quick card access slot
• 100% vegan
• made in Austria
MEASUREMENTS
MATERIAL
The NAKED TREE WALLETS and CARDHOLDER are made out of premium cork fabric which is collected from Portuguese cork oaks, some of them are over 100 years old.
<ul>
• durable
• eco friendly
• water resistant
• smooth and soft
• 100% vegan
• 100% tree friendly
• sustainable
COLOURS
We've created the NAKED TREE WALLET and CARDHOLDER in five beautiful colours to satisfy every taste. Due to the natural cork fabric every wallet is unique and shows an aesthetic character.
SOCIAL MISSION PARTNER

We’re happy to announce that we’ve partnered with One Tree Planted to plant trees! One Tree Planted is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit dedicated to global reforestation. They plant trees to restore nature and biodiversity. They also raise awareness about the importance of trees, offer businesses like ours a simple sustainability solution, and motivate younger generations to do something positive for the environment.
FOR EVERY PRODUCT SOLD WE PLANT ONE TREE!

column2:
>

After two years of research, development, and testing, we are finally ready to present our most versatile shirt yet: the Limitless Merino Wool Shirt - the world's first knit Merino wool button-down shirt.
column3:
>

A highly functional shirt for travel, outdoors, and every day that can be worn more and washed less. It's cut lean, tailored, and ready to move. The magic is in our unique blended Australian Merino wool knit fabric, which allows this shirt to keep up with your active life.

The Limitless Merino Wool Shirt is odor resistant, moisture wicking, temperature regulating, wrinkle resistant, and stretches in every direction to move with your body. It is truly the one shirt you can wear day-in and day-out, no matter the weather, occasion, or location.

Meticulously crafted from the yarn up to combine high performance with t-shirt comfort, this innovative shirt replaces at least three shirts in your bag. Whether you dress it up or dress it down, the Limitless Merino Wool Shirt is the perfect shirt for travel, work, outdoors, and every day.

The Button-Down Shirt, Elevated.
column7:
>

Step 1: Back this project now: Click ‘Back It’ at the top of the page to pre-order the shirt

Step 2: Select your reward level: Enjoy Indigogo-exclusive discounts. You will choose colors and sizes after the project ends. Don’t worry about that now.

 

Please note, you can select additional shirts and add-on products after the campaign is over. For now, back the reward that represents what you will select after the campaign. Don’t worry if you get this wrong, we can help you after the campaign.

column3:
>

What makes the Limitless Merino Wool Shirt so revolutionary?
column4:
>

Most trips require multiple shirts for various purposes. The Limitless Merino Wool Shirt replaces three or more shirts in your bag. It’s built to stay fresh for days, move with you, pack small, and look clean, allowing you to do more with less. Ditch the big suitcase - do more and see more.
column5:
>

Being active in a traditional button-down means being hot and sweaty. It simply can’t keep up. The Limitless Merino Wool Shirt naturally resists stains, has UPF of 40+, is incredibly breathable, and stretches with your body in every direction. Finally, a shirt that can keep up with you.
column6:
>

Traditional button-downs are restricting, stiff, and scratchy. The Limitless Merino Wool Shirt stretches to allow full range of motion, is softer than a t-shirt, and will keep you dry and comfortable. The secret is in the Merino wool and polyester blend, leveraging each material’s best traits to create the most comfortable button-down shirt you’ll ever wear.

column2:
>

When we set out to build a shirt as dynamic as your daily life, we knew we had to start with the fabric. Merino wool is quite simply the best natural performance fiber available. So, we partnered with the The Woolmark Company, utilizing the latest technology to build the ultimate performance Merino wool blend shirt fabric. Our unique knit fabric blends 53% Australian Merino wool and 47% polyester to create a fabric that is soft, machine washable, odor and wrinkle resistant, temperature regulating, and moves with your body. The ultimate performance fabric for any activity.
column3:
>

The performance of the Merino wool comes from the fleece of the Merino sheep. The wool fiber adapts to perform and keep the sheep both comfortable and protected from the elements over a wide range of temperatures, from 5 to 90 degrees Fahrenheit. The fiber's unique crimped structure insulates in winter and breathes in summer, allowing the sheep to comfortably live in extreme weather variations while protecting them from the elements. Additionally, the unique chemical structure of the wool fiber enables it to absorb and lock away odors. We specifically used Merino wool because it is the finest of the wool varieties, making it exceptionally soft and lightweight.
column4:
>

 This special fiber is blended with polyester and constructed into a unique engineered knit fabric to enhance its performance and give you ultimate range of movement and style. The engineered knit creates a honeycomb structure, which provides a nice texture to the fabric while lifting it off the skin, further enhancing the temperature regulation of the wool. Its construction provides extensive 4-way stretch to move with your body.
column5: >
column9: >

column7:
>

 

STRETCH GOAL #2 REACHED!

Thanks to your overwhelming support we’ve quickly reached our second stretch goal of $200,000. We are now able to offer the The Limitless Merino Wool Shirt and The Limitless Merino Wool Polo in TWO classic colors of your choosing.  Thanks casting you color votes, sharing and helping make The Limitless Merino Wool Shirt a reality! 

Stretch goal three is a new color. Help us unlock the new color for additional reward options.
column15:
>

Designed and sized for a flattering and slimming, yet comfortable fit. Please refer to the size chart for specific garment measurements by size.

Active Fit: Flattering tailored fit neither slim nor relaxed. Active fitting technical garments may be worn alone or over base layers.
column18:
>

 **Size chart refers to garment NOT body measurements.
column25:
>

Merino wool naturally resists odors and stains, and therefore, it can and should be washed less frequently. 

Machine wash cold with like colors using a mild wool detergent (Kookaburra). Lay flat to dry (recommended). The Limitless Merino Wool Shirt can be tumble dried gentle on low heat. Do not use bleach. Do not dry clean.
column29:
>

We are committed to responsibly sourcing animal products from suppliers/farmers committed to animal health and welfare. We continually monitor responsible practices, understanding these are dynamic and continue to improve over time. We work closely with experts in this area to guide our decisions to ensure the products we produce meet our standards and our customers’ expectations.

The Limitless Merino Wool Shirt has been rigorously tested and awarded with a Woolmark certification to ensure the highest quality product.
column31:
>

 We work with a vertically integrated manufacturer that provides a totally transparent and ethical supply chain from yarn to finished shirt. They have decades of experience working with wool at the highest standards including Worldwide Responsible Accredited Production (WRAP) and Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS) standards.

column4:
>

Western Rise was founded on a desire to make multi-functional clothing that looks amazing and performs even better. We were overwhelmed by the amount of stuff in the world and wanted to simplify our lives and focus on the things that actually matter. Stylish and versatile performance clothing allows you to do more with less, meaning you can ditch the big suitcase, travel light, do more and see more. 

It took a lot of people to bring this project to you and we couldn’t be more excited!
column5:
>

We truly believe that it is not only our responsibility, but also our obligation to protect the world we are a part of and get to enjoy. Because of this, we are proud 1% For The Planet members and donate 1% of our gross revenue to a group of certified nonprofits. Western Rise has also committed to being carbon neutral by 2020.
column7:
>

The Woolmark Company is the global authority on wool. Through their extensive network of relationships spanning the international textile and fashion industries, they highlight Australian Merino wool’s position as the ultimate natural fiber and premier ingredient in luxury apparel. The Woolmark logos provide assurance of the highest quality and represents pioneering excellence and innovation from the farm to the finished product.
column8:
>

We can't say it enough. Thank you for supporting us and helping us bring the next generation of apparel to life.
column10: >
column11: >
column12: >
column14: >
column15: >
column16: >
column17:
>

 

WHY KICKSTARTER

We are committed to building the next generation of apparel. What better way to launch than to share our project with you first. We wouldn’t be here without the loyal support of our customers. It is your support, feedback, and encouragement that have brought us to this point. It has been a long journey to get here and we are excited to get started on the next phase together.

column2: >We are proud to announce the pre-launch of our newest functional fashion product “SOLZbag”, a solar powered backpack that functions as a personal portable power station. The bag is designed with three 1.5-watt solar panels that will give a total of 4.5 watt charge to a removable lithium-ion battery
column3: the battery is versatile and also can be charged by a computer or any power source available. Once the battery is charged, it can be connected to almost any small personal electronic device using a variety of power adaptors that come with it. The bag also includes a front pocket, specially designed to hold a pair of SOLZshoes. The bag contains a dedicated padded laptop or tablet sleeve and an additional sunglass and accessory pocket.

column1: <span style=""font-size: 14px
column4: >This bag is perfect for days on the beach, picnics, hikes
column7: >, or even just running around town.  We all know how frustrating it is to have your smartphone or tablet run out of battery life.  With SOLZbag, this never has to happen again.

column2: >The battery is removable and can be used without the backpack as well.  This itself is a very useful and handy little lifesaver.  You can even shake it to see how much power you have left!

>We have spent our own money designing and developing this product.  We have our manufacturing ready and just need to raise $7500 to meet our initial minimum order quantity.  Join this campaign and help us bring this amazing product to market.

>SOLZ also has a soul.  We have partnered with Nashville-based charity Soles4Souls to distribute shoes to people in need. We have made it possible so that for every SOLZ bag or pair of SOLZ shoes purchased, we can get a pair of shoes to people in need.
>4.5 Watts of Solar Power: 1 hour in sun = 3-4 hours talk time.
>Battery: Up to 20+ hours talk time or 50+ hours music playback.

column1: SOLZ bag will help you stay organized, stay active, stay green and stay charged…

While the first prototype was made to match our flagship white shoes (below), we also are now offering them in black and gunmetal grey with red accents to match our other popular shoe styles.  You can see the color schemes and pics here:  http://www.solzshoes.com/collections/frontpage

From the team that brought you SOLZ shoes.

We are proud to announce the pre-launch of our newest functional fashion product “SOLZbag”, a solar powered backpack that functions as a personal portable power station. The bag is designed with three 1.5-watt solar panels that will give a total of 4.5 watt charge to a removable lithium-ion battery
column2: the battery is versatile and also can be charged by a computer or any power source available. Once the battery is charged, it can be connected to almost any small personal electronic device using a variety of power adaptors that come with it. The bag also includes a front pocket, specially designed to hold a pair of SOLZshoes. The bag contains a dedicated padded laptop or tablet sleeve and an additional sunglass and accessory pocket.

column1: This bag is perfect for days on the beach, picnics, hikes, or even just running around town.  We all know how frustrating it is to have your smartphone or tablet run out of battery life.  With SOLZbag, this never has to happen again.
The battery is removable and can be used without the backpack as well.  This itself is a very useful and handy little lifesaver.  You can even shake it to see how much power you have left!

We have spent our own money designing and developing this product.  We have our manufacturing ready and just need to raise $7500 to meet our initial minimum order quantity.  Join this campaign and help us bring this amazing product to market.

SOLZ also has a soul.  We have partnered with Nashville-based charity Soles4Souls to distribute shoes to people in need. We have made it possible so that for every SOLZ bag or pair of SOLZ shoes purchased, we can get a pair of shoes to people in need.
4.5 Watts of Solar Power: 1 hour in sun = 3-4 hours talk time.
Battery: Up to 20+ hours talk time or 50+ hours music playback.
SOLZ bag will help you stay organized, stay active, stay green and stay charged…

While the first prototype was made to match our flagship white shoes (below), we also are now offering them in black and gunmetal grey with red accents to match our other popular shoe styles.  You can see the color schemes and pics here:  http://www.solzshoes.com/collections/frontpage

column4: Design to create a one-of-a-kind American Apparel T-shirt, Mobile Case, Stretched Canvas, Baby Onesie + more!

For thousands of years, we've shared and sold custom-built products with each other. Then came the Industrial Revolution. For all its commercial benefits, it also brought lifeless homogenization. The individual's voice was snuffed out! We want to bring back that voice and put the 'custom' back into 'customer,' enabling the once-passive consumer to engage in the utterly human act of creativity. No more zombie shopping..
Everything is now Remixable & One-of-a-kind!

JuicyCanvas takes an artist's ""finished"" artwork and automagically unlocks it for further personalization and experimentation. With just a few simple clicks, you can change colors and artwork can be rotated, resized and repositioned to create your personalized REMIXED work. (No artists harmed in the making of JuicyCanvas)
Our collection only includes works from artists who have signed on to our bold vision of customizable art. By allowing us to use their work they'll get:
Greater name recognition from the public at large.
Royalties each time their art is remixed and purchased by one of our customers.
After working on this part-time for over 1 year, we've built a solid prototype: JuicyCanvas.com
Curated over 200 global artists & designers!
Got Buzz:
Rolled out our first customizable product: Stretched Canvases.
Featured in a recent PBS documentary!
+ Complete our Curator / Remixer Platform
Imagine a place where you can create your own gallery of art remixes and curations. Imagine then being able to share them with friends and earn credits if any of your friends buys your remix.
Click again to follow other remixers while others follow you.

Get feedback on your remixes from the original artists and your followers.  Click again and see how they perform on other social networks. Got a Brand or Band?! Let's collaborate on a remixer competition for your customers and fans.
+ Offer More   Customizable Lifestyle Gear

We want to expand our line to include American Apparel Gear, Tote Bags, Hoodies, Throw Pillows, Baby Onesies, and much more. This project will help us raise funds to debut some of these new items (available as our Rewards).
+ Improve    User Experience & Remixer Tools

Everyone from a 7-->107 yrs-old should be able to rock out with our design tools. In just a few seconds, you can make the most kick-ass, personalized art and gear, while grinning ear-to-ear and doing back-flips in between sessions!

Your support will show confidence in our ""me-commerce"" vision. It will strike a blow against boring, one-size fits-all consumerism. It will also give us the means to grow our business with full-time focus to better serve you and your peeps.
Expand our product line even more.
We're talking Prisms, Stationery Cards, Sandals!
Build our mobile app & offer a wider range of styles including photography.

Besides trying to reach our financial goals, we are also always looking for talented artists and designers - if you know of any who would benefit from our juicyness, have them send their portfolio to artists at juicycanvas.com. We could really use some help sharing this juicy project with the world.
Sharing our campaign link with your social networks would be a truly awesome gesture! You can use the sharing buttons under our video at the top of this page.
Risks and challenges
We hope to keep the risks and challenges to YOU as a backer as low as possible.
We're not new to this game. We have experience creating two previous startups and have been successfully running our own successful web dev & design studio since 2006.
We've already tested the quality of the products and printing with our various vendors in the USA and have a great working relationship with them.

We can confidently guarantee that your remixes will be shipped soon after our project is backed. For customers in the USA, we averaged a 7-day delivery time in our test runs, and we know that we can easily deliver your juicy reward with the price tiers we have offered.
Our select artists are excited to collaborate with you in the reward levels that we have offered!  They have assured us that they will deliver as guaranteed.
Got questions? We would love to help!
support@juicycanvas.com",47.0,0,"1 Campaign

AdhEAR™ was born of many, many nights of Dancing, Singing, Spinning &
Over the years, I’ve spent an excessive amount of time searching for the perfect pair of earrings to make me look the way I feel inside – Hip &
column2: Cool.  Unfortunately, my love of Dangly Earrings has stretched my earlobes to the point where I’ve lost one too many of my favorite baubles.  I decided that I’m just not going to take it anymore!

column1: So I decided that I was going to find a way to continue enjoying my favorite activities  (Dancing, Spinning, Singing, Throwing the Dice, and General Merriment) without losing any more jewels.  Luckily, one night over Dirty Martini’s I had an epiphany – I wish there was a product that would allow you to temporarily glue your earrings in place!
As like many inventors, I said, well I could do this!

As many women have experienced over time, your earlobes stretch making the hole for your pierced a tad too large.  Years of wearing large or heavy earrings has certainly exacerbated my stretched-out earlobes.

I don’t like those teeny tiny plugs or the plastic tape that is available.  I can never seem to find the clear plug after I have dropped it.  And too many times the plastic tape thingy has slipped down and looks reminiscent of that scene from “Something About Mary”…..
Fortunately I found an amazing Chemist who didn’t think I was crazy.

AdhEAR™ is a cosmetic contact adhesive that you use after once putting on your earring.  Once you put on your earring, you apply the product to your over-extended earring hole and it secures your earring in place.  AdhEAR™ dries clear - no one will ever know.  A gentle remover is included to comfortably remove the glue once your evening is through.
Also can be used on torn lobes.

PS: I cannot promise you will never, ever lose an earring.....but, when applied properly, it will certainly deter loss.

Thank you all!!

Laura Spaulding
info@adh-ear.com
860 944 0717 phone
973 200 2591 fax
490 North Main Street
Suffield, CT 06078
