Hi!
My name is Breck and I am a freelance photographer and Khmer interpreter. It's a bit of a long story how I ended up here, but I'll spare you the details.
Anyway. Can you go grab your phone right now? Yes, I'm talking to you. Go ahead.
Are we set? Great! Now go ahead and open your photo app.
How many photos do you have in there? 100? 200? 1,000??
Photos. So many photos.

They are everywhere today. It's estimated that over 1.4 billion photos are taken everyday with mobile devices, and about half of those end up on social networks. With such big numbers, it's easy to take a simple image for granted.

For every great meme, food shot and profile pic you see online, there is someone who does not have the resources to capture just one small moment in their life. Imagine living in circumstances where you don’t have any photos. No photos of loved ones, living or deceased. No photos of your family and the people you care about. It's hard to imagine, but across the world there are many families that don't have the means for something that has almost become disposable in most modern societies.
This is where I, with your help, hope to make a small change!

I'm planning a trip to Cambodia to visit some of these communities off the grid, and creating quality 8x10 portraits of these beautiful families for the first time. I will have portable printers on hand to print for them on site and give away. With your help, we can give these families a priceless gift they otherwise may have never had the opportunity to enjoy.

While my flight and camera gear are being covered out of pocket, I do need funds for printing equipment, portable power, transportation and a local guide/assistant for the project. The remaining funds will be used for the production costs for the awards to our awesome backers, and possibly future family portrait projects around the world. I will be able to visit at least 3 locations with my budgeted goal. If we only make it halfway, 2 locations. And if we go over, I will go to as many locations as the budget allows!
Here is a breakdown of expenses:

In December of 2011, I had the privilege of doing a help-portrait photoshoot with a couple of co-workers at Lowell Elder Care, which is a non-profit for Elderly Cambodians in Lowell, MA. We took so many great photos, and the Elders absolutely loved it! You can take a look at the gallery here: www.brecksargent.com/hp2011

Fast forward to December 2012. I was approached by the Director of Lowell Elder Care at one of the local parties in Lowell and he informed me that one of the Elders we photographed passed away. He later went on to tell me that the family used the 8x10 photo we took at our shoot the previous year. At his funeral. They were extremely grateful for the photo they didn't have, and never really thought about wanting until his funeral. It's stories like this that get me really excited about the power of photography, despite how often we are inundated with new media every day.
Thank you for visting! If you have any questions or suggestions please let me know.
-Breck

Special thanks to illustrator Matt Mangus for the animated video!

My Story: I love outdoor sports, concerts, dining... everything is better outdoors! My love of being outdoors (and not protecting myself from the sun) caught up with me. I now get checked for and sometimes treated for skin cancer every 6 months. I am very fortunate, I have only had to deal with basal cell carcinoma. It can be easily treated by surgically removing the affected skin
column2:
other skin cancers are more dangerous.

About my campaign: I want to see people protect themselves from the sun before they get skin cancer. We don't have to give up enjoying the outdoors
column3:
we just need to be smart about it.

Why SunFlap: If more people opt for better sun protection more often because they can wear their favorite ball cap, maybe we can reduce the number of skin cancer diagnosis. Even a 10% reduction in skin cancer diagnosis would mean 280,000 fewer skin cancers each year in the U.S. alone!


The ""original prototypes"", royal blue, white, Vegas Gold, black, charcoal gray &
column4:
red

The colors and design possibilities are endless... 

 

Your Support: All funds raised will go to pay for the production, packaging, and shipping of the initial minimum order of SunFlaps. 

Prevent Skin Cancer: Most basal cell carcinomas (the most common form of skin cancer) and squamous cell carcinomas (the second most common form of skin cancer) are caused by excessive and or continued exposure to UV rays. It is important to limit your exposure to UV rays. SunFlap is made of 50+ UPF fabric which means it blocks 98% of UV rays from reaching your skin.

My generation grew up relatively ignorant about the dangers of excessive sun exposure. Younger people are more aware of the dangers but don't necessarily make good choices. (I know that I didn't.) It is my hope that SunFlap will become popular with young people because they can wear their ball caps, mix and match colors with SunFlaps, and give their caps different looks. If that happens, we might reduce the occurance of skin cancers in an entire generation. That is my dream.

Please tell your friends about SunFlap: The odds are pretty good that you know someone who has been diagnosed with skin cancer.

TidyCup is a patented one-time use product designed for women to collect a mid- stream sample in a neat and sanitary manner. It's unique pull-tab  takes the guess work and messiness out of specimen collection while also decreasing the likeliness of contamination!

We are independent inventors with a product that we feel has the potential to become the industry standard for the way that women collect mid-stream urine samples. We are a two-person team with over 30 years in the Healthcare and Management Fields.

We are past he patent and prototype stage and are now campaigning to raise funds to start 4 pilot programs. The funds will be used to hire a Pilot Program Manager, manufacture TidyCups, and print the necessary literature. With your help, we will be able to take this last step before we begin to manufacture full scale!

Such a thrilling new undertaking, dolls! I have been wanting to help clothe you all since I was a flower child on the Sunset Strip dancing the night away with glorious rock gods! The Groupie Couture website has launched and we're ready to take flight!!
Visit our groovy little place on the web at http://www.groupiecouture.com !

This campaign ... our little Indiegogo ... means so much to my partner, Roni, and me because we want everyone to be part of our loving, sweet family!!  And in doing so, you'll be with us as we take Groupie Couture to the next spectacular level ... and it's so fun because all we want to do is offer divine duds for all our dolls!
And you'll be able to feel really good about giving (besides the fab Perks you'll be receiving) because a portion of our proceeds will benefit the Gram Parsons foundation
column2:
music-related charity, that supports our darling musicians and artists, worldwide, with addiction and recovery services with special focus on youth outreach through programs teaching, education and awareness through music.
Check out our chosen foundation here:  http://www.gramparsonsfoundation.org/

column1: <h2 style=""margin-left: 180px
<ul>

• How did my adoration of distinctive fashion begin, dolls? Perhaps because my darling mama, Margaret, took me to local thrift stores at the start of every semester,  in an effort to save some of OC Miller’s hard-earned dough.  Not only was I the best-dressed youngster at Cantara Street School, I never saw a replica of my ensemble on any other bright-eyed student! In fact, I felt singular in my one-off outfits, and was often admired by my pre-pubescent peers. Where did you GET that pretty jacket, Pam?” “Why, Salvation Army, of course!”

• As I mentioned in my first memoir, “I’m With the Band,” I was the first in Reseda California to own a pair of real live bellbottoms ala my early heroine, Cher, and since I had begun sewing for myself, I decked out the low-slung, giant-belled denim beauties with a hand made rick-racked crop-top!

column3: />When the Beatles and Stones careened into my world, I wanted my ramped-up excitement about being alive, and the inner music my rocked-out soul was humming, to show vividly &amp
column4: proudly in my in visual appearance.

column2: >It stands to reason that once I was on my own, I continued to shop in thrift stores, and once I found my way to Hollywood, at the very first “vintage” store in town, The Glass Farmhouse, owned by a very prescient dame called Helen. While my teenage counterparts were happily modding around in brand new, mini metallic/flowered get-ups, I preferred the feel of 30s silk velvets on my skin, the frothy see-through peek-a-boo-ness of 20s hand made lace, the elegance of a bias-cut chiffon gown, the drape of a long beaded cape, dragging the ground behind me, dropping silver and jet beads with every dance step.

column1: <ul>

• I was helped along by one of my Beatle friend’s granny, sweet old “Gammie,” when she allowed us to pore through her ancient cedar chest, ooh-ing and aah-ing over her ancient delicate silks and velvets, pulling them over our heads with abandoned glee. Luckily, they fit me perfectly, and I got the humdingers, including a divine blue velvet frock that I wore while dancing with the Jimi Hendrix Experience in one of the very first “rock videos,” Foxey Lady!” (That’s how Jimi spelled it, dolls!)
<ul>

• When my gang of dancing chicks wound up as an all-girl music group, The GTOs (Girls Together Outrageously) and paraded around with rock gods in all our vintage and hand made dreams, we sparked a fascination with vintage clothes that hasn’t stopped.  I can still be found hunting through antique shops, worldwide, seeking out the same feminine elegance, although very, very difficult to find these days.
So welcome to my very own, dream-come-true: Groupie Couture!

My very high-minded, huge-hearted goal is to dress my luscious, precious dolls in the same beauty by recreating the glorious frocks I wore and was photographed in during the slay-day of Rock 'n Roll - the 1960s and 70s.

Besides recreating new clothing ensembles, I have also joyously hand-picked a fine line of exquisite, vintage “girls” and ""old girls"" ranging from the Roaring '20s to the Metal '80s.  We even have a few spectacularly beautiful silk shawls from the 1890's with 12"" fringe!

You know, the grass doesn't grow long under my feet, dolls, and I've traipsed from sea to shining sea in search of these beauties for you!  I'm so excited and can't wait to see all of you all dolled up looking like your most exquisite self! xoxo, MissP
<div class=""std"">
<div class=""page-title"">

• ... such was the case for Miss Pamela, whose friendships and relationships took her into the lives of Gram Parsons, Led Zeppelin, The Jimi Hendrix Experience, The Who, The Doors, The Rolling Stones, and innumerable other mythic giants of their genre. Pamela’s
column3: />journey—from bouffanted middle-schooler swooning for Elvis and Dion to wild-haired, clown-eyed flower child as part of Frank Zappa’s GTOs—is well-documented in her journal, a fascinating firsthand account of the golden age of rock ‘n’ roll that formed the basis of her first book, international bestseller I’m With The Band. Perhaps less well known is the fact that while Pamela was waiting for her beloved lads to swing into town on tour, she was hand-fashioning one-of-a-kind garments for them. Rock ‘n’ roll has always been painfully cool, not only a style of music but a style of life. Each movement and genre has always inspired a fabulous and richly evocative aesthetic to suit its sounds. Rock ‘n roll has also long been a great equalizer between the sexes
column4: music-loving boys and girls have borrowed from each other’s closets and grooming habits since Little Richard first discovered mascara and a groupie girl first discovered his well-cut trousers. Rock music is the skeleton, but rock culture is the velvet and leather he wears. Des Barres knows this because she helped invent it.

column1: <div class=""page-title"">
<ul>
• Miss Pamela Des Barres’ passion for rock and for fashion have never
column4: continuing to inspire her aesthetic and to captivate the legions of fans who have used her books as a road map of style and lifestyle. Finally, she is ready to bring her matchless abilities—as an interpreter of historic dress, an incorporator of disparate styles into one common theme, and an innovator of as-yet unrealized possibilities—to a fashion house of her own, a dollhouse for stylish muses to play in, a house that rock built. As luck and love would have it, Miss P was fortunate enough to find another dame aflame in Roni Viloria Stroud, a swirling, twirling, brave and intelligent woman who joined Pamela as her business partner and has been exactly the dose of vitamins the doctor ordered. The Groupie Couture line is stitched to the heartbeat of these two fierce women. It is an affirmation of the loud, proud groupie name and the Lady Herself’s groupie fame. It is a realization of the love, sweet love, between two worlds that have long courted each other: groupies, and couture. ~ excerpt from: Groupie. Couture. beauitfully penned by Nichole Joor (read her full editorial in our ""About Us"" section on our website.

","A little bit about us?
Launched in the summer of 2013, Tanks & Kinis is the brainchild of three summer lovers with distinct personalities (Nadzirah Hashim, Rachel Lai & Diyana Hashim).

As lovers of the sun, sea and beach, the average attire for a wanderlust soul like ours would have to be beachwear and swimwear. And here at Tanks & Kinis, we carefully source and handpick our collection so each of these pieces can showcase an individuals personal style.
So what do we need?
To build our dream online shop. But it’s not just
going to be another normal online shop. In fact, our shop aims to engage anyone
who loves basking in the sun, or chilling at the beach or swim in the ocean.
If you love any (or all!) of these activities then
you’re going to love our website. :)
But hang on, what will our site have that makes it
different from others?
Well, aside from making our website layout look
aesthetically awesome, we’ve got a couple of unique features we wish to add in order
to grow our Tanks & Kinis community to a larger scale by having:
1.  T&K Forum - for
you to chat to lovers of sun, sea and beach featuring our in-house Tanks &
Kinis island moderator at your service every day.
2.  T&K mix and
match - swimwear and beachwear tool for you to get outfit inspiration on your
next travels.
What’s the cost?
The cost of the site will be $3000 (which includes building our customized front end and back end system and maintaining the site) and we need an
additional $1000 to travel & source for more amazing brands in Thailand and
Philippines.
While we currently commute between Kuala Lumpur and Bali, we’ve
found other interesting brands located in other parts of South East Asia that
we believe you will love too. And as we always prefer to view and feel the
quality of the products we deliver beforehand, we would require this additional
amount to head there to pick the beachwear & swimwear brands that our
customers will love.
What's the impact?
Aside from making our dreams come true, the kind of
impact you will create includes:
1.  Helping us show the
world the amazing craftsmanship of swimwear and beachwear made in South East
Asia!
That’s something we will eternally be grateful for as there’s so many
beautiful things out here and the online world can become an avenue for us to
share it with you.
2.  You will have given
our current customers a more awesome platform to shop for our swimwear and
beachwear.
Right now we’re using Facebook and online transfer, which for most
of our international customers, becomes inconvenient. So with your help, we can
make our payment gateway more safe and secure!
3.  You will have given
us the key to speaking to more lovers of sun, sea and beach at our T&K
Island Life forum.
We always wanted to bring like-minded island lovers together
to talk about anything and everything under the sun so we thought, why not
create a cool forum for us to share their ideas?
4.  You will help us
gain credibility as a brand that really wants to spread the love for island life
to the world.
Rule of thumb for being a growing business is to have a good
website. And while we have a vision of what it should be we were lacking funds
on making it happen, but if you help us out, you would have made us a more
legitimate business. How can we stop saying thank you for that?
Want to help us in another way?
We understand that you may not be able contribute
financially but guess what? There are other ways you can help! Here’s how:
1.  Share this link with
your friends and family who you think will love this site via email, social
media or word of mouth.
2.  Have a blog? Or a member

link to your post with our community on our Facebook and Instagram.
3.  Like our Facebook page or follow us on Twitter/Instagram @tanksandkinis. That for us is great support for us and we

We are Inventasaurus and we are the proud makers of goStrap. We are a New York based product development company. goStrap represents what we and
many others feel to be the next evolutionary step in personal mobile device
management as well as finally offering an alternative to the endless landfill of obsolete and over-priced, protective

case-ware.

We intend to raise funds to produce our in-demand 2nd generation model, for dedicated use with larger tablet, phablet and slate style devices.
Function- goStrap is an affordable after-market
tech accessory that affixes to most any hand-held mobile device to augment the

user's grip and prevent dropped and damaged devices.

Our socio-ecological cry is:
Obsolete
mobile device cases become landfill!
Eco-thoughtlessness, to us, is that every time a device maker changes its product design even
slightly, the rush is on for case makers to adapt. Case-ware is then manufactured for an entire
new line of protective merchandise because the one you bought for your older

generation device is no longer compatible and becomes landfill.


Solution

goStrap is comprised of 1/3 the material of the smallest cases and
because it does not depend on fitting around, but rather attaches to
your mobile device, it does not need to be redesigned to adapt to an
ever
changing field of devices and is compatible across generational
mobile-device design changes. Additionally, most case-ware uses an
excess of

packaging. goStrap employs a minimal amount of packaging.

goStrap's Long List of other benefits:

Preventing costly drops! - Our nearly 7000 and counting customers are people who are tired of dropping their phones!

Look familiar?

Reclaiming your hand- Simply by rolling for instance your phone to the other side of your hand, you can now hold your drink, pull your luggage, hold an umbrella, or shake somebody's hand, while maintaining positive control of your device.
column3:
/>                            


Freedom from Over-Casing-  We have created a

column1: super-quality, protective device accessory that can take on all the stylistic
designs of cases, offers much greater utility, can be affordable on practically

any budget, and can actually fit in your pocket! Besides, the true value of a case is actually only realized AFTER you've dropped your device. goStrap prevents drops in the first place!

How much ""case"" is too

much?

Affordability- As that old saying about necessity goes...we looked around
the market for affordable protection for our devices and when we couldn't find
it...we ""mothered"" an invention for it. We all want something that
meets nicely at the corner of quality and price. Besides, if we had a lot to
spend, we probably would have just purchased the insurance!
We were fed up
that the market offered us nothing short of paying $20 to $50 and up for
reliable protective cases for our devices. In some instances, cases so
expensive and fortified, that they turn our devices into ""bricks""!
Also, think about this....isn't the true value of a case only realized after

you've dropped your device? goStrap prevents drops in the first place!

Device Theft Prevention - The security of mobile devices is another issue all together. It seems as though thieves have also noticed that we like to constantly carry our devices in our hands. Mobile device theft is absolutely on the rise. The would be thief's method of operation is to run by and snatch your device from your hand,either in the open or from the outside of a closing train door. goStrap is a first-line defense against ""run-by"" style of device snatching.
column3:
/>

Mobile device theft is absolutely on the rise.

Hand Health-Let's face it, the majority of mobile-device users

column1: never
want to let go of their devices!  We could easily stow them away in a
pocket or purse, but we don't. We carry them everywhere and in some
cases even
cradle them like they were our children! Why? Because we all want to
remain

connected and in contact.


Let's face it...The majority of mobile device users

never want to let go of their devices!

Think
about it this way...when you go outside, it's not as though there is an
epidemic of people dropping devices all around you. Why? Because people pay a
lot of money for their smart devices and since most prefer to carry them in
their hands, they therefore, at all times, must mindfully clutch them all day
long to keep from dropping them!
Mobile device clutching can take a
toll on hand health.
This slavery to
their devices keeps their fingers under a constant state of tension. There is a mind-body approach behind goStrap, that when the body
can relax, the mind will follow. By offering positive grip, goStrap

brings mental freedom from grasping our devices.

 We have
performed extensive field-testing with this product.  We have done a
far-reaching amount of research in designing this product around our testing
and polling results and what they revealed about how people use their mobile devices.
How do you use your mobile device?  Better yet, how would you use it with goStrap?

To reclaim the use of your hand.

While multitasking.

While commuting.

While exercising.

While running.

Some thoughts to leave you with:
The Transformation- You should see users' expressions change when we put a goStrap
on their phone, e-reader, or mp3 player.  The moment that their hands as
well as their minds are set free, their faces illuminate! Suddenly, their
fingers can relax! It is quite gratifying for us as well. In fact, we have sold
about 7000 goStraps and everyone who has bought one, loves it and thinks it
is an idea whose time has come. Responses range from, ""It has changed the
way I use my mobile device!” to ""I don't know how I

lived without this!"".

The Future- As you know,  we are in development of our second
generation goStrap dedicated for use with tablet, slates, and
phablet"" hybrids. There are already a few such solutions out there
for these types of devices, but none have harnessed the Eco-frindliness, simplicity, utility and affordability, that we have

engineered into goStrap.
.

We intend to use raised funds to create the sample and production molds for your in-demand, 2nd Generation goStrap. If we should fall short of our goal, we will use collected funds judiciously to initiate this process.

Finally, we remind you that even if you can't contribute financially, you can still have a huge impact by getting the word out about this amazing product. Please follow us on Facebook, and Twitter.

https://www.facebook.com/pages/goStrap/416054525075959

https://twitter.com/mygostrap

goStrap is sold nationally at:
immensely for your consideration. Please do not hesitate to contact us with any
questions you may have about backing this project. Here are some we have
fielded to date:
FAQs
Q. Does goStrap provide a
firm hold and does it come off?
A. goStrap features an innovative 3M adhesive that forms a strong,
long-lasting bond but is cleanly removable and leaves no residue.
Q. Is goStrap reusable?
A.  No. goStrap is a one-time use product because the adhesive will no longer

possess its full integrity once its bond is broken.

Q. Does it/will it come in colors?
Yes. As we get into production, goStrap will be available in black,
pink, and blue. Additionally, as we grow, an almost limitless array of
colorways and designs are possible. These can include screen-printed designs,
team colors and logos, appliques, adornments, and appointments such as dazzles
and jewels.
Q. What devices is goStrap
for use with?
The current size goStrap is suitable for use on smaller, handheld
mobile devices such as cellular phones, mp3 players, and e-readers. Currently
we are also in development of our 2nd generation goStrap dedicated for
use with tablet computers such as the IPAD.
Q. Can goStrap be used in
conjunction with existing cases?
A. goStrap will adhere and can be a great companion to most existing hard-shell and hard-rubber cases.
It will not adhere to silicone rubber or cases that have extremely un-unified
surfaces, such as cases with a lot of bling, dazzles, or deep and/or knobby
tread.
","We are Inventasaurus and we are the proud makers of goStrap. We are a New York based product development company. goStrap represents what we and
many others feel to be the next evolutionary step in personal mobile device
management as well as finally offering an alternative to the endless landfill of obsolete and over-priced, protective
case-ware. We intend to raise funds to produce our in-demand 2nd generation model, for dedicated use with larger tablet, phablet and slate style devices.
Function- goStrap is an affordable after-market
tech accessory that affixes to most any hand-held mobile device to augment the
user's grip and prevent dropped and damaged devices. Our socio-ecological cry is:
Obsolete
mobile device cases become landfill!
Eco-thoughtlessness, to us, is that every time a device maker changes its product design even
slightly, the rush is on for case makers to adapt. Case-ware is then manufactured for an entire
new line of protective merchandise because the one you bought for your older
generation device is no longer compatible and becomes landfill.SolutiongoStrap is comprised of 1/3 the material of the smallest cases and
because it does not depend on fitting around, but rather attaches to
your mobile device, it does not need to be redesigned to adapt to an
ever
changing field of devices and is compatible across generational
mobile-device design changes. Additionally, most case-ware uses an
excess of

packaging. goStrap employs a minimal amount of packaging.goStrap's Long List of other benefits:Preventing costly drops! - Our nearly 7000 and counting customers are people who are tired of dropping their phones! Look familiar? Reclaiming your hand- Simply by rolling for instance your phone to the other side of your hand, you can now hold your drink, pull your luggage, hold an umbrella, or shake somebody's hand, while maintaining positive control of your device.                             Freedom from Over-Casing-  We have created a
super-quality, protective device accessory that can take on all the stylistic
designs of cases, offers much greater utility, can be affordable on practically

any budget, and can actually fit in your pocket! Besides, the true value of a case is actually only realized AFTER you've dropped your device. goStrap prevents drops in the first place!How much ""case"" is too
much?Affordability- As that old saying about necessity goes...we looked around
the market for affordable protection for our devices and when we couldn't find
it...we ""mothered"" an invention for it. We all want something that
meets nicely at the corner of quality and price. Besides, if we had a lot to
spend, we probably would have just purchased the insurance!
We were fed up
that the market offered us nothing short of paying $20 to $50 and up for
reliable protective cases for our devices. In some instances, cases so
expensive and fortified, that they turn our devices into ""bricks""!
Also, think about this....isn't the true value of a case only realized after

you've dropped your device? goStrap prevents drops in the first place!Device Theft Prevention - The security of mobile devices is another issue all together. It seems as though thieves have also noticed that we like to constantly carry our devices in our hands. Mobile device theft is absolutely on the rise. The would be thief's method of operation is to run by and snatch your device from your hand,either in the open or from the outside of a closing train door. goStrap is a first-line defense against ""run-by"" style of device snatching.Mobile device theft is absolutely on the rise.Hand Health-Let's face it, the majority of mobile-device users
never
want to let go of their devices!  We could easily stow them away in a
pocket or purse, but we don't. We carry them everywhere and in some
cases even
cradle them like they were our children! Why? Because we all want to
remain
connected and in contact.Let's face it...The majority of mobile device users
never want to let go of their devices! Think
about it this way...when you go outside, it's not as though there is an
epidemic of people dropping devices all around you. Why? Because people pay a
lot of money for their smart devices and since most prefer to carry them in
their hands, they therefore, at all times, must mindfully clutch them all day
long to keep from dropping them!
Mobile device clutching can take a
toll on hand health.
This slavery to
their devices keeps their fingers under a constant state of tension. There is a mind-body approach behind goStrap, that when the body
can relax, the mind will follow. By offering positive grip, goStrap
brings mental freedom from grasping our devices. We have
performed extensive field-testing with this product.  We have done a
far-reaching amount of research in designing this product around our testing
and polling results and what they revealed about how people use their mobile devices.
How do you use your mobile device?  Better yet, how would you use it with goStrap?
To reclaim the use of your hand.While multitasking.While commuting.While exercising.While running.Some thoughts to leave you with:
The Transformation- You should see users' expressions change when we put a goStrap
on their phone, e-reader, or mp3 player.  The moment that their hands as
well as their minds are set free, their faces illuminate! Suddenly, their
fingers can relax! It is quite gratifying for us as well. In fact, we have sold
about 7000 goStraps and everyone who has bought one, loves it and thinks it
is an idea whose time has come. Responses range from, ""It has changed the
way I use my mobile device!” to ""I don't know how I
lived without this!"".The Future- As you know,  we are in development of our second
generation goStrap dedicated for use with tablet, slates, and
phablet"" hybrids. There are already a few such solutions out there
for these types of devices, but none have harnessed the Eco-frindliness, simplicity, utility and affordability, that we have
engineered into goStrap. .

We intend to use raised funds to create the sample and production molds for your in-demand, 2nd Generation goStrap. If we should fall short of our goal, we will use collected funds judiciously to initiate this process.Finally, we remind you that even if you can't contribute financially, you can still have a huge impact by getting the word out about this amazing product. Please follow us on Facebook, and Twitter.https://www.facebook.com/pages/goStrap/416054525075959https://twitter.com/mygostrapgoStrap is sold nationally at: http://www.containerstore.com/shop/needIt/under10?productId=10035812      We thank you
immensely for your consideration. Please do not hesitate to contact us with any
questions you may have about backing this project. Here are some we have
fielded to date:
FAQs

firm hold and does it come off?

column1: ","WELCOME TO OUR PROJECT!
We have designed the world's first purse for your feet! Purse n'
Boots is a revolutionary new boot created with patent-pending pockets hidden on
the inside of the shoe. Our mission is to give women the opportunity to dance,
travel, or shop without having to haul a purse along. Although we all love our
classic black Gucci bag, it can be a chore to carry at times.
THE BOOTS
Each boot has a special purpose and hidden surprise. Your left
boot has a pocket designed specifically to fit the iPhone, Blackberry, and
any other phone of that size. If you are one of the strong willed who can leave
their phone at home, than this pocket can be used for makeup, lipsticks, and
much more. Your right boot has a special built-in wallet that is perfect for
credit cards, ID, folded cash and even loose change.
What is the most exciting part of this concept? It’s hidden! The
next time you walk through security at a concert, you will feel a tinge of
guilt as the contents of your girlfriend’s purse are dumped out in line to be
search and approved. You however, will walk right through.
In addition to our secret pockets, we pride ourselves in finding
the highest quality leathers and creating the most comfortable shoe on the
market (while still maintaining a competitive style). Our boots are designed to
outlast. There is nothing more depressing than having to retire a pair of your “old
faithfuls”, so to prolong this mournful day, we make a long lasting boot that
will be a friend to your feet for years to come.
ABOUT THE DESIGNER
My name is Elizabeth
Anne. I am a 26-year old entrepreness from Calgary, Alberta with a shoe fascination
that can rival the very best. I started this project about two years ago. At
the time I was having issues keeping my purses from being lost or left behind. I’ve
left them in cabs, at restaurants, in theatres and night clubs. I was lucky
enough to be re-united with a few of them but the ones that we’re lost we’re
always traumatizing. I started keeping my phone and cash in my knee-highs
(which I always wore). This worked reasonably well until the bartenders gave me
$8 in change and I would have to walk around all night with a Loonie under my
foot.
After a long and
unsuccessful search for boots with hidden pockets (I had assumed this would have
been done before), I decided to make them myself. It started off as something I
just wanted to do for me until I had amassed a list of girlfriends who also
wanted a pair. I even had some of my male friends asking about them
tired of having to hold their girlfriend’s lipsticks.
The last two years
have been fun, challenging, and extremely rewarding. My first shipment of boots
is arriving in a couple weeks and will be delivered to the lucky customers that
snapped them up before they we’re sold out. It’s been an amazing thing for me
to watch an idea turn into a dream come true.
MEET THE TEAM
Steve Moore – Steve is
our extraordinary marketing manager who has been instrumental in spreading awareness
for our company across Canada. We accredit our recent success with the media to
his efforts and expertise. Since starting the company in February, we have been
featured on Global News, Breakfast Television, Shaw TV, Virgin Radio, Canadian
Free Press, Metro News, Calgary Herald HERS Magazine, CBC Radio, String
Magazine, Good News Weekly, and Fashion Sign Magazine.
Andrea Moore – Andrea brings
a creative, female force to Elizabeth Anne Shoes. She balances her time between
helping us grow and changing the lives of children through her work at Big
Brothers and Big Sisters.
Ted Moore – Ted brings
over 20 years of entrepreneurial experience to our company. He has had several
successful ventures of his own and imparts his wisdom onto Elizabeth Anne
Shoes. We rely greatly on his sage advice.
Jeremy Wolfe – Jeremy brings
over 7 years of banking and finance experience to Elizabeth Anne Shoes. His
knowledge of world economics and business analytics help to steer us in the
right direction.
THE PRESS
We have been very kindly received by our local and national
press. We are very grateful to all of our media contacts for spreading the
word. We have included a video clip of our Global News special with Gil Tucker on the top of this page.
We have also added a fun audio clip from our interview with Virgin radio below.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oMFj3qtinls
For more articles and stories, please visit the Press section of
our website - www.elizabethanneshoes.com.
WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP
We are looking to raise $15,000 to help us meet our up and
coming initiatives. I have listed our objectives in order of importance:
1.    Raise capital for latest project - Talk n' Walk Cell Phone and Wallet Pocket: Customize your boots with a removable version of our Purse n’
Boots cell phone pocket. This pocket is designed to fit cell phones like the
Blackberry, iPhone or any other phone of that size. The pocket is expandable
too, allowing you to carry your folded cash and credit cards as well. If you
are strong willed and can leave your phone at home, this pocket can be used for
makeup, keys, and other small items. The Purse n’ Boots concept is no longer just
for women, the Talk n’ Walk pockets will fit into both men’s and women’s boots!
2.    Add
sizes 5 and 11 to our catalogue: Purse n’ Boots is currently only available in sizes 6 through

column2: we have had a lot of requests for a smaller and larger size so getting these sizes into our catalogue is top priority.

column1: 3.    Start
production of a flat-heeled version of Purse n’ Boots: I know there are a lot of you out there that
cannot where heels and we would like very much to be able to provide you with a
flat heeled design.
We have broken down our objectives in order of importance to show
you where your money will be prioritized. In the event that we do not meet our
campaign goals, your donations will still be put to productive use starting
with objective one.
If you’d like to see more photos and press for Purse n’ Boots’
you can visit our website at www.elizabethanneshoes.com.
Please visit us on Facebook too as this is where we often announce our contests
and updates -www.facebook.com/elizabethanneshoes.
Our Sincerest thanks for your support!
Elizabeth Anne",2.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","Calgary, Canada",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/purse-n-boots/pica

Short Summary

We needed glasses, those of us of a certain age, and so we decided, as a group of artists ( Linda Clayton, Charles Steinhacker and Barbara Campbell) to bring interesting, fun, unique readers to life.  In short, we are bringing readers into the world of fashion.

Linda Clayton has designed readers (magnifiers) that are colorful, slightly luminous (glow gently in the dark) in interesting shapes and sizes. Not the glasses that you get in the dollar stores that break before you get them into the car. Not the heavy oblong ones that make you look like a South American dictator. No, these are designed of interesting material that is slightly siliconized and pliable in colors that are translucent.They are contemporary, artistic and stylish. You will not see these coming down the street from the drug stores and supermarkets. You will not begin to look like your grandparents in these.
Clayton has designed these magnifiers to retail at around $35 each pair in gentle shapes and interesting colors.  For you. For us. For fun.
The Impact
<div>
With your help Eyz  needs $7,000 for the manufacture of the 1st 1,000 pair of glasses.
Shipping will be $500
Web Design will be $1000
Marketing and Promotion  will be $1000
Anything above that will be from heaven and all you wonderful people. And we send you heartfelt thanks for your generous support.
<div>
In case you can't contribute money:
Please ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
You are welcome to remind your friends to use the Indiegogo share tools!
One Last Word:
Our deepest and most gracious thanks to Suzie Weekes - the original percolator of brilliant and generous ideas and to Jack Erker, without whom we never would exist today.

Short Summary

It all started as a crazy idea to use Horace's talent and professional background of polo in combination with a decade of pastoral work to launch the Play Polo school in 2013, which birthed the Play Polo Club in 2014.

With the conviction that we are all to use our God-given gifts to make a difference in the world, Play Polo LLC (www.playpolo.us) and Play Polo Club LLC (www.playpoloclub.us) operate under the following values: professionalism, safety, servanthood, horse welfare, integrity, generosity and play.

Providing instruction, equipment, and polo ponies, we aim to make polo accessible in Columbus. We offer a turn-key model, called ""Park and Play"", which offers clients the leisure of pulling up, having their horse ready, playing polo and leaving the horse in our care. As our clients grow in their skills and passion for polo, we provide opportunities to become more committed to the sport by joining the club which organizes mid-week scrimmages and weekend matches. Finally, we use tournaments as a platform to raise funds for worthy causes... and this gets us really excited!

We operate out of Play Polo Stables in Westerville, Ohio and have been thankful for the opportunity to use polo fields in Gahanna and Granville for scrimmages and weekend matches. However, with the growing number of polo ponies living in the barn and increasing interest in polo Columbus wide, we have a need to build an additional pasture and polo field in Play Polo Stables' backyard!

We have seen this coming and currently lease-to-own this land. However, the cost of building fences for the pasture, excavating the former bean field and planting suitable grass are substantial. Therefore, we have decided to go 'Indiegogo' for help!
This will make a significant impact on our business.
Not only will we be able to spend less time on the road trailering.
Not only will the horses enjoy tastier grass and better footing.
We will be able to spend more time focusing on what is most important: our clients, their horses and leveraging polo to make a difference.

This is why we ask you to contribute. We believe in the magnitude of pulling together through strengths, talents, gifts and common mission.

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

The cost of building the polo field is $25,000 and the cost for the horse fences are  $8500.

column1: You can just make a donation or you can buy one of the perks to make this polo venture come to life:
• $10 - A hay ride at the Play Polo farm
• $50 - Intro polo lesson with Horace Henriot
• $75 - Horse grooming workshop with Alice Orr
• $100 - Horse dentistry workshop with Richard Hogan
• $100 - Ferrier workshop with Eric Kaufmann
• $250 - Social Membership to the Play Polo Club
• $500 - Field advertising on the Play Polo field
The Impact
Polo in Columbus is growing at a rate unseen for decades and building the polo field and the pastures will help advance our efforts to develop Columbus as a polo hub.

Other Ways You Can Help

    Not everyone can contribute, but you can help us get the word out and let your friends know about what's happening. Here are some ideas:
<ul>
• Share the links on Facebook and other social media platforms
• Throw a polo party
• Share your ideas

With gratitude...

Giddy Up!

Horace &
column2:
Tina

Polo Manager/Founder
Play Polo Club LLC
www.playpoloclub.us

","Short Summary It all started as a crazy idea to use Horace's talent and professional background of polo in combination with a decade of pastoral work to launch the Play Polo school in 2013, which birthed the Play Polo Club in 2014.

With the conviction that we are all to use our God-given gifts to make a difference in the world, Play Polo LLC (www.playpolo.us) and Play Polo Club LLC (www.playpoloclub.us) operate under the following values: professionalism, safety, servanthood, horse welfare, integrity, generosity and play.

Providing instruction, equipment, and polo ponies, we aim to make polo accessible in Columbus. We offer a turn-key model, called ""Park and Play"", which offers clients the leisure of pulling up, having their horse ready, playing polo and leaving the horse in our care. As our clients grow in their skills and passion for polo, we provide opportunities to become more committed to the sport by joining the club which organizes mid-week scrimmages and weekend matches. Finally, we use tournaments as a platform to raise funds for worthy causes... and this gets us really excited!

We operate out of Play Polo Stables in Westerville, Ohio and have been thankful for the opportunity to use polo fields in Gahanna and Granville for scrimmages and weekend matches. However, with the growing number of polo ponies living in the barn and increasing interest in polo Columbus wide, we have a need to build an additional pasture and polo field in Play Polo Stables' backyard!

Not only will the horses enjoy tastier grass and better footing.
We will be able to spend more time focusing on what is most important: our clients, their horses and leveraging polo to make a difference.

This is why we ask you to contribute. We believe in the magnitude of pulling together through strengths, talents, gifts and common mission.   What We Need & What You Get The cost of building the polo field is $25,000 and the cost for the horse fences are  $8500.

The majority of people using reading glasses use them out of necessity. There are two use cases for reading glasses: prolonged use and short time use. Up until now there haven't been glasses designed for the specific use cases. We set out change and to introduce the most convenient and portable reading glasses.

column1: The main features of Foldi glasses:
• Slim size
• Quick and easy use

• Foldable design that eliminates the need for a separate carrying case
  • Durable materials and design

The Foldi glasses will be delivered straight to the backer's door in trackable package.

0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><h2 style=""text-align: center
column2: >The CoPilot GMT Quartz Aviator Watch
column3: >Take it on a Test Flight or on a Sunday Drive!
column4:
>

All military, air traffic control and international flight operations are conducted in one time zone. This time zone is often referred to as ZULU time, GMT or UTC time. This watch has the ability to display time in both GMT and Local time zones simultaneously. The second zone may be set to any other time zone in the world while local time is displayed in the traditional manner. The second time zone is displayed using a separate hand which can be set independently. This is particularly useful for pilots who need to keep track of GMT time or UTC time.
column5:
>

If you're not a pilot, but a seasoned traveler, this watch will become a very useful companion as you jet across multiple time zones. The second time zone can be used to keep track of time back at home while GMT/ZULU time is displayed using the triangular shaped RED hand. This hand indicates time in the second time zone using the 24 hour rotating bezel.
column6:
>

The new CoPilot GMT Aviator Wrist Watch is powered by a reliable Swiss made Ronda 515-24 Quartz movement. Having experience using this movement since 2010 in several watch designs, we are confident this watch will bring you many years of reliable service. Crafted from solid 316L stainless steel with a sandblasted finish, the new CoPilot GMT will look great on your wrist no matter what the challenge!

column1: Watch Specs

column4: >Sapphire Crystal with AR Coating
column5:
>

Japan LumiNova on Dial and Hands
column6:
>

Water Resistant to 20 ATM/660 ft/200 m
column8:
>




 

Take advantage of our great Pre-Order price: 
$279.00 USD ($379.00 CAN)
All watches ship on a black rubber strap.

FREE SHIPPING to North America! 
International shipping is offered at a very reasonable cost of $20.00 CAD per watch.

This watch will retail for $379.95 USD.
column9:
>



 

We have partnered with a dependable factory with over 20 years of experience in the watch manufacturing business. We are fully aware that there can be many unforeseen delays in the production process, but we always do our best to identify any problems that may arise at the early stages of production. We depend on more than a dozen suppliers to bring this project together and we are very diligent in the quality control process. If any component is not up to our standards it goes back to the manufacturer until it meets our approval. We expect to receive the watches here at our office in Ajax, Ontario, Canada sometime in August. All watches will be inspected, tested and packaged here in Canada before delivery.

Bebbo, is a handmade slipper, made 100% of natural wool.

Warmness, and comfort has made this footwear favourite within Georgian people,and it has gained popularity with its medical benefits, as well.
<figure style=""margin: 0px

Making process of Bebbos' is very complex and time-consuming. It consists of several steps: cleaning the wool, making a yarn, dying a yarn, knitting, sewing and sole making.  It has number of benefits to offer.   

Benefits:

Firstly, as wool is a breathable fibre, it provides instant warmth and comfort unlike other synthetic materials. It regulates itself to individual body temperature and really is warm in winter whilst cool in summer. Secondly, and more importantly, wool has health benefits. It regulates heart rate, as well as helps joints to stay more flexible and healthy.
<figure style=""margin: 0px
Design:

There are number of traditional designs and colours for Bebbos'. As our primary objective is to make Georgian tradition world known, we will be offering only traditional patterns to our customers by our website. Customers will be able to choose their favourite patterns and colours, so that Bebbos' are truly unique and fully customisable.
<figure style=""margin: 0px
<figure style=""margin: 0px

We'e been very successful with our product in Georgia, and now we need your help and our knowledge in order to make Georgian traditions well-known. Your support is needed to preserve our national traditions, and to introduce you to probably the most comfortable footwear of all.  

Soles and a Base:

Base and the sole of Bebbos are also made from natural wool. However, so they are durable and steady, we twist and layer single yarns into ply yarns, and then twist them into a cord. Number of yarn layers give us thickness, and durability. With this, because wool is a breathable fibre, footwear is not rigid, and still is soft and comfortable.
Sizing guide:

Team:
column3: >We are group of friends, students, who are really about promoting our poor but herewith the richest with its culture and traditions, country Georgia.

column1:
As mentioned in the video, we have been operating in a Georgian market, which indeed is a great stepping stone to go worldwide. In other words, we already have experience as of how to run our business, and have overcome the obstacles that a small company could face. Bebbo is not dependent on any second-third party manufacturers, therefore production process is quicker, transparent, more reliable, and of highest quality. However, in the real world, risks always exist, but we promise to keep you up to date with any issues down the line.

","Short Summary
Cunnington & Sanderson was founded in 2010. The Design duo met during their BA Fashion Design studies at the University of Central England.

Now based in North England the brand has won prestigious awards such as the On|Off Land Rover Visionary Award, Finalist in the Mango Fashion Award, Finalist for the SPOON X ELLO Competition, selected for the Future of Fashion Programme with Who's Next, Premiere Classe & NJAL In Paris.
Campaign

Cunnington & Sanderson now aim to Exhibit their AW17 Collection 'CAUTION' at London Fashion Week with On|Off. Located at the OXO Tower in central London. The Exhibition will be to showcase the new women's wear collection to potential Press, Journalists, Buyers, Photographers, Editors, Celebrities, Boutique owners, Existing clients & potential new clients.
The Exhibition can potentially offer many beneficial factors including -
*Meeting existing supporters & clients face to face
* Make new customers/contacts/supporters of out brand & products
* Take orders & make sales
* Gain new support on social media
* Gain press coverage at a prestigious event during London Fashion week.
Cunnington & Sanderson the brand is driven by two dedicated & passionate Designers who between them devote everything to moving the brand forward & to expand.
Your help & support can make this possible.
Our Target
The aim is to raise £3000.00 to help towards the Exhibition & to produce a Look book for our Autumn/Winter Collection.
£1500.00 - The venue to have the Exhibition
£700.00 - Photographer
£300.00 - Paper, Retouching & Printing look books
Rewards

Rewards include entry to win your own Cunnington & Sanderson limited edition print silk or wool neckerchief, Win a skirt from the latest collection, buy a limited edition t-shirt, receive Personal invitations to the exhibition and also the chance to meet Cunnington & Sanderson in person in London.
If the target of £1500 to secure the Exhibition is not met, then the donations raised will be directed towards the production of the Look book.
Achievements
Some of their proudest achievements include showing a catwalk presentation at Paris Fashion Week and Exhibiting at the Villa Noailles for the International Festival of Fashion & Photography.

Cunnington & Sanderson's achievement's include winning the On|Off Land Rover Visionary Award in London in 2012. This allowed the brand to exhibit their collection in London & in Paris. Gaining a successful following  and Amazing press coverage including Vogue, Fashion Monitor, Fashion Daily, Harpers Bazzar, Marie Claire, WAD.
Please also see videos for coverage of the previous event.

The Brand Cunnington & Sanderson is self funded, with the aim to produce quality garments that are created by hand, that are original and evoke emotions and craftsmanship. The Brand is not driven by trends but instead by heart & passion to create new & thought provoking garments.
The Impact

Your contributions towards this campaign will inspire confidence and quality in the brand & its products. Supporting the brand to reach out to a greater audience in the Fashion Capital of London and also world wide online.
Show your support to this unique Fashion Brand to allow Cunnington & Sanderson to continue to progress in their natured by love, Women's wear Label.
Risks & Challenges
Running your own Fashion Label is challenging, time consuming and very costly. With the responsibility of making many important decisions quickly & effectively.
Sharing the news of our campaign online & through social media can widen our target audience and reaching out to more supporters.
Your support to our brand will provide the amazing opportunity to show case our work to prestigious clients and renowned press.
Other Ways You Can Help

You, yes you who is reading this right now. can support us in a huge way, simply by sharing our campaign, spreading our news is probably one of the most important and greatest ways  you can make a difference.

Share tools on Indiegogo or any social media such as Facebook, Instagram, twitter you choose. Make the biggest support you can and share on your favourite apps. Word of mouth by talking with your friends and informing work colleagues, or by telling your family how you have helped a clothes brand to achieve their goals. Best of all it is quick and easy. You really can make a difference with a little bit of support.

Tell a stranger. It is a great way to start a conversation - Have you heard of Indiegogo, its an amazing platform that helps aspiring designers raise awareness and funds for their personal goals. Take a look at Cunnington & Sanderson who are aiming to have an exhibition at London Fashion Week to show case their new womenswear collection & capture their Look book for sales enquiries. They are providing amazing incentives to show their Thanks. Take a look on the link here - https://igg.me/at/cunningtonandsanderson/x/1371...
From Cunnington & Sanderson - THANK YOU",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

Hi there!

We’re a group of commercial photography students from the University of Derby and we really need your help to exhibit our work in London.

We’ve been working up to this for three years with a lot of blood, sweat and tears going into our work. We want to shout about this work and show everyone the emerging talent in photography. We are exhibiting in Hoxton Arches which is a few minutes from Brick Lane, London. This is one of the best places for photographic work to be seen and the area is very supportive of the creative arts. There is such a variety of work that will be exhibited that there will be something that speaks to everyone…after all that is the point of art, to create something interesting that makes people ask questions.

For our exhibition to work we need to fund promotional material, brochures and, of course, have some alcohol there to keep everyone happy. All of this costs money and we rely on the generosity of people like you to get us there. This is a major event for us which has already involved a huge amount of organisational work and looking for kind people out there to help us.

We have already been receiving support (which has allowed us to hire the gallery) but, given the chance, we want to maximise the potential here and make our names known throughout the photography industry. For this, we need continued support from many people who are willing to put forward some money to help us fund our exhibition. Even if you just share our project on social media or tell people about, you are helping us! And we thank you for that just like we thank all the people who have already helped us.

Please support us and thank you to all of those that will donate to us. We’re an extremely nice bunch of people who of course will send you something in return for any help.

Thank You!




Our exhibition starts on June 16th so we have a lot to do between then to make sure its successful, as well as making to lovely work thats going to grace the walls.

column1: outlet in life,Being born against the odds and beating them by evading the

column3:

About GCRA

GCRA Clothing designs produces and manufactures the most unique, diverse clothing the fashion world had ever seen. GCRA Clothing is the label the world had been waiting for, by creating fresh, new, edgy, classy designs. Our demographic ranges from: young or old, short or tall , boy or girl, man or woman, surfers, skaters, bikers, extreme kids, punks, techno junkies, DJ’s, hip-hop heads, rastas, rockers, geeks and everyone in between. Our brand represents anyone who came up from the Gutter to become a better person and create a better world for their family and the world around them.

and be able to design my own Clothing.
column3:
/>


Our purpose 

The Gutter  Chyldren  who came from nothing to be somebody. To be a man, be a woman, be somebody and stand up to provide for your family and change your place in life. No matter where that might be. We give our Gutter Chyld some shoes and clothes they can believe in and give our consumers a choice to by clothing that compliments and enhances their style and individuality. Our consumers had earned money is spent on a brand which refuses not to settle for something that fits, rather something that flows and stands for something. GCRA Clothing has developed a new style, based on self-realization and instills a confidence in all those who wear it.
column6: >Our product line instills our vision into every garment we make. We have dozens of designs for our shirts and our celebrity  design team of multiple artists continues to crank out new designs and ideas daily. We make clothes that people want to wear. As we conduct our market research visiting malls and retail stores to see what is hot in the market. It is difficult to find anything new worth buying. We feel this is unacceptable. Our clothing line raises the bar and we give our customer options, no matter what their style may be.

column1: <div>
Use of Contribution
GCRA Shipping Time line
What we will do for our society

After our first quarter, 3% of all GCRA Clothing sales will be donated to the Gutter Chyld Foundation. Our non-profit organization. This will provide care and relief to adopted children and parents stuck in the gutter, who need our help. We are committed to making the world a better place to live in. for our kids and our kids, kids. We believe everyone deserves a second chance. We have all made it thus far. If we can make one ripple in the water, to allow the Gutter Chyldren  of the world to drink from the fountain of life. Then we have succeeded.  If we make a wave, we make this impossible, possible. We are more than clothing company
column2: we are creators of a new image and an epic way of life.

column1:
Advantage of GCRA Clothing

GCRA Clothing is going to flip the market upside down and offer a creative alternative to tired mainstream clothes you find on the racks today. GCRA Clothing is a fresh new brand and is more than putting   clothes on bodies. It’s about getting in their heads and allowing Gutter Chyldren to feel good about the clothes they wear, knowing they are a member of a unique VIP club who choose not to settle for everything else. We unite as one, unlike any other brand on the market. We plan to build a nonprofit foundation to help people down and out, in the Gutter. We are seeking out workers, volunteers and Gutter Chyldren to make the foundation grow. The most important aspect of being a reformed Gutter Chyld is the ability to not go back to the gutter but remember where you came from and the road you walked to get there.
"" Others have seen what is and asked why. I have seen what could be and asked why not.""
–Pablo Picasso
THE CELEBRITY DESIGNER BEHIND GCRA Clothing
Our fresh designs are diversified, through many artists, to
satisfy every lifestyle in the Gutter Chyld world. Our designs range from
morbid to classy, flashy to obscure, sexy to demented, landscape, urban,
skills, wings, surf shop designs. Graffiti, street designs and persevering messages.
Stamped with our signature handprint with a southern California appeal,
whatever a consumer could ever want we have created it and if it is not our
collection, our design team can create it.
THE CELEBRITY DESIGNER BEHIND GCRA Clothing
Tiffany Dean
Passion 4 Fashion. Her line was featured in Glamour Magazine

Passion 4 Fashion. Her line was featured in Glamour Magazine and sold in high end boutiques across the country. She has styled many fashion spreads for major magazines (Elle, Vogue, Marie Claire, Maxim, British FHM, Genlux, Harper’s Bazaar, People, OK Magazine, US Weekly and Essence) she has also styled many celebrities such as, Kate Perry, the Cast of Modern Family, Cast of Hawaii 5.0, Queen Latifah, Naya Rivera of Glee, Akon, Idris Elba, 50 Cent, and Tyrese Gibson and more. She was also the Assistant Costume Designer at Sony Pictures Queen Latifah Show on CBS Tiffany has recently launched her newly anticipated bridal service providing the perfect look for the perfect bride and groom. She has developed years of bridal experience and has been featured on WE Tv’s hit series My Fair Wedding with celebrity event planner David Tutera and has worked with a host of high end bridal magazines. Tiffany has taken the fashion industry to new heights and has become the official editor of Bride and Groom US Magazine where she shares how to create the perfect look for the Brides.

Daddy GO Bag ""The Bag
With An Afterlife"" was created when I was getting ready to have my first
child. I did not want to carry around my wife's purse.  As a Recon Marine and
Sniper I put my combat gear to the test. I decided to use this same material in
the Daddy GO Bag knowing how well it performed in harsh environments with hard
use. The key is once you are done changing diapers you can turn this bag into a
computer bag, fishing bag, gym bag, hunting bag, tool bag, camera bag and any
other bag that requires functionality and durability.  This one bag takes
the place of many bags saving you lots of money.  The bag was designed so
you can change your babies diaper with one hand on the baby and the other
grabbing the diaper changing gear without having to unzip the bag.  Proud
fathers can now keep their dignity by using a Daddy GO Bag.  Don't forget
Even though you drive a mini van, you are still a man, Daddy GO
Bag"".
The Daddy GO Bag is
created by a Recon Marine/Sniper. I am raising funds for inventory to sell on
Amazon, EBay and the Daddy GO Bag website. This campaign will help with
marketing and national recognition. I will also create a smaller Daddy GO Bag
and a Daddy GO Bag Back Pack. This money will go into the Daddy GO Bag
accessories. Some accessories are a changing kit, bottle insulator, changing
mat, military style baby blanket and dump pouch. Please ignore the $1,000.00
goal.  Daddy GO Bag is a startup and will take as many preorders/donations
as possible.
Everybody gets
a reward for contributing.  With a contribution of $110.00 or
greater, you will get one of the first ever Generation 1 Daddy GO Bags.
Pick one of these Daddy GO Bags:
Tactical Daddy GO Bag made
with 500D Multicam, 1000D coyote tan Cordura or the Duck Hunting Daddy GO Bag
made with 500D Mossy Oak Shadow Grass Blades and 1000D coyote tan Cordura or
the Tan Casual Daddy GO Bag made with heavy #8 cotton duck water resistant
canvas.
Think of it this way...if
you want a bag and can wait 3 months for delivery you can get a Daddy GO Bag
for $110.00 and that includes shipping, handling and taxes. This is a huge
discount for a Daddy GO Bag.  This would also be a great gift for friends
or family who are expecting, have a baby or someone who needs a rugged
bag. This bag has an AFTERLIFE! When you are done changing diapers you
can convert this bag into a computer bag, camera bag, hunting bag, tool bag,
fishing bag, pic nic bag, medical bag or anything else that requires a durable
and functional bag. 5 or more bags in one, saving you lots of money.
Think of this as a preorder.  Here is a comparison chart:

We are not the only ones who need your help!
column11:
>These people with disabilities can now define themselves by what they do, not by their disability and what they can't do. 
About 205,000 of those who served in or during the Iraq and Afghanistan Wars are without work, these Veterans are unemployed at a higher rate than those who did not serve.

Veteran Unemployment Rates.

Currently we manufacture at occupational centers in New Jersey.
column13:
>

 

OUR GOAL
column14:
>With your help we will expand our manufacturing to other occupational centers throughout the nation, employing more veterans and people with disabilities.

We believe it takes Americans to re-build America!
column16: >Never ask ""where is the next bag?"" when you take out the trash again. Oxo-Biodegradable and Made In the USA by Veterans &amp
column26: >BagUps™ will also be available in Commercial sizes for use in Restaurants,Hospitals,Sports Arenas etc.
column28: >What is BagUps and how do they make a difference?
column31: >BagUps, the original trash bag dispensing system, is a greener way of disposing your trash.  We are committed to creating a zero-waste footprint, and slowing the growth of landfills.  Our dispensing system is useful in all residential, commercial and industrial applications.
column44: >BagUps sets itself apart from ordinary garbage bags in three ways.  First, the bags are pre-loaded so the user never has to put his or her hand in a trash container.  Second, BagUps are produced by veterans and people with disabilities. The bags dispense from a 100% cardboard box in a continuous flow, automatically relining your trash receptacle.  Lastly, the product is oxo-biodegradable, which allows it to breakdown naturally in approximately two years
column45: versus thousands of years it takes other bags to degrade.
column48:
>

MAKING A DIFFERENCE 

BagUps is making a difference one bag at a time in your home, in the lives of veterans and people with disabilities, and in our landfills by being Oxo-biodegradable! And, of course, they're MADE IN THE USA!!!
column52:
>

Why Indiegogo, why now?
column53: >Getting BagUps into the stores is half the battle, getting it to be noticed AGAINST the big conglomerates who make their bags overseas with multi-million dollar advertising budgets is the other half.
column54: >With your help, we can do it!  As we produce more product, and in additional locations,more veterans &amp
column55: disabled people are employed across the country, and the planet is safe from regular plastic in our landfill.
column59:
>

What's the point of having a great product if people don't know about it and how it works?
column60: >We have spent years developing, perfecting, and patenting BagUps. We know people love the product, it has been featured on TV over a dozen times as a great new product, and we sell out at every trade show we attend. Now, we need your support to get it into medium and large-size stores. Retail purchasing agents are taking interest in BagUps for all the reasons we stated already.
column61: >We have retail purchasing agents interested in the product and getting it on the store shelf, but that is only part of the equation. We need to educate the consumer, by advertising online and in store flyers. Also paying for promotional end caps and buying in-store displays like the one Jack is standing next to at the end of the video, and pay for shelf-slotting fees. This will support us in being successful!
column62:
>You'll see, when people buy BagUps once, they keep coming back for more!

Is BagUps a game changer?
column63: >Like the TV remote control, the cellphone, and GPS you will never want to go back to the old way of changing trash bags once you have used BagUps!
column67: >Changing your trash bag has never been as easy as 1-2-3, you will NEVER want to go back to the old way of changing the bag!
column71:
>

 How does BagUps save money?
column72: >In business, time is money.
column73:
>BagUps saves approximately 1 man hour per every 100 trash bag changes. With increased efficiency comes real dollar savings. The more bags are changed throughout the day, the larger the man hour savings.

BagUps increase efficiency, saving time and money.

 PLASTIC BAGS STATS.
column74: >The total number of bags used worldwide is about 1 trillion annually, the number of plastic bags used per year by US citizens is over hundred billion. The average family accumulates 60 plastic bags in only four trips to the grocery store.
column75: > A plastic bag takes over a thousand years to degrade.
column84: >BagUps are ASTM D6954 Certified Oxo-Biodegradable to support a safe environment and future. Bags will degrade in approximately 24-36 months depending on UV light, moisture, and
column89: > condition. Time may vary in landfills and composts.
column94: >Oxo-biodegradable will oxidize first: ex: (rust on a pipe) then it will Biodegrade and will consumed by micro-organisms.

column136: >Jack Licata with the Lt Governor Of New Jersey.
column141: >Our way of saying thank you, for your donations and for making a difference with our environment, and for supporting a product made in the USA, by our veterans and people with disabilities.

column1:
Recent press release was picked up over 124 media outlets. New Invention Alters the Way the World Changes Trash.
Fast Bags Corp., announces it’s revolutionary trash bag dispensing system that will have you never looking for another trash bag again –BagUps.

column2: >Now changing the trash and relining the bag is as easy 1-2-3.

column1: <div style=""font-weight: bold
<div>
BagUps is making a difference One bag at a time!

column2: >This multi-patented dispensing system replaces the next trash bag automatically!The continuous flow of bags are attached with an “easy tear perforation” and are stored in a recyclable cardboard box that sits in the bottom of the trash container. It puts the bags where they belong, in the can, leaving the user to never search for another trash bag again.The system automatically removes itself with the last bag.

>BagUps, was recently recognized for its unique ability to deliver on key sustainable values: saves time and money, good for the environment, and good for the community.Good for saving time and money – This simple invention stops aggravation while saving time, effort, and huge dollar savings in man hours. Time motion studies show BagUps saves an average of one man hour per 100 liner changes, in a commercial environment.Good For The Environment - Oxo-Biodegradable bags breakdown in about 2 years as opposed to thousands of years for regular trash bags.

>Plus, BagUps are strong and stuff-able, yet comparable in price to other trash bags.Good For The Community - BagUps are 100% made in the United States by veterans and people with disabilities. About BagUps - Invented by a former U.S. Air Force Captain, Jack Licata, who served as a nuclear missile officer. At the end of every shift, Captain Licata also had to change the trash. “There’s got to be a better way”! Licata said, No better system existed so Licata invented and patented BagUps.

>BagUps is a preferred vendor to the Department of Veterans Affairs throughout the United States. This system was also awarded the 2013 Product of the Year by the state of New Jersey and the Lt. Governor. Over 20 other organizations have also endorsed or approved BagUps.
>BagUps are available online. Please visit http://www.bagups.net or call 1-917-885-6655.

column3:
>
