The bags dispense from a 100% cardboard box in a continuous flow, automatically relining your trash receptacle.  Lastly, the product is oxo-biodegradable, which allows it to breakdown naturally in approximately two years
column4: versus thousands of years it takes other bags to degrade.MAKING A DIFFERENCE BagUps is making a difference one bag at a time in your home, in the lives of veterans and people with disabilities, and in our landfills by being Oxo-biodegradable! And, of course, they're MADE IN THE USA!!!Why Indiegogo, why now?Getting BagUps into the stores is half the battle, getting it to be noticed AGAINST the big conglomerates who make their bags overseas with multi-million dollar advertising budgets is the other half.With your help, we can do it!  As we produce more product, and in additional locations,more veterans & disabled people are employed across the country, and the planet is safe from regular plastic in our landfill.What's the point of having a great product if people don't know about it and how it works?We have spent years developing, perfecting, and patenting BagUps. We know people love the product, it has been featured on TV over a dozen times as a great new product, and we sell out at every trade show we attend. Now, we need your support to get it into medium and large-size stores. Retail purchasing agents are taking interest in BagUps for all the reasons we stated already. We have retail purchasing agents interested in the product and getting it on the store shelf, but that is only part of the equation. We need to educate the consumer, by advertising online and in store flyers. Also paying for promotional end caps and buying in-store displays like the one Jack is standing next to at the end of the video, and pay for shelf-slotting fees. This will support us in being successful!You'll see, when people buy BagUps once, they keep coming back for more!Is BagUps a game changer?Like the TV remote control, the cellphone, and GPS you will never want to go back to the old way of changing trash bags once you have used BagUps!Changing your trash bag has never been as easy as 1-2-3, you will NEVER want to go back to the old way of changing the bag! How does BagUps save money?In business, time is money. BagUps saves approximately 1 man hour per every 100 trash bag changes. With increased efficiency comes real dollar savings. The more bags are changed throughout the day, the larger the man hour savings.BagUps increase efficiency, saving time and money. PLASTIC BAGS STATS. The total number of bags used worldwide is about 1 trillion annually, the number of plastic bags used per year by US citizens is over hundred billion. The average family accumulates 60 plastic bags in only four trips to the grocery store.  A plastic bag takes over a thousand years to degrade.BAGUPS STATSBagUps are ASTM D6954 Certified Oxo-Biodegradable to support a safe environment and future. Bags will degrade in approximately 24-36 months depending on UV light, moisture, and stressful condition. Time may vary in landfills and composts.  Oxo-biodegradable will oxidize first: ex: (rust on a pipe) then it will Biodegrade and will consumed by micro-organisms.WHERE HAS BAGUPS BEEN SEEN AND SOLD?BagUps has been sold on QVC, The Shopping Channel, Green Shows, and on line. Featured on MSNBC, WPIX 11, Fox 5, Fox & Friends, CBS, and KTLA.Recently previewed on Fox and Friends on November 10, 2013.BagUps wins NJ Incubator Product of the Year 2013 in the Green Category, (NJ Lt. Governor appears in center in photo, presenting award) Jack Licata with the Lt Governor Of New Jersey.REWARDSOur way of saying thank you, for your donations and for making a difference with our environment, and for supporting a product made in the USA, by our veterans and people with disabilities. REWARD. A heart-felt, personally signed Certificate of Appreciation from one of BagUps' Veteran employees!REWARD. A BagUps™ Hug-A-Hero Doll 3.75"" tall BagUps Man SuperHero- He's Loveable, Squeezable, and Hugable!REWARD. A Limited Edition BagUps™ T-Shirt(1) BagUps™ Trash Bag Dispensing System- 17 bags per system (13 gallon)REWARD. Multiple months supply for your donation.Your name of choice (hint: maybe honoring a hero veteran) will be displayed as a major sponsor on all of our packaging for 1 year.Click link to read the article.

column1: Recent press release was picked up over 124 media outlets. New Invention Alters the Way the World Changes Trash.Fast Bags Corp., announces it’s revolutionary trash bag dispensing system that will have you never looking for another trash bag again –BagUps.
Now changing the trash and relining the bag is as easy 1-2-3.
BagUps is making a difference One bag at a time!
Basking Ridge, NJ (PRWEB) October 24, 2013

This multi-patented dispensing system replaces the next trash bag automatically!The continuous flow of bags are attached with an “easy tear perforation” and are stored in a recyclable cardboard box that sits in the bottom of the trash container. It puts the bags where they belong, in the can, leaving the user to never search for another trash bag again.The system automatically removes itself with the last bag.

BagUps, was recently recognized for its unique ability to deliver on key sustainable values: saves time and money, good for the environment, and good for the community.Good for saving time and money – This simple invention stops aggravation while saving time, effort, and huge dollar savings in man hours. Time motion studies show BagUps saves an average of one man hour per 100 liner changes, in a commercial environment.Good For The Environment - Oxo-Biodegradable bags breakdown in about 2 years as opposed to thousands of years for regular trash bags.

Plus, BagUps are strong and stuff-able, yet comparable in price to other trash bags.Good For The Community - BagUps are 100% made in the United States by veterans and people with disabilities. About BagUps - Invented by a former U.S. Air Force Captain, Jack Licata, who served as a nuclear missile officer. At the end of every shift, Captain Licata also had to change the trash. “There’s got to be a better way”! Licata said, No better system existed so Licata invented and patented BagUps.

BagUps is a preferred vendor to the Department of Veterans Affairs throughout the United States. This system was also awarded the 2013 Product of the Year by the state of New Jersey and the Lt. Governor. Over 20 other organizations have also endorsed or approved BagUps.
BagUps are available online. Please visit http://www.bagups.net or call 1-917-885-6655.",23.0,2,"1 Campaign
|","BERNARDSVILLE, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/bagups/pica

1NE 9INE 8IGHT 4OUR is a premium denim brand heavily inspired by pop culture, which can be found in the glaring details of each design. We aim to unite the world in our differences, with an obsessive focus on design, production, promotion, consumption and appearance. We deliver jeans to the world with movement, inventive composition, style and classic fits.

Inspired by cycling, each blueprint introduces movement in the details, while skillfully constructed and infused with various washes, stitching, leather straps, finely crafted pockets, buckles, motos, fading, cuffs, and simply put a great deal of originality. 1ne 9ine’s premium denim jeans and shirts will make the original blue jean feel mediocre.

","THE /NTRODUCTION1NE 9INE 8IGHT 4OUR is a premium denim brand heavily inspired by pop culture, which can be found in the glaring details of each design. We aim to unite the world in our differences, with an obsessive focus on design, production, promotion, consumption and appearance. We deliver jeans to the world with movement, inventive composition, style and classic fits.
THE STORY
In 2011, our co-founders Lexi Cook and Anthony Henderson came together to begin creating the first collection in a small Harlem, New York apartment titled
column2: Amsterden/m Segment. The two sought to combine inspiration from two of Lexi's favorite places Amsterdam and New York City blended with Anthony's love of Classic American denim work wear and functional sports wear. The result
column3: the fusing of Lexi's Dutch obsession with her home base. Anthony's passion for denim, which in his view is as much an original American art form as say Jazz or Rock & Roll. Our love for freedom of movement with functional quality construction. This inspired them to bring these influences together as one through their designs. It's Amsterdam inspired style meets New York City cool combined with Classic Americana. ONE NINE EIGHT FOUR DEN/M.

column1: THE COLLECT/ON

The Amsterden/m Segment Collection consists of 15 pieces for both men and women. Inspired by cycling, each blueprint introduces movement in the details, while skillfully constructed and infused with various washes, stitching, leather straps, finely crafted pockets, buckles, motos, fading, cuffs, and simply put a great deal of originality. 1ne 9ine’s premium denim jeans and shirts will make the original blue jean feel mediocre. ""We were searching for a more formative denim brand to add to our closets and it seemed simple to just create our own. Most of our favorite designers were becoming too equivalent. With 1ne 9ine’s it is uniquely about the wash, blueprint, and flair."" 9INE'sTHE CROWD (YOU)

We have spent a lot of our own money on creating patterns, sourcing materials, making samples, and securing manufacturing quotes to produce our apparel. We will use 100% of funds to manufacture our first collection, premiere the collection in Fall 2015 and hire a design assistant. THE TEAMMeet Lexi“I'm a cultivated, romantic hippie whose obsession for America in the 1950's, known for it's style and grace, often has me awaiting my next adventure. Those adventures are portrayed into the brand. I'm motivated purely by my adoration for denim and a passion to leave my mark on the world much like 50's Hollywood
column2: fusing classic and style. My idea of a perfect day is a glass of red wine, listening to the ocean, and reading a great book, preferably on a yacht or polar opposite.” Meet Anthony""I have always been obsessed with dressing well. The importance of

column1: personal style and keeping oneself presentable was instilled in me as a
child by my parents. I still remember wearing hard stack heel shoes that
took weeks to break in and my Mom telling me to ""suffer for fashion!""
You could say that notion resonated with me and informed my fashion
sensibilities to this day. My motivation behind the brand is to solve a
personal dilemma of wanting high quality garments that allow the body to
move comfortably and naturally.""WE ARE INVESTED TOO…
If you're just as anxious as we are about our launch, check out what's happening now...
ART/ST EDITIONS

For the launch of ONE NINE’s T-shirts, Lexi Cook collaborated with Andy Sheffield of Cure for the Common Studios to launch a three-part series of signature tees, styled ART/ST EDITIONS that will encourage you to think, if only for a moment.
Pre-order now at shop.onenines.com
WHY 1NE 9INE’s?

What goes into designing each pair of denim jeans for 1NE 9INE 8IGHT 4OUR can only be called insanity at its finest. We magnify the freedom of expression, that small freedom so often taken for granted, and reinvent the blue jean through this creative madness. Welcome to 1ne 9ine’s unconventional journey where we produce DENIM GOODS /NOT FOR EVERYONE.

OUR JEANS.

FadBoard is a patented system comprising a digital screen on a barrier belt or pole for advertisement. It can bring internet advertisement to anyone including people that are not connected to the internet or not sitting in their living-room watching TVs. Ads will be displayed where people are in line relatively doing nothing. Yet, FadBoard ads will be cheaper than TV Internet, Radio, Paper or billboard.
column7:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

Using a computer tablet on barrier-belt pole, FadBoard is displaying pictures and videos slideshows of ads.

Contents are being managed from an online Content Management System (CMS) and customers can open an account in order to upload their ads themselves, pick the time range for the ads to run and checkout all online
column8:
in a nutshell, it’s hassle free.

All ads will be verified electronically using a programming paradigm and if anything is detected the ad will be flagged for human verification.
column10:
/>

Compared to traditional advertising, FadBoard is a revolution in many ways. Considering the safety risks involving regular Outdoor Billboards along highways
column11: where drivers barely divert their attention from the road to read them
column12: the obsolete indoor paper panels only featuring one ad or direction at a time
column13:
FadBoard offers endless opportunities. In addition, Indoor TV ads in stores and public areas are inconvenient as they stand above reach near the ceiling where people are technically not looking.

As for regular TV, research found that 80% of people fast-forward commercials on recorded shows or switch channel to check what’s on elsewhere. Let alone Internet ads, which are too intrusive, and users are more and more equipped with tools to block them.

FadBoard stands out as the solution for passive ads at the right place and most importantly at the right moment. In fact, people have time to watch and take notes from the ads while waiting in the barrier belt. This invention can be used for Advertising, Internal Information, Menu Information and Brand Building to influence consumer behavior, and thereby enhance customer experience.


 Other Patented FadBoards Mobel:

See image bellow:

column1: • 1-FadBoard Tablet
• 2-Locking Belt Head
• 3-Bottom part of casing that secure the casing to the barrier belt
• 4-Multiple Air entrances for cooling the system
• 5-Joint: allowing the screen to tilt
• 6-Heavy gauge steel post will not dent and scratch like aluminum
• 7-Full weight 14"" diameter vase for maximum stability
• 8-Full circumference rubber floor protector for maximum protection against floor scuffing

column3: >9-Belt that links one barrier belt to another
column9:
> For over a year, we've been working on creating a beautiful product that is simple and of great quality. Inspired by a clean and contemporary design, we’ve been working with industry leaders to create the best possible product to suit any businesses, anywhere.

We have more than 1000 hours of test time on our current FadBoards.

 The FadBoard you can see today is a real working prototype. It's the result of over months of testing, developing, designing and building.

We are now ready to take FadBoard into full production!With your help and support, we can bring FadBoard to businesses all around the world and change the way advertisement is done forever.

Your contribution will help us:

column1: • Optimize our final design
• Order production tooling, molds and fans.
• Obtain all necessary global certifications
• Launch production
• Build our content management system

FadBoard Android Tablets are the actual tablets we use inside the FadBoard Devices and the same ones we offer as rewards.


Technical Specifications of the FadBoard Android Tablet

Operating System:    Android 4.0 
CPU: RK3066, Cortex-A9 Dual Core processor 1.6 GHz
GPU: 4 Core Mali 400. Support OpenGLES2.0/1.1, OpenVG1.1
RAM / Technology:    DDR3
RAM Installed Size:    1GB RAM
Hard Drive Capacity:    16GB
PCMCIA Expansion:    Micro SD Card / T-FLASH(Support 32G MAX)
Display Technology:  LED  Screen
Screen Size:    10.1 inch
Max Resolution:    1280x800
Wireless Connection:    WIFI
3G:    Supporting external 3G modem
Video:    AVI/RM/RMVB/MKV/WMV/MOV/MP4/DAT(VCD format)/VOB(DVD format)/PMP/MPEG/MPG/FLV/ASF/TS/TP/3GP/MPG
Audio:    FLAC/APE/WAV
Picture:    JPG/BMP/PNG/GIF
HDMI: Built-in HDMI Out Port.
Bluetooth: yes
Extend Port: Yes 260.6x170.6mmx9.6mm

design studio. Our goal is to assist women with the process of exiting prostitution
and sex trafficking by helping them to find an alternative livelihood and
develop the confidence and self-worth they need to succeed.
Women in the sex trade are exposed to
physical and emotional violence on a daily basis, and many of them develop
dependencies as coping mechanisms. Prostitution is one of the most extreme
forms of oppression of women, and breaking out of it is a
difficult and frustrating process. Designing and producing clothes provides
participants with a positive way to contribute to and integrate themselves into
normative society.
Turning the Tables' studio is located in
Tel Aviv, Israel, and offers women vocational training in different fashion
specialties, such as sewing and pattern making. The studio also employs its
graduates and functions as an economic hub for their small businesses <i style=""color: rgb(106, 106, 106)
column5: >(in the picture: Jennifer Kim, one of our hub designers, showing her designs).

column1: Women who participate in our programs are given the skills and
confidence they need to leave prostitution and begin their career in fashion – and many of them selling their products out of our studio.
Leaving the cycle of prostitution requires the support of a community. In supporting our programs and
investing in these women, you are enforcing the message that they have important
things to contribute to the world. Your support reinforces the fact that there
are no prostitutes - there are only women who have been caught in the cycle of
abuse that is prostitution.
What We Need
We’re proud of our studio and the programs that we provide, and
now Turning the Tables is ready to take its next step forward.
The funds we raise in this campaign will help us to develop a
line of T-shirts and bags that will keep the studio running strong and enable
us to continuing growing professionally. Here’s where your support will go:
launch our bags and T-shirt line.
enable us to serve 15 more women this year.
expand our efforts by empowering us to open a studio in another city in Israel
this year.
Perks!
Our talented participants want to thank you for your support and
have developed gifts in a wide array of beautiful colors and designs.
More About Us:
Turning the Tables is a non-profit organization, based in Tel
Aviv, Israel. Since 2011, we have been serving dozens of women a year. Overall,
we employ 2.5 staff members, whose work is supplemented by a team of 20
fantastic volunteers who act as professional mentors for our participants. In
addition to providing women with the professional and financial skills they
need to leave prostitution, Turning the Tables also partners with a variety of organizations
to ensure that our participants receive the emotional and social care they
require and deserve.
You can read more about us here:
How we started (English) – New York Times
Interview (Hebrew) - Orly &
Jennifer Kim, one of our talented designers, talks about her journey (Hebrew) – Time Out Israel
Special Thanks to:
Volunteers:
Liraz Pank - video shoot
Our
Supporting Partners: National Council of Jewish Women, The Good People
Fund, Hadassah Foundation, Tel Aviv University’s Economic Justice Clinic, and
The Joseph and Suzanne Michaan Family Foundation
Other Ways to Help
Please share our campaign with your community via Facebook,
Twitter, and email!

Where Leggaci Began…

When emerging fashion designer, Phoenyx Reign, began sewing at 8 years old little did she know she was destined to change lives with her designs.  How can one change lives with clothing you may ask?  Phoenyx Reign would say… “by dressing your clients from the inside out...”

If you’ve attended one of my shows, you’ve heard me ask the question “What sense does it make to put a beautiful design on a woman that feels like CRAP”?   Along my journey thru design school and into the fashion industry I’ve made a conscious decision to focus on dressing women that the industry doesn’t cater to.  “I wanted to dress women who had fit issues like me… curves… hips, thighs, boobs…  bodies…. real ones”.  And so I became a custom clothier, and focused primarily on individual designs for private clients with fit issues.  Yet, other women wanted to know how they too could get clothes that fit their curves without having to hire a personal designer.

One of the “staples” of each of my collections has always been a great pair of leggings!  Because I work mostly with curvy and plus models, they have been PLEASANTLY surprised that the leggings felt so great and fit so well!  After hearing more women complain that most of the leggings they were finding in stores being too tight in all the wrong places,  as well as there being limited to NO options of cool, fun, funky, fabrics and styles for thicker ladies… I began offering my leggings for sale and the response has been awesome!!
What makes LEGGACI Leggings by Phoenyx Reign so special?
<ul>
<li>
QUALITY:  I use only the best quality 4-way stretch fabric.  You’ll immediately notice that even when fully stretched you can’t see thru the fabric and won’t be exposing your undergarments!
<li>
CUT/FIT:  Although I have a size range, each order is checked against the clients measurements and custom cut to ensure the best fit.
<li>
CONSTRUCTION:  Leggaci brand leggings have reinforced seams to prevent pulling.  1in non-roll elastic is used in the waist to prevent the waist from rolling down while wearing.
<li>
DESIGN:  Curvy girls like to have fun too!!!!  Thus far I’ve offered options like fun fashion colors, accent zippers, and even lux leggings with bling, chains, and other embellishments.
LEGGACI Leggings by Phoenyx Reign, and the ladies that wear them, need YOUR help to grow this brand and expand the styles offered! Won’t you help by leaving YOUR Leggaci?
What I’ve Done… What We Need… and What YOU Get

So far, even with limited resources, sooooo much has been accomplished.  I’ve showcased the leggings at several fashion shows to excited audiences.  I’ve perfected the “Leggaci FIT” so as to be able to offer the leggings in different sizes.  I’ve launched the initial designs on my facebook fan page and am gaining more and more followers each day!  Currently, Leggaci leggings are available thru direct sale from me the designer, as well as online thru my etsy store.   I’ve also be blessed to have my first celebrity wearing Leggaci leggings… she’s a beautiful curvy diva, and wanted some FLY leggings for performances!  I made several customs for her... this was the feedback I got...“Your leggings are a HIT around the world”!
At the writing of this campaign I’m just about to run my very first magazine ad for Leggaci!

I plan to continue selling primarily thru my etsy store until there is sufficient funding to launch a full-fledge website exclusively for LEGGACI leggings… I think they’re special enough to deserve their OWN website!
Where will the money you contribute go?
<ul>
<li>
<strong>WEBSITE &amp
column2: MARKETING:  LEGGACI needs a home!  I will build a website exclusive to Leggaci.  The reason Leggaci needs its own website apart from my main site it that I also plan to offer clients the option of customizing/personalizing their own pair of leggings via the website!

column1: The marketing campaign for LEGGACI will be both online and in print.
<ul>
<li>
LABELS:  Every great brand MUST have a signature label!  Currently I’ve been producing my own labels in small quantity.  It’s time to have the LEGGACI Brand Labels created and produced in quantity.
<ul>
<li>

SUPPLIES:  Fabric, Fabric, and more Fabric!  As I said above, curvy girls like to have fun too!!!  I’ve seen some GREAT fashion fabrics… Hey I’m a designer in LA and the garment district is only a stones throw away… but I need to purchase in bulk… bolts at time instead of yards at a time.
In addition to fabric, additional supplies such as quantity of non-roll elastic, and trims, chains, crystals and stones, zippers, etc for embellishments and design options.
<ul>
<li>

PHOTO SHOOT and LOOKBOOK:  Last, but certainly not least.  I’ll conduct a photo shoot with the celebrity spokes model for the main marketing campaign.  As well as a model shoot for the official Lookbook and website photo gallery.

GOAL:  I believe that with your support, I’ll be able to reach my full funding goal.  However… should we fall short, and not reach the entire goal, I will re-adjust the priorities and implement as many of the above items as possible!  LEGGACI is growing every day, and I believe this campaign will be just the boost needed to fully launch!
Remember...feel confident whatever you are wearing

They don’t call me “Ms. Haute CurveZ” for no reason!  Love your curves, and demand that retailers begin carrying lines that fit YOUR body!  Know that you are “fearfully and wonderfully made!”  Whatever you do DON’T spend another dime on leggings that don’t fit properly!!  Instead, be comfortable and sexy, in leggings that fit they way they SHOULD!
Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you are unable to contribute to the campaign you can still lend your much appreciated support!  Spread the word, share the link to this campaign.  “LIKE” my Facebook Page (www.facebook.com/hautecurves)... follow me on Twitter and Instagram (@speak2reign) and tell all your curvy fashionistas about this HAUTE NEW LINE OF FABULOUS LEGGINGS CUT WITH CURVES IN MIND!!

column1: (""Taylor Jones No. 0001"")
INGENIERÍA
INNOVACIÓN AL SERVICIO DE
Presistem y por lo tanto la del equipo de
ANGELHELMET, es la de salvar la vida y cuidar de los trabajadores, que
laboran en los empleos más peligrosos, y para los cuales se tienen pocos
sistemas, teniendo en cuenta el avance tecnológico que tenemos actualmente en

la sociedad.
Es por ello que
Precursora de Ingeniería y Sistemas S.L.  decidió cesar sus labores de

mantenimiento de comunicaciones y fibra óptica en una de las minas subterráneas mayores de España. 
Abandonamos una posición cómoda y apostamos por un proyecto cuya misión es más costosa y dura
pero a la vez mas satisfactoria, basta el ayudar a un operario en peligro o  salvar una vida para que nuestros objetivos se vean colmados.
<b style=""font-size: 15px
column3: >COMO NACIÓ EL SUEÑO DEL ÁNGEL

column1: sueño…El Angelhelmet
Angelhelmet el resultado
de un sueño que tuvimos en Presistem. En su nacimiento, comenzó siendo un casco
electrónico de seguridad integral (CESI), creció transformándose en un casco
inteligente (SMARTHELMET) y ha terminado madurando como un Ángel (ANGELHELMET). Este Ángel es capaz de velar en todo momento por la integridad, la seguridad y
la vida de los trabajadores de minas y operarios de grandes industrias, ya que
una macroindustria puede tener similares peligros que una mina a cielo o rajo
abierto, por lo que la protección es igual para un operario u otro. De hecho
para todo el equipo, sus vidas son igual de importantes imprescindibles y de
valor infinito, son… nuestra prioridad.
Para nosotros éste
sueño, es el futuro y lo hemos hecho realidad tras más de tres años en los que
lo dejamos todo para dar el máximo de nuestras capacidades, todo se ha hecho
posible gracias a un gran esfuerzo exento de interés económico, colaboraciones
de grandes grupos de ingenieros unidos por una idea y científicos que tras
visualizar las posibilidades, no dudaron en formar parte del sueño, trabajando
con  grandes corporaciones como IAT
(Instituto Andaluz de Tecnología) y el CSIC (Centro Superior de Investigaciones
Científicas). Tenemos ya cerca el día en el que la vida de los mineros o de los
trabajadores de industria dentro y fuera de la tierra no correrá peligro.
Cada vez más cerca el
instante en el que la mayor preocupación de una madre o una hija de un minero o
trabajador de riesgo, sea recordar a su padre que no trabaje sin su
Ángel de la guarda.

column2: >Fase en la que nos encontramos y que precisamos...

column1: Precisamos una pequeña financiación, desde personas que tengan en valor la vida y la seguridad en los trabajos mas peligrosos.

Hemos terminado las fases de diseño, prototipado y pruebas. Nos encontramos en la antesala de la fabricación en serie y precisamos una cantidad económica que nos permita no demorar dicha fabricación , para poder cuidar de las familias.
Visita nuestro Facebock o Youtube y veras que:
-Este Ángel es conocido en radio, TV, o prensa escrita mundial
-Fue considerado elemento de seguridad mas innovador en la feria minera más      importante del mundo (Exponor 2013, celebrada en Chile)
-Es esperado por mineras importantes para pruebas piloto
-Es aplaudido por entidades gubernamentales
-Tiene interés en mas de 14 países que se han puesto en contacto con nosotros
PARTICIPA CON NOSOTROS Y SIÉNTETE PARTE DE ALGO IMPORTANTE QUE CAMBIARÁ EL MUNDO.
<span style=""font-size: 24px
Regalo por la inversión de 175€

Obtendrá Un casco inteligente ANGELHELMET de edición limitada, se fabricaran 1000 UNIDADES ÚNICAMENTE. Estas unidades numeradas, se distribuirán entre los primeros 1000 inversores que apoyen el proyecto.
Los inversores obtendrán:
-La pertenencia a un grupo selecto poseedor de una de las primeras 1000 unidades del casco ANGELHELMET, cuyo uso se tiene previsto en las minas mas grandes del mundo.
-La seguridad de que su contribución salva vidas
-La inclusión en una lista de inversores que se tendrá expuesta en la factoría de ANGELHELMET principal situada en España
Las unidades de esta EDICIÓN LIMITADA tendrán:
-Homologación y certificación para su uso
-La electrónica necesaria para operar en Modo isla o exterior con sistema GPS-GPRS
-Numero de Serie de edición y Nombre grabado en el casco

","ANGELHELMET
LAST GENERATION ENGINEERING, DEVELOPMENT AND TECHNOLOGICAL INNOVATION FOR WORK SAFETY

The motivation of Presistem and therefore ANGELHELMET team, is to save life and take care of employees working in more hazardous jobs, and for which there are few systems, taking into account the technological advances that have in society today.
That is why Precursor Engineering and Systems SL has decided to cease maintenance of fiber optic communications and one of the largest underground mines in Spain.
We left a comfortable position the project whose mission is expensive and hard, but also more satisfying, vast the help an operator in danger or save a life so that our objectives are fulfilled.
ANGELHELMET presentation.
How were you born?How is it?What gives?...
Data sheets
Stage where we are and we need ...
We need a small amount of funding from people who have value to the lives and safety in the most dangerous jobs.
We finished the phases of design, prototyping and testing. We are on the verge of mass production and we need a sum of money that allows us not to delay mass production, to take care of families.
Visit our facebock or Youtube and see that:
-This Angel is known in radio, TV, or newspapers worldwide
-Was considered most innovative safety feature in the show world's most important mining (Exponor 2013, held in Chile)
-Important mining is expected to pilot tests
-Is applauded by government entities
-This has interest in more than 14 countries that have been in contact with us
PARTICIPATES U.S. AND FEEL IMPORTANT PART OF SOMETHING THAT WILL CHANGE THE WORLD.
Gift 1
EXCLUSIVE GIFT (only 1000 pcs)Gift for the investment of 175 €
You will get a , these units will be numbered and will be distributed to the first 1,000 investors to support the project.
Investors will:
-Membership in possession of a select group of the first 1000 units ANGELHELMET helmet, whose use is scheduled in the world's largest mines.
-The security of your contribution saves lives
-The inclusion of a list of investors who have exhibited in the main ANGELHELMET factory located in Spain
The units of this LIMITED EDITION will have:
-Approval and certification for use
-The electronics required to operate in island mode or outdoor with GPS-GPRS system
-Editing Serial Number and name engraved on the helmet
(""Taylor Jones No. 0001"")

sueño…El Angelhelmet
Angelhelmet el resultado
de un sueño que tuvimos en Presistem. En su nacimiento, comenzó siendo un casco
electrónico de seguridad integral (CESI), creció transformándose en un casco
inteligente (SMARTHELMET) y ha terminado madurando como un Ángel (ANGELHELMET). Este Ángel es capaz de velar en todo momento por la integridad, la seguridad y
la vida de los trabajadores de minas y operarios de grandes industrias, ya que
una macroindustria puede tener similares peligros que una mina a cielo o rajo
abierto, por lo que la protección es igual para un operario u otro. De hecho
para todo el equipo, sus vidas son igual de importantes imprescindibles y de
valor infinito, son… nuestra prioridad.
Para nosotros éste
sueño, es el futuro y lo hemos hecho realidad tras más de tres años en los que

Ángel de la guarda.
……dentro de poco, del resto no se habrán de preocupar… por lo que a la

”Salvamos Vidas”

What is Swoon?

A revolutionary cosmetics tool for use in retrieving every last bit of gloss from your favorite lip gloss tube. Swoon comes sheathed in a sleek cover for on-the-go convenience and can easily be stored in your make up bag alongside your favorite gloss.
Why Swoon?

I am a lip gloss lover. Not lip stick, lip gloss. I love its sheen, shine and the way it makes my pout perky.  No matter the brand, the applicator never reaches to the bottom of the tube.  I decided to solve the problem,and set out on a mission to create an easy-to-use beauty tool that promises to give you more puck for your buck.
Our Goal:
We're raising $9,500 to cover the cost of MOLDS, SAMPLES &
column2: PRODUCTION to bring Swoon to life for the millions of lip gloss lovers who hate waste and love to save money!

column1: How does it work?

Swoon’s flexible application head - made from the same material in fine calligraphy pens - enables lip gloss lovers to access every corner of the bottom of the lip gloss tube. Its extra long applicator neck is designed to reach every spot of the lip gloss tube no matter the brand.  Swoon's elegant and easy to hold handle facilitates a perfect lip gloss application.
Why is it called swoon?
Part spoon, part applicator - lip gloss lovers will “swoon” over this tool's money saving, product-extending powers.
How is it different from a lip brush?

A lip brush is for application only and does not help save product. Most lip brushes are too wide to fit into the mouth of a tube of lip gloss, and even if they can fit into the tube, the brush is not designed to retrieve gloss from every corner of the tube. Swoon’s long, thin neck was specifically designed to easily fit into the opening of lip gloss tubes.
Do I need to purchase a new Swoon for each lip gloss tube?

Like a lip brush, Swoon can be used across multiple lip gloss colors.  Unlike traditional lip gloss applicators with sponge tips, Swoon’s applicator tip does not absorb the gloss.  If desired, the tip can be easily cleaned with the swipe of a baby wipe.
Will Swoon work with every brand of lip gloss tube? Have you tested this?
Yes, it’s been tested with nearly every brand of prestige lip gloss available at department stores.
Why should I choose Swoon?

One third of women surveyed* agreed that their inability to get every last bit of gloss from their lip gloss tube is a point of pain. The cost of a prestige lip gloss tube can range between $21 – $49, but traditional applicators leave 1/5 of the gloss (and your money) behind in the tube. So, if you take the average price of $35/tube and the Swoon savings of $7/tube x 4 (the number of tubes purchased by the average gloss wearer annually) = $28 per year or $1,764 over a lip gloss wearer’s lifetime.
I'm a guy, why do I care?

If you're a guy who likes girls who like gloss, you'll win their favor when you show up with this cutting edge, money saving cosmetics tool.  If you don't like girls who like gloss, but you love beer and for some reason couldn't access 1/5th of the beer in your beer bottle, and someone gave you a tool to get to it, wouldn't you buy it?
How will you use the money raised on Indiegogo?

Money raised via indiegogo.com will go toward the development of molds, samples and production. Our manufacturer is PLA Moulds, based in China.  It will take 40 days for molds to be developed. Once we recieve and approve the molds and samples, it will take another 12 days to produce the first run of Swoon.  It will ship from our manufacturer in China to our distributor, Thill Logistics in Wisconsin and then to you, our Swoon supporters. Swoon supporters will be the very first to exclusively receive Swoon before it’s available in stores all while maximizing their favorite gloss.
","What is Swoon?

A revolutionary cosmetics tool for use in retrieving every last bit of gloss from your favorite lip gloss tube. Swoon comes sheathed in a sleek cover for on-the-go convenience and can easily be stored in your make up bag alongside your favorite gloss.
Why Swoon?

I am a lip gloss lover. Not lip stick, lip gloss. I love its sheen, shine and the way it makes my pout perky.  No matter the brand, the applicator never reaches to the bottom of the tube.  I decided to solve the problem,and set out on a mission to create an easy-to-use beauty tool that promises to give you more puck for your buck.
Our Goal:
We're raising $9,500 to cover the cost of MOLDS, SAMPLES & PRODUCTION to bring Swoon to life for the millions of lip gloss lovers who hate waste and love to save money!

A Brief Look at a Life Inspired

My name is Connally McDougall and I'm a tailor from Victoria, BC, Canada, but I grew up in Mittersill, Austria and Budapest, Hungary, while my parents served as missionaries. I learned to sew from my grandmother and then from older craftswomen in the towns where I lived. From traditional dirndls and lederhosen to costumes for theatre in Budapest, I was blessed to see from an early age how much time and work go into making one garment. My exposure to global cultures and a deliberate way of dressing make me acutely aware of the damage disposable clothing makes on the environment and society. It's better to buy one piece of outstanding quality than dozens of cheaper things that will fall apart. My vision is to have a fashion house that celebrates global traditions but also employs women in indigenous contexts for their artistic craft in beading, leathers, painted silks, etc and advocating fair and equitable wages. As the fashion industry continues to grow, it's important to have each stakeholder’s voice heard.

Until last August, I was entirely self taught. However, after hosting a silent auction in Victoria, BC, I raised $3700--enough money to take a short course at the highly prestigious Central Saint Martins (CSM) School of Design in London. I excelled in the focused environment and have been accepted to study full time in Fashion Design Womenswear beginning September 23rd of this year. Collectively from all fine arts disciplines, CSM has 1900 students. Each year out of thousands of applications, ten candidates are interviewed for each available spot. Out of hundreds of applicants, my portfolio was chosen to join the program. I am still pinching myself! The offer to learn from the best opens a menagerie of doors for me. At CSM, it's not about learning the fastest, cheapest way to make clothing, but rather the best way. As an artist, entrepreneur and as a woman, to be granted the opportunity to work hard and live out my vision at the highest level possible is astounding. I can't believe that I not only have found my passion, but have also found a path for my future.

Using architectural silhouettes and rich details, I design for confident international women. Colour, texture and quality are fundamental for me. My work celebrates the curvature and angularity of the human body. Balancing geometry and the cerebral side of design with instinct and passion is the goal. My perspective is to show not just a woman's beauty, but also her intellect, determination and strength. Exposed flesh alone does not denote sensuality.  While  my theory and concept are clear and I can express how the garment could be put together, without guidance I cannot fully articulate my goal of having a couture fashion house. I want to grow and improve and I know there is  a broader audience for my fashion concepts, but I have only two hands.  Because I’ve taught myself the techniques with books and practiced into very late nights, I’ve made my way through sewing custom designs for years.  I have often taken on projects not knowing how to physically sew them but muscling through with research,passion and determination. It is a roundabout way of learning that accommodates the work I do for clients, but I've burst through the glass ceiling and am ready to study, design and succeed on an international stage.

I've spent years trying to be the best patternmaker, the best tailor, the best seamstress, the best marketer, the best researcher, and the most innovative designer on my own. It’s impossible. My capacity to self-educate has taken me this far and to continue, I need the direction and collaborative support that only Central Saint Martins provides. I am humbled to be accepted into a program that will change my life, my family's lives and maybe your life too. Alumni from the fashion programs include Bruce Oldfield, John Galliano, Stella McCartney, Alexander McQueen, Phoebe Philo and the school works directly with the major fashion houses. Graduates from CSM are abundantly supported. A degree from CSM is regarded as comparable to one from Oxford or Harvard and is a distinction that will make me highly employable.  My bullheaded drive and imagination have propelled me forward and I'm confident in my future.
<div>
<h3>What I Need &amp
To acheive my educational goal, I need:

As an international student at CSM, tuition for my first year of a three year degree program is $19,950 per year, not including housing, fees and travel costs. I need to raise $30,000 to meet my funding requirements:
·$19,950 = cost of tuition
·$1,500 = international student fees (for a student visa and health coverage from the school)
·$8,600 = student housing

Because I am an international student at CSM, tuition is must more costly than if I could study in Canada or if I had EU citizenship. Also, student loan interest rates will incur a factor of double the cost of school fees (if I borrow $30,000, I will actually be in debt for $60,000 Yikes!) so instead I am looking for private and corporate sponsors. After applying for scholarships and grants, I saved $6,000 and put down my deposit for school, ordered my textbooks and bought my plane tickets. To raise money, I have done bottle drives, alterations, raffles as well as continuing to make custom clothing and evening wear. I am driven to meet my funding goal and am unafraid but aware of the hard work involved. I am going to get my degree from Central Saint Martins and be a great designer--my one presenting obstacle is financial need.

If I don't meet my total fundraising goal, the money will still be paying for school, but I will be able to take out a smaller student loan. I am happy to live on rice and beans if I'm studying at CSM! If I surpass my goal, the money will go towards paying for my second year of the three year degree program. Thank you so much in advance for your generosity and belief in my vision.
In gratitude, you will receive:

Truly, every donation helps me tremendously.  If one person told a few of their friends about my campaign, and they told a few more of their friends, and so on, it's not just possible, it's definitely achieveable.
Perks for Your Generosity
-$15 High Five :  exactly what it sounds like!  When you come to my studio, mention your name and you'll get a high five! (can be substituted for elbow nudge) Thank you so much for your help.
-$25 Social Media Shout - Out : You or your business will be featured on my Pinterest Facebook and Twitter pages, reaching over a thousand fans daily. Thank you very much!
-$75 Limited Edition Signed Print : You will receive a signed, artist's proof print of an original illustration as well as a social media shout-out. Thank you for helping me so much!

-$200 Black Wrist Cuff : From my Fall/Winter 2013 collection, you will receive a unisex, one size fits all black cuff made of silk and cotton jersey, reclaimed leather and neoprene. The perfect accessory and an easy gift item. You'll also get a social media shout-out. Thank you so very much.
-$500 Sponsor Cuff Set : As a sponsor, you will receive a set of two cuffs, made to order in your choice of colour(s). You'll also get a social media shout-out. Thank you so much for supporting me.

-$1000  Benefactor Original Art : As a benefactor, you will receive an original, one of a kind illustration, signed, mounted and framed. You will also receive a social media shout-out and 15% off future orders. Thank you for making such an impact.

-$5000  Patron Shift Dress : As a patron, you will receive from my Fall /Winter 2013 collection,  a merino knit shift dress (The ""Dagmar"" dress if you look at www.facebook.com/connallymcdougalldesign ) in your chosen size (XS-2XL), a social media shout-out, 15% off future orders and a reserved seat at my fashion shows and events.  Thank you for changing my life!

-$10,000  Gold Patron Custom Design : As a gold patron, you will receive a custom dress made to measure as well as an original signed and mounted illustration of your unique dress design. You will also get a social media shout -out, 15 % off future orders and a reserved seat at my fashion shows and events.  Thank you for making my dreams possible and impacting my career.

-$20,000. Platinum Patron: As a platinum patron, you will have put me through a full year of tuition and will receive a custom, made to measure gown or suit and a full colour original illustration of your unique design signed, mounted and framed. You will also have a voice in creative and business elements as I build my brand. In addition, you will receive 15% orders for life and reserved seats for you and a guest to my fashion shows and events. Thank you for believing in my vision and making it a reality.
<div>
Other Ways You Can Help
If you aren't in a position to contribute funds, there are other ways I could really use your help
Please spread the word: tell your friends, colleagues and family about this campaign.
Please share the link: your social media is a great outlet to share this indiegogo campaign
And of course, please use the indiegogo tools to promote and support this campaign
Your time means a lot to me and I deeply appreciate your support.
Follow me on twitter https://twitter.com/connallymcd
Follow me on Pinterest www.pinterest.com/connallymcd
Check out photos, updates and more on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/ConnallyMcdougallDesign

Our Story

Hello everyone,  My name is Jeff Jordan and with my co-worker Joseph Kelley, we are the creators of  ""The Perfect Wastebasket."" We created this product after Joseph  had been frustrated trying to find a wastebasket that  even moderately blended with his guest bath decor. Together we have designed a simple system that both hides the plastic bag and is easily customized to match or contrast literally any room's decor. Simply put, we have taken the lowly wastebasket and turned it into a design element instead of an eyesore. We are also currently designing a toothbrush holder and tissue dispenser with similar features. In other words we are giving your room a custom accessory makeover limited only by your imagination.

During our research and development of the product, we have had overwhelming positive response from all lookers, both male and female, from interior decorators who love the design element to sports fans who can change teams or sports designs any time they want. The possibilities are literally endless, from kids' room themes (Trains or Unicorns, perhaps?), vacation pictures, matching paint, a wallpaper remnant (Jeff's favorite), or even a high-fidelity monogram! We are going to include some card stock inserts for painting or customizing. We also will be hosting contests for the most creative use of The Perfect Wastebasket. Since it really is a ""blank slate"" Jeff's son (an APPLE FANATIC!) printed a cool APPLE logo and now has a unique themed wastebasket instead of an ugly one, and you can't see the bag.
What We Need &

We are almost ready to go into production, so we know our supporters will be happy with the time frame and thrilled with the product. Our struggle, and why we need your help, is to buy equipment to thermoform the product.  When we get this equipment we can begin making the Perfect Wastebasket, so that everyone can have one, and your pre-order will arrive much sooner. We have evaluated all forms of plastic manufacturing (injection molding, rotational molding, 2 part plastics, etc.) and found that thermoforming is the ticket, as it has a lower start up cost, scaleable production, and a shorter production time. We have located a manufacturer of automated thermoforming equipment, and has agreed to build a custom machine, set it up, train us on it and provide tech support (he has 30 years experience). This machine is costing $12,000 and takes 3 weeks to build. This machine will allow us to 1) build small quantities to start and test. 2) modify the product as customer response comes in. 3) allow us to make production runs up to 60 units/hr. We have financing in place to ensure getting to manufacturing. Any funds raised over the cost of equipment will be used for materials and packaging supplies.
Other Ways You Can Help

If you really like this idea, you can help us out by sharing our project with your friends on Facebook and Like our page. We would love to see some creative uses for this product, and would love to start building a community around this idea. Thank you for your support!

We are almost ready to go into production, so we know our supporters will be happy with the time frame and thrilled with the product. Our struggle, and why we need your help, is to buy equipment to thermoform the product.  When we get this equipment we can begin making the Perfect Wastebasket, so that everyone can have one, and your pre-order will arrive much sooner. We have evaluated all forms of plastic manufacturing (injection molding, rotational molding, 2 part plastics, etc.) and found that thermoforming is the ticket, as it has a lower start up cost, scaleable production, and a shorter production time. We have located a manufacturer of automated thermoforming equipment, and has agreed to build a custom machine, set it up, train us on it and provide tech support (he has 30 years experience). This machine is costing $12,000 and takes 3 weeks to build. This machine will allow us to 1) build small quantities to start and test. 2) modify the product as customer response comes in. 3) allow us to make production runs up to 60 units/hr. We have financing in place to ensure getting to manufacturing. Any funds raised over the cost of equipment will be used for materials and packaging supplies.
Other Ways You Can Help

If you really like this idea, you can help us out by sharing our project with your friends on Facebook and Like our page. We would love to see some creative uses for this product, and would love to start building a community around this idea. Thank you for your support!",1.0,0,"1 Campaign
|",,https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-perfect-wastebasket/pica

Hi! Welcome to my Indiegogo campaign page! I hope you like what you see here and don't go without leaving your mark somehow, either by contributing or by spreading the word and sharing the campaign with your friends and followers!

Update (2013/07/19): The campaign is over and I made my goal (yay! thank you so much, everyone!) so I will be ordering a new laptop and working on all your perks as soon as Indiegogo gets my credit card contributions to my bank account. While I wait for that new laptop so I can do everything I need to do without melting into a puddle, I am open to other contributions or preorders - simply paypal me at battlesinthemorning@gmail.com and indicate the perk you'd like to receive in the notes. You can check perk prices on the sidebar here! I will get in touch with you as I will with all other contributors once I can begin work. Thank you!
Introduction

My name is Lix Hewett and I'm a 23-year-old woman from Ciudad Real, Spain. I'm a fine art photographer and dabble in a number of other arts, some with more success than others. I've been interested in fashion design since I was a teenager, and this year I finally found the courage to teach myself how to sew. In April, it occurred to me that I could combine my two passions - photography and fashion - by designing and making clothing and accessories with fabric printed with my original photography. After some research, I found Spoonflower, which allows you to design your own custom fabric and have it printed and sent to you. It's great, and it's affordable - or it would be if I had a source of income.

However, both my parents are unemployed, we're barely getting by on my mom's benefits, which run out in September, and finding work in my country without greatly exacerbating my social anxiety is - well, difficult. Having an Etsy shop has allowed me to gain some experience as a photographer and given me a venue to share my ideas, but it doesn't bring in enough money to make a single clothing item to show off and sell, let alone a full collection. To make things even harder, my laptop - which I need to design the fabric - is six years old, slow, noisy, and quick to overheat and shut down. I can hardly edit my photographs for printing on paper
column2: creating the more complicated designs for my fabric, especially for larger pieces like dresses, on it would be impossible.

column1: Campaign Goal
I would like to raise enough funds to:
Buy a new MacBook Pro
This will allow me to create fabric print designs, patterns, and sketches, as well as edit product photography, do graphic design, market and sell my work online.
Create a small collection of clothing and accessories
This will allow me to get my ideas made, photographed and available for sale online. The funds for the collection break down as follows:
<ol>
• Fabric from Spoonflower printed with my designs
<li>Fabric for lining &amp
• Thread, zippers, buttons, elastic and other supplies
The Collection

I have so many ideas we'd be here forever if I laid them all out, and it would take a lot more than $600 to get them all made. Because of that, I am going to be focusing on two things for my first collection: my favorite clothing ideas, and the various little things that don't require as much money or as many supplies to make.
The Little Things
These include:
<ol>
• Phone and tablet sleeves and padded covers
• Coin purses, zipper pouches, cosmetics bags and pencil cases
• Business card holders
• Pillow covers and lavender sachets

Few of these require more than a fat quarter of fabric to make, and they're simple designs, which means I can make them in just about any print. I would like to make a few of each to show, and allow potential customers to pick other prints if they wish. If any contributors claim the above as rewards, their items - with their choice of print - will be the ones going up in the shop. I will fill out my portfolio by making more of the above with leftover fabric from the rest of the collection.
The Collection
Includes:
<ul><ul>
<li>Clutches
<ul>
• Foldover clutch in a soft and springy blue green print
• Foldover clutch in this romantic pastel green and white print
<li>The Aria clutch: envelope clutch in <a href=""https://www.etsy.com/listing/125239700/abstract-photography-8x10-fine-art-print?ref=shop_home_active"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">this black &amp
column2: white print, inspired by Aria from Pretty Little Liars

column1: • Envelope clutch in an abstract emerald green print
• The Hanna clutch: a foldover based on traces of her, inspired by Hanna from Pretty Little Liars
• Dresses
<ul>
• The Emily dress: a mid-sleeve comfortable dress in cotton knit interlock featuring this ombre blue ocean print, inspired by Emily from Pretty Little Liars (sense a theme?)

<li>The Aria dress: a ruched dress with cap sleeves in the same <a href=""https://www.etsy.com/listing/125239700/abstract-photography-8x10-fine-art-print?ref=shop_home_active"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">black &amp
column2: white print as the Aria clutch

column1: • A sundress featuring this print along the bottom
column2: design and color of the dress as a whole to be determined when I can make the design on a new laptop

column1: • Skirts
<ul>
• A twisted skirt in my favorite rain print, such small hands
<li>A flared skirt in <a href=""https://www.etsy.com/listing/125719865/nature-photography-8x10-fine-art-flower?ref=shop_home_active"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">this pastel green &amp
• Tops
<ul>
• A crop top in this brown architecture print
• An autumn tee in autumn leaves
Rewards for Contributors

See the above list? You can have any of those things, made to your size (even the bags, if you'd like to specify!), even customized to your liking if you want to work with me. On the sidebar, you can see what each contribution can get you. In short, if I can make it, you can pre-order it. After all, the point of this campaign to get my collection out there!
In addition to the above items, I am also offering:
<ul>

• Store credit for $5 and above contributions, to be used on any items offered in my Etsy shop by December 31, 2013. That means if you can't afford a reward right now but want one, or don't want to decide until you see what I have to offer, you can contribute now and get your donation in store credit. To use the credit, you'll only have to contact me (via Etsy convo or e-mail), and I'll set up a custom listing for you!
• Graphic design for blogs and Etsy shops - something I love to do but hardly ever can on my awfully slow laptop.
• A pincushion! Cute, right?
Spreading the Word

If you can't contribute much, or at all right now, but would like to support me in some way, that's okay! I can absolutely understand not having money to spare. I would be enormously grateful if you simply spread the word about my campaign by sharing it on your social media sites, on your blog, with your friends, anywhere you can. Refer enough people to me, and who knows - you may just get a reward.
Feel free to grab a button:
Keep Up With the Campaign

To stay up to date on what's going on, what I'm making, what I'm offering, what I'm doing, you can sign up to follow the campaign by clicking the 'follow' button above. If you haven't unsubscribed from recurring e-mails from Indiegogo, you will receive all updates I post to the campaign in your e-mail.
In addition to that, you can keep up with me on:
<ul>
• Facebook: Lix Hewett / Lix Hewett Photography
• Twitter: @LixHewett
• Blog: A Classic Notion
• Pinterest: aclassicnotion
You can contact me through any of those sites, and I'm always reachable by e-mail at lixhewettphotography on gmail if you have any comments or questions.

Thank you so much for reading, and I hope with your help I can make this campaign a success!

STORY
column2:
>

Ninja have been a part of Japan’s history since ancient times when they served those in power including daimyos and feudal lords as secret intelligence forces. It goes without saying that ninja are a part of Japan’s history, but they are also an inseparable aspect of Japan’s culture.

To create a jacket that can make anyone become a ninja, it seemed necessary to incorporate a hood that entirely hides the face and black material to conceal one in the shadows since they are both essential for espionage, and it’s these two elements we will craft into a superbly stylish jacket for this project.

 

DETAILS

The NINJACKET was created using a lightweight jersey material for ease of movement, resulting in modern wear designed after the stealthy outfits of quick, agile ninja that can be worn daily, even during sports. It was also created with consideration paid to it being Insulated and soft to the touch.

NINJACKET
column3:
>

・The hood(not detachable) is designed after those worn by ninja and stands out prominently with its accented color line.
column4:
> 

・Features an extra long collar that zips up to hide the face below the eyes.
column5:
>

・The chest features an overlapping chainmail design that isn’t printed but rather cut and sewn together.
column6:
>

・The sleeves feature a covering for the backs of the hands that attaches with a finger loop.
column8:
>

 

NINJA pants (Available as a set with NINJACKET)
column9:
>

・Pants are also available as a set. Features a design that incorporates the hakama (formal trousers) and kyahan (leggings) worn by ninjas. Made of the same jersey material as the NINJACKET.
column10:
>

・Features an elastic waistband for comfort and ease of movement and a cord for the perfect fit.
column11:
>

・The cuff of the pants features ribbing designed to resemble kyahan.
column12:
>

They also have a ribbed hemline, and when worn together with the jacket they create a full-body silhouette, turning the wearer into a true ninja.
column13:
>

 

Versions

NINJACKET

Three color options are available: Black x Red, Black x Blue, and Black x Yellow.
column16:
>

NINJA Pants (Available as a set with NINJACKET)

The color is only Black.
column18:
> 

Created with fun in mind, NINJACKETS can even be used to distinguish teams in an AR or survival game.
column20:
>

 

Are you ready to don a NINJACKET and become a ninja?
column24:
>

NINJA Pants (Available as a set with NINJACKET)
column25:
>

 

Materials

NINJACKET Top: 95% polyester, 5% polyurethane

NINJA Pants: 95% polyester, 5% polyurethane

 

PERKS
column26:
>

*3 Jackets : You can choose the color of each NINJACKET from Black x Red, Black x Blue, or Black x Yellow (NINJA Pants available in black only) 

 

Stay Updated!

PR KIT

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/8ypsmzccg2ppf8f/AAB_...

 

WHO WE ARE
column27:
>

To everyone viewing this campaign page, hi there!

My name is bamboo, and I’m the project producer, in charge of the production of these jackets here! If you’re wondering who I am, in Japan I’m known as the vocalist of milktub, a punk rock band mainly involved in anime and game music. I also produce apparel and goods for the brand Studio696. To date, we’ve created countless apparel and merchandise for game makers and artists within Japan.

We focused on the following concepts...

column1: • Creating that which does not yet exist.
• Creating something suitable for everyday use.
• Creating an item that is both durable and appealing enough to be worn for years to come.
• Creating something that will both appeal to guys as cool and appeal to girls as cute.

column2:
>

In April 2016, we at STUDIO696 succeeded in crowdfunding the Samurai Armor Hoodies, hoodies that make the wearer look like a modern day samurai, through the U.S. crowdfunding platform Indiegogo.

All of us behind the project were astounded and overjoyed by the number of backers we received, which vastly surpassed what we imagined. With all of the hoodies safely shipped out, we are now challenging ourselves with the launch of a new project.

Continuing on from the Samurai Armor Hoodies, we at STUDIO696 will be releasing a ninja-themed jacket called the NINJACKET, which will be the newest addition to our ongoing “Suspicious Person Hoodie” series.

We’ve launched this follow up to the Samurai Armor Hoodies so that everyone around the world can stylishly enjoy Japan’s world-renowned ninja culture.

 

Shipping
column4:
High-Quality International Delivery

Your perks will be delivered to your doorstep by the Tokyo Otaku Mode Premium Shop, an online shopping website that has delivered to as many as 100,000 homes in over 100 countries and regions around the world. With high quality packaging designed to endure the international journey and friendly customer support staff that will take full responsibility for your package until it arrives in your hands, you can rest assured!

 

Campaign Team

column1: • Project Head: bamboo from milktub (Japanese anime song artist)
• Production: Studio696.Ltd
• Marketing and Promotion: Tokyo Otaku Mode Inc.
• Contributor Support and Perk Delivery: Tokyo Otaku Mode Inc.

FAQ

 

Q: Where are the jackets shipping from?

A: Straight from Japan, fulfilled by Tokyo Otaku Mode.

 

Q: When will my jacket(s) arrive?

A: Your jacket(s) are scheduled to ship in March 2017, and should arrive at your doorstep by April.

 

Q: Do I need to pay any additional import duties, VAT, customs taxes, or local handling fees?

A: Depending on your country’s customs laws, you may be required to pay a tax before obtaining your package.

 

Q: Can I machine wash my jacket(s)?

A: Yes, but please use a washing bag in order to avoid damaging the fabric.

Architecture is an important part of any urban landscape and continues to be a means to share the history and culture of a community and draw in people from all walks and backgrounds. Detroit is home to some of the finest architecture in the U.S., and many of Detroit's skyscrapers and buildings are some of America's most endangered landmarks. These gems along with the communities that make up the great city of Detroit continue to inspire us, so we created a line to reflect that.
column2:
> 
DETROIT GRID WRISTLET
column3:
>  
PEACE. LOVE. DETROIT. WRISTLET

More than Detroit Swag
Our well-crafted products feature surface designs and patterns that are bold, vibrant and elegant. They are a collection of tea towels, pillows, posters, and wristlets that are inspired by Detroit’s landscape &
column4:
most prized architectural gems. Most importantly, a percentage of proceeds will go towards organizations that help preserve these structures and work to enhance the lives of those in surrounding communities like Preservation Detroit which serves to protect Detroit’s built environment and CDC which provides education, employment and economic development for the Detroit community.

When you purchase one of our thoughtful, well-made pieces, 20% of the proceeds supports Detroit preservation &
column5:
community development.  You could help fund the work to turn an old, abandoned structure into an affordable home or you could help educate the public about an important architectural treasure in Detroit.

Choose from the styles shown here when you back this project! Just shoot us an email telling us which style you prefer.


FISHER BUILDING SCREEN PRINTED POSTER

Stylish goods that celebrate Detroit's rich architecture, landscape &
column6:
community is what the Detroit Collection is all about. 
Scarlet Crane Creations has partnered with William + Bonnie to bring you the Detroit Collection. We are designers with a passion for stylish goods and a heart for Detroit. Serving in Detroit for several years as makers and artists, we aim to inspire people and their surroundings with high-quality goods for fashion and home decor. We’re all about preserving this great city along with it’s beautiful built structures and YOU can join the party!
column7:
> 
DETROIT LANDMARKS PILLOW W/ INSERT (Button closure styles may vary)

 
DETROIT LANDMARKS PILLOW W/ INSERT (Hidden zipper)

We have started production on the first batch, but need your help to finish and get our products to a large number of retail outlets because the more we sell, the more money we can donate to preserve Detroit’s beautifully built environment.

You’re ready to support securing Detroit’s history? Great! Here are the easy steps:

column1: • We raise enough to complete the first batch of products
• We bring the products to you or a local boutique.
• Profits go toward preserving Detroit’s buildings and communities
• We all help grow Detroit and share our love for this great city and it’s residents.

Stylish and made to last
Our products aren’t mass-fabricated home goods and accessories. They are screen printed on natural fabrics with care by Scarlet Crane Creations and assembled by the fabulous Detroit-based, cut &
column2: sew operation, William + Bonnie. Both companies are proud members of the local maker community and partner with many artists and designers around the city of Detroit to produce work that has been featured on WWJ radio &amp
column3:
Crain’s Detroit.


DETROIT LANDMARKS TEA TOWEL

We use only the best materials and take much time and care in making each piece, so we need your help to launch the first run of these items to bring them to market. If we meet our larger goal of $2800, you as a backer will get one of our a limited edition Fisher Building poster.

MEET OUR TEAM

Shayla Johnson of Scarlet Crane Creations
Shayla Johnson is a local designer and maker in the Detroit area with a heart for historic preservation in the city. She is owner and designer of Scarlet Crane Creations, which celebrates “ideas that matter in our everyday lives” with home goods and accessories that include hand-lettering, modern illustrations and pattern design.

Sarah Ayers of William + Bonnie
William + Bonnie is a cut and sew shop located in Hamtramck, Michigan.  Surrounded on all sides by Detroit, Hamtramck has long been home to a flourishing creative scene.  After launching our own line of chic cycling wear, we recognized the need from the creative community to provide a one-stop resource for emerging fashion designers.  Pulling together our team of creative collaborators, colleagues and friends, we are proud to launch our Consulting Services.

Can’t contribute? You can still help!
Share with your friends and let’s make some noise about preserving Detroit’s beautifully built community and structures.

SHARE
Take just 5 SECONDS to use the share buttons up top or click here to spread the word and start some conversations around preservation in Detroit!

SAY HI
We’d love to hear from you! If you have any questions or words of wisdom to share with us, we are all ears. Feel free to contact us at hello@scarletcrane.com.

","Architecture is an important part of any urban landscape and continues to be a means to share the history and culture of a community and draw in people from all walks and backgrounds. Detroit is home to some of the finest architecture in the U.S., and many of Detroit's skyscrapers and buildings are some of America's most endangered landmarks. These gems along with the communities that make up the great city of Detroit continue to inspire us, so we created a line to reflect that. DETROIT GRID WRISTLET  PEACE. LOVE. DETROIT. WRISTLETMore than Detroit SwagOur well-crafted products feature surface designs and patterns that are bold, vibrant and elegant. They are a collection of tea towels, pillows, posters, and wristlets that are inspired by Detroit’s landscape & most prized architectural gems. Most importantly, a percentage of proceeds will go towards organizations that help preserve these structures and work to enhance the lives of those in surrounding communities like Preservation Detroit which serves to protect Detroit’s built environment and CDC which provides education, employment and economic development for the Detroit community.When you purchase one of our thoughtful, well-made pieces, 20% of the proceeds supports Detroit preservation & community development.  You could help fund the work to turn an old, abandoned structure into an affordable home or you could help educate the public about an important architectural treasure in Detroit.Choose from the styles shown here when you back this project! Just shoot us an email telling us which style you prefer.FISHER BUILDING SCREEN PRINTED POSTERStylish goods that celebrate Detroit's rich architecture, landscape & community is what the Detroit Collection is all about. Scarlet Crane Creations has partnered with William + Bonnie to bring you the Detroit Collection. We are designers with a passion for stylish goods and a heart for Detroit. Serving in Detroit for several years as makers and artists, we aim to inspire people and their surroundings with high-quality goods for fashion and home decor. We’re all about preserving this great city along with it’s beautiful built structures and YOU can join the party! DETROIT LANDMARKS PILLOW W/ INSERT (Button closure styles may vary) DETROIT LANDMARKS PILLOW W/ INSERT (Hidden zipper)We have started production on the first batch, but need your help to finish and get our products to a large number of retail outlets because the more we sell, the more money we can donate to preserve Detroit’s beautifully built environment.You’re ready to support securing Detroit’s history? Great! Here are the easy steps:

column1: We raise enough to complete the first batch of products
We bring the products to you or a local boutique.
Profits go toward preserving Detroit’s buildings and communities
We all help grow Detroit and share our love for this great city and it’s residents.

Stylish and made to lastOur products aren’t mass-fabricated home goods and accessories. They are screen printed on natural fabrics with care by Scarlet Crane Creations and assembled by the fabulous Detroit-based, cut & sew operation, William + Bonnie. Both companies are proud members of the local maker community and partner with many artists and designers around the city of Detroit to produce work that has been featured on WWJ radio & Crain’s Detroit.DETROIT LANDMARKS TEA TOWELWe use only the best materials and take much time and care in making each piece, so we need your help to launch the first run of these items to bring them to market. The Galactic Hub Project is a Civilized Space community focused on exploring a specific area of the Euclid galaxy with other players. This includes The Arm of Vezitinen and 10 specific surrounding regions. To show your love for this community, please pledge any amount above £1 ($1.31) to the IndieGoGo campaign. To guarantee a metallic, hard enamel 'Galactic Hub' pin badge use the 'PERK' option.
When donating, you must include your email or Reddit username. Otherwise it will be considered an anonymous donation - which is certainly appreciated!
All pins will be sold on Etsy. Donors to the IndieGoGo campaign will receive a coupon code to wave all costs on the storefront.
Any small amount of profit will be split between u/AndyKrycek6 (the person managing this campaign) and u/morgvom_org (the artist of the emblem).

IndieGoGo's minimum goal amount is £500. We don't expect to reach that amount, however with their flexible goal amount, we can keep all contributions regardless of whether the goal is met. So any and all contributions are welcome to kick this off

My name is Burson Sprague, I am a very fashionable designer and artist living in St. Louis, MO. I've always loved the idea of owning an apparel line, and I finally get to share the idea with the people. I've always been known to create beautiful and simple design contrasting with intricate hand-drawn artworks. My designs are something that need to be seen. With both elegant and rustic graphics, my designs are sure to catch your attention. But that's not what makes High Pine Clothing Company so different. All of my designs are printed on mostly-vintage, thrifted clothing. Starting with only tee shirts, jackets, and prints, I hope to work into selling button-ups, bags, hats, and much more all for affordable prices. Each vintage and hand-picked, graphic tee shirt costs only $12 with the jackets only costing $30 as well. I hope that watching the promotional video and seeing these wonderful designs and ideas come to life, you will have the desire to support my love for design and fashion. Thanks so much, and don't forget to donate!

Risks (Uh-Oh)

The only risks able to be seen here are if there are a heavy amount of orders coming in are over the available resources (because the clothing is resale). But that will be recovered as soon as possible and may only be a set back for no more than a day.","Hello, Everyone!
