Risks &
column2:
Challenges

The team behind Kairos has decades of years in experience combined in hardware and software development. However, the biggest challenge in any hardware start-up is the suppliers.

column1: Fortunately, KAIROS has been able to put together a dedicated group of high quality suppliers from around the world. Display &
column2:
Touch Sensors: South Korea, PCB / Battery: China/Hong Kong, Mechanical movements: Japan (Miyota Citizen), Swiss (Soprod). In fact, Kairos already has a working POC unit (Display was provided by Samsung Display - please note, production model display supplier has not yet been finalized). 

There is however, the risk of delays. Although we have prepared and prepared ... unforeseen circumstances can delay the production from weeks to months. Things like FCC / CE certifications, tooling and retooling (if changes are required), and funding (if extra funding is required), can all cause delays. We will do our absolute best in meeting the estimated shipping dates and we will share all details of the production via our Facebook and Blogs as we have done so in the past.

column1: <hr/>

Kairos Team: 

We are not ex-Googlers, or ex-Apple, or ex-Samsung guys. We are guys (and gals) from around the world that share the same dedicated PASSION for Kairos. Here is a list of a few of our team members so far:
Enlarged version can be viewed at www.kairostband.com
<div>
<div>
","Watches express who you are.

Kairos T-band allows you to wear your favorite wristwatch while enjoying all the benefits a smartwatch can bring. Smartwatches and wearable devices (smart bands) are here to stay. It began as a simple notification extension of your smart phone. It evolved into counting your steps, calories, and sleep patterns. We are now seeing more and more app support where you can control music, turn speech to text, GPS navigation, and also remote starting your vehicle. More recently a lot of attention has been given to the health benefits of a wearable device. The ability to constantly measure your heart rate, sweat, stress levels, etc., can help analyze your body in a manner we have never seen before.
But there's just one problem. Watches expresses who you are. Not everyone is a techie and may not want to wear a watch with the same brand that makes refrigerators. The solution? Kairos T-band!
Watches are more than just an accessory that tells time. It’s a personal story. It’s your own brand identity.What color, style, and brand you wear tells a story about who you are.""
It holds sentimental value. Memories are infused to it.
It’s an asset – something you hold onto and possibly pass on. This is why Kairos T-band was created. Enjoy all the benefits a smartwatch can provide without sacrificing what you love.
T-band. The revolution begins now.
T-band ND / HD / OD:
There are three models of the T-band.
T-Band ND (No Display):
(* T-band ND shown with KAIROS MSW 115M model)
T-BAND ND (No Display) model is designed for people who want
extended battery life, basic notifications (via vibrator and multi-color LED
indicator), and activity (fitness/sleep), health data monitoring without the
need for fancy displays or touch sensor capabilities. This is the ultimate
businessmen’s smart watch, or rather a wearable device (smartband). Battery
life is expected to last more than 7 days with the ND model.
Features:
On board Kairos OS will be able to push notifications such as text messages,
incoming calls, and also push alerts from available apps via a discreet
multi-color LED indicator and/or vibrator motor. On top of having multiple
sensors such as 9-axis gyroscope, accelerometer, compass and optical sensor,
the ND model also gets GSR (Galvanic Skin Sensor) which detects skin
temperature and sweat.
T-BAND HD (Hidden Display):
T-BAND HD (Hidden Display) model is designed for people who
want all of the smart watch functions while being super discreet. LED panels
are embedded below a thin “membrane” like material which hides the display. When
it’s turned off (default mode), the T-band HD actually looks like the ND model
(rubber band). When there is a push notification or alert, the hidden LED panel
lights up and display the necessary information. Battery life is same as the OD
model (200mAH) which is expected to last 2-3 days on a full charge. The HD
model however has one downside- it can only display English alphanumeric text
and numbers. Non-alphabet characters (such as Chinese, Japanese, Korean Arabic,
Russia, etc.) will not be displayed. Images and videos are also not able to be
displayed through this model.
T-BAND OD (PMOLED DISPLAY):
T-BAND OD (OLED Display) model is designed for the ultimate
techie who also loves his/her analog wristwatch. The unit is comprised of a
curved PMOLED display (active viewing area 11mmx25m with 170dpi resolution),
touch sensor, and hardened mineral glass with special anti-scratch coating. The
display is adequately bright with equally adequate resolution. Kairos has opted
to go with these specs in order to maximize battery life. The unit is powered
by ARM® Cortex-M4 processor with Dual mode Bluetooth Classic and BLE. This
setup allows the T-band to be compatible with a wide range of smartphone models
(from old to new). The OD model is also equipped with an on board Mic for
Speech to Text capabilities (requires 3rd party app support).
KAIROS MSW 115: MECHANICAL ANALOG WATCH w/ JAPAN MOV'T
*MSW 115M Mechanical Watch with Rubber and Leather Band
*MSW 115G - Double Plated Rose Gold Mechanical Watch with Rubber and Leather Band
*MSW 115B - DLC Plated All Black Mechanical Watch with Rubber and Leather Band
Award winning design (Red Dot Design Award 2014 – Honorable Mention).
The MSW 115 model design was inspired by inverting the traditional desktop
computer and recreating nostalgic memories of the PC revolution. The face plate
mimics a PCB design, while the second hand has been turned into a fan blade to
mimic the fan on the desktop used to cool down the electronic components. A fan
cover (mesh) is positioned on top of the open heart (wheel balance) area as
well. The watch dimension is 13.5mm high and is 46mm in diameter (excluding
crown). This version will have the popular skeleton lug designs from the
initial concept drawings (actual photos shows non skeleton design as the
prototype of the skeleton design lug ends were not ready at the time of the photo
shoot). Weight is approximately 120g. MSW, as well as SSW models are designed
for true-watch enthusiasts who prefer larger dimensions and solid weight.
However, keep in mind that with different adapters on the T-band you are able
to interchange the watch with other watch brands. (Some watches have very
unique size or lug end designs. Although Kairos will try to make numerous types
of adapters, availability for all lug end sizes and designs is not guaranteed.)
The MSW 115 models are equipped with Miyota Japan Movements
(part of Citizen Group). It uses the highly reputable and reliable 82S7 model
(21 Jewels, 21600 bph, 42 hour power reserve). The watch is 3ATM (30meters)
water resistant.
Materials: Stainless steel 316L, Double Gold plating (for
Gold models only), DLC coated Black (for Black models only), Sapphire Crystal
glass.
KAIROS MSW 158: MECHANICAL ANALOG WATCH w/ SWISS MOV'T
*MSW 158M Mechanical Watch with Rubber and Leather Band >
*MSW 158G - Double Plated Rose Gold Mechanical Watch with Rubber and Leather Band
*MSW 158B - DLC Plated All Black Mechanical Watch with Rubber and Leather Band
The SSW 158 model brings together classical design elements
with a sporty edge. Enlarged numbers provide character to the design as well as
demanding attention. The SSW 158 design was designed to attract attention from
1 meter away, but also look exquisite up close. The watch dimension is 13.5mm
high and is 46mm in diameter (excluding crown). This version will have the
popular skeleton lug designs from the initial concept drawings (actual photos
shows non skeleton design as the prototype of the skeleton design lug ends were
not ready at the time of the photo shoot). Weight is approximately 120g. MSW,
as well as SSW models are designed for true-watch enthusiasts who prefer larger
dimensions and solid weight. However, keep in mind that with different adapters
on the T-band you are able to interchange the watch with other watch brands. (Some
watches have very unique size or lug end designs. Although Kairos will try to
make numerous types of adapters, availability for all lug end sizes and designs
is not guaranteed.)
The SSW 158 models are equipped with a highly reputable
Soprod Swiss movement (part of Festina Group). It uses the A10BV-2 movement (25
Jewels, 28800 bph, 42 hour power reserve). The watch is 3ATM (30 meters) water
resistant. SSW 158 models also have an open back design (hardened mineral
glass) that proudly shows the movements. It also has Kairos logo engraved on
the rotor.
Materials: Stainless steel 316L, Double Gold plating (for
Gold models only), DLC coated Black (for Black models only), Sapphire Crystal
glass.
The Perks:

The perk list on the right may seem overwhelming, but in fact it's pretty simple. It's broken down to two categories: Early Bird Special, and Regular Pre-Order discount special. Each category has these options:T-BAND ONLY - option to purchase T-BAND ND, HD, or OD only. KAIROS ANALOG WATCH ONLY - option to purchase your choice of MSW or SSW models and the various colors. KAIROS ANALOG WATCH WITH your choice of T-BAND COMBO - option to select your choice of watch and T-band.
KAIROS ANALOG WATCH + T-BAND ND COMBO units:
MSW115M +T-BAND ND         MSW115G + T-BAND ND        MW115B + T-BAND ND
SSW158M + T-BAND ND        SSW158G + T-BAND ND        SSW158B + T-BAND ND
KAIROS ANALOG WATCH + T-BAND HD COMBO units:
MSW115M + T-BAND HD         MSW115G + T-BAND HD         MSW115B + T-BAND HD
SSW158M + T-BAND HD        SSW158G + T-BAND HD        SSW158B + T-BAND HD
KAIROS ANALOG WATCH + T-BAND OD COMBO units:
MSW 115M + T-BAND OD        MSW115G + T-BAND OD         MSW115B + T-BAND OD
SSW158M + T-BAND OD         SSW158G + T-BAND OD        SSW158B + T-BAND OD
More photos are available for viewing from http://www.kairostband.com
KAIROS OS:
Light. Functional. Robust.
Kairos Team has been hard at work creating a solid platform
(OS) for Kairos products. The platform is based on a time-tested system called
RTOS (which is used by several other smartwatch companies already). Kairos OS
will be compatible with iOS, Android and Microsoft Phones. Instead of focusing
on the ability to play certain games, play video clips, take photos, or making
it compatible with as many apps as possible, Kairos OS has been focused on
reliability, functionality, and compatibility with the most core and essential
apps available. Another benefit this brings is the extra battery power it can
provide – even with a smaller pack. Kairos plans to make SDK/API packages
available for third party developers from Q2 of 2015.
FEATURES
NotificationText messages, E-mails, Incoming calls … Whatever it is, Kairos T-band will keep you informed.
Push-alerts
Notifications from your favorite apps can be pushed out to Kairos T-band. Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp, Wechat, Kakao and much more can be integrated to work with Kairos T-band.

Remote ControlYou can use Kairos T-band as your remote control for your smart phone or tablet PC. Take camera shots from far away. Control your music while walking. Send pre-set text messages while driving. Remote start, control, and monitor your vehicle (requires additional modules to be installed in your vehicle). It’s all in your control.

InterchangeableKairos T-band is designed to work with any analog watch. Simply change out the band on your regular analog watch with the T-band to transform it into a smart watch. Various adapters will be available to fit different size and shape lug ends.

Fitness/HealthKeep up to date with your activity. Find out how many steps you’ve made, how much calories you’ve burned and how long your activities were. Fitness and Sleep acitivities will be powered by Misfit. Furthermore, with the added Optical sensor and GSR sensor (only for T-band ND), you can also track all of your health data as well. T-band will be able to push your data to third party apps such as Google Fit, Apple Healthkit and Microsoft Health.

Multi-language supportEnglish, French, Spanish, German, Russian, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Korean and Japanese language support will be available on a rolling basis (via firmware updates). More languages will be supported over time. Please note, T-band HD/ND only supports English alphabets and numbers.

*Kairos OS will focus on bringing popular app support such as Facebook, Twitter, Spotify, Skype, Office Suite and more. Additionally, Kairos will also do its best in working with popular apps from different countries such as Wechat, Kakao, Line, Sina Weibo, QQ, Yahoo Japan, and Mail.ru.

column7: > and we are here to give you leather jackets that are crafted to perfection using only the highest quality leather from the finest tanneries. All that at an affordable price tag! And we're doing this by cutting the middle man out and sharing the profits directly with the craftsmen.

column4: >And not only that we're giving you a personalized experience and a perfect fit with

column2: >Just like the mountains these are timeless durable designs which are going to last you a lifetime and will never go out of style. These jackets do not break apart but get better with time.

column4: >We stand behind our claim of durability &amp
column5: quality so much so that we're offering you a life time warranty. If anything breaks EVER! Just send it back and we will fix it for you

column2: >Hispar is created with top grain 0.9 mm Nubuck leather, which is famous for being water repellent and weather resistance. It features a high collar with an adjustable collar strap. Snap button closure at the waist with two loops allowing a waist size. Hispar comes in black color with a black inner satin lining.

>Inspired from the vintage Bomber Leather Jackets from world war II era, Rakaposhi is made with top grain calf leather (0.9 mm). Traditional stretchable waist and sleeve panels are there to give the user a perfect fit. Rakaposhi features a front YKK zipper closure, 7 pockets and an extra collar compartment. Rakaposhi is available in Ferret Brown with a brown satin inner lining.

>Naltar is a modern take on the classic 50’s double rider jacket created with top grain calf leather (0.85mm) and polyester padding for protection (upper arm). The jacket comes with two adjustable buckle straps on the each side, which allows the user to adjust the fitting easily. The inner lining is black satin.

>Deosai is a slim fit modern racer jacket made out of 0.75mm top grain calf leather. The jacket has three point adjustable collar with snap buttons for the neck. It has two functional zippers which isn’t only a design feature but you can adjust the fit with it. Deosai comes in Mocha brown with a brown inner satin lining.

column1: Baltoro is made with the finest quality top grain 0.75mm Sheep Leather. Extremely lightweight, comfortable and yet durable. It features a banded collar, which gives the jacket a subtle look. Sleeve zippers enabling the user to adjust the opening. It comes in beige with a white satin lining.

column2: >Don't get us wrong, leather is expensive but it's not as expensive as luxury brands make you believe. Big budget brands spend on marketing, advertising, warehousing and pay off half a dozen middlemen. On top of which they charge you huge margin. We've slashed all the middle men out and are producing goods for you and shipping directly to your doorstep. That means a big price cut and a fair share to the craftsmen working on the product.

>We believe in fair business practice that's why we not only have craftsmen on payroll but they are part of the team, they get a share in each sale on top of that going forward we want to be able to give them free health benefits, an education for their children and a pension plan.
>All this while keeping the price low and with your help we can!

column4: > from US, has to say about working with

column1: It all started when my friend giving me a leather jacket on my 20th birthday. It was the best present that I ever got, it was then and there that I fell in love with leather jackets and in future it would prove to be the catalyst that changed my life.

Pakistan my home country is among one of the largest leather producing nations. My love for leather jackets led me to Sialkot a Pakistani city acclaimed globally for leather products. I got the chance to visit the tanneries and met the leather craftsmen. It was a great learning experience to be among the people who were actually creating the things i loved.

I moved to England for my studies and saw the price tags on jackets made from my country and I was surprised to see the difference between how much it actually costed to make one and the retail price. More importantly how less the craftsmen got out of it and I wanted to do something about it.

When I came back to Pakistan I went straight to Sialkot to my surprise, skilled craftsmen struggled to get work. The one’s that did was at low wages and the over all conditions weren’t all that great. I wanted to change that I had the tech experience and my passion for leather the collaboration came naturally.

So I teamed up with people in the industry, set-up stitching unit in Sialkot. We collaborated with designers and starting working on our first line of jackets and after 2 years of hard work we are presenting Mont5!

Over the last two years we have been working on selecting the best materials, perfecting the fit, testing different leather types for their quality, grain, pattern and most importantly, feel on the body while wearing.

We have managed to put all pieces together and have brought these five designs to life. Raised initial funds in November last year and managed to procure leather and other raw material. Hired team of stitchers, patron masters and cutters on permanent salary.
Now we need you guys to keep supporting us so that we can make impact through your help in lives of skilled craftsmen for longer run.

column2: >We have named our jackets after famous peaks, valleys and glaciers that exist in the northern region of Pakistan.

column1: We believe in a world where no animal is harmed or is put to suffering merely for fashion. Therefore, we have a very rigid set of policies that clearly define our line of work.
<ul>
• We stand against all acts that lead to a jeopardy in animal extinction.
• Animal skins come with predefined requirements.
• No trading is being done in exotic leather.
• We accept leather material only from the meat production bred animals.
• NO animals are harmed only for the sole purpose of hide extraction.

column3: />

column2: >Since we have been making Leather Jackets for customers in different countries around the globe from 2013, all our processes including leather supply, manufacturing, quality control and fulfillment infrastructure is firmly in place. Based on our experience, we are confident that we will be able to deliver well before our deadlines.

>Having said that, there are always risks of delay in anything which is handmade and involves such level of details. We will write our backers regularly throughout the campaign (2-3/month), and keep them posted on the progress. In case of any queries, we are just an email away i.e.team@mont5.com

column1: Multiple jacket rewards are for those friends and family who would like to order more then one jacket and save some extra money.
All jackets will be shipped in single parcel to one address.
Can the jackets be altered ?
column4: >Yes, our professional tailors can alter your jacket. we can surely make a larger jacket small but can’t make a small jacket large. The shipping charges, to and from Pakistan, will be paid by backers.

column1: Can I change my pledged perk with some other offered perk after campaign ends
column4: >Yes you can. If your pledged perk has higher value than the one you would like to change to, we will give you discount voucher equivalent to the difference. The voucher can be used for shopping on our website or here on indiegogo. If your pledged perk has lower value than the one you would like to change to, we will send you a PayPal invoice for the difference.

column1: How do I give my jacket size and shipping address ?
column4: >After the campaign ends, you'll receive a survey to submit all the required information. That’s where we’d be asking you for your shipping information and jacket size.

column1: How do you handle shipping ?
column4: >All the rewards will be shipped FREE of charges, anywhere in the world :)

column1: How do you handle exchanges for size ?
column4: >Custom size orders are not exchangeable. You can request exchange for regular size jackets (Shipping charges for exchange, to and from Pakistan, will be paid by backer).

column1: Where MONT5 jackets are made ?
column4: >Our jackets are made in Sialkot, the Industrial capital of Pakistan. Things in Pakistan are way different than the projected image. The country is a home to over 1 Million skilled craftsmen. MONT5 craftsmen have been crafting leather for generations, standing the test of time. Our jackets are primarily made out of our passion on the purpose to keep our art alive.

column1: Why should I wait for One month ?
column4: >Because you are interested in old-world craftsmanship over mass production. Moreover, we don't have jackets or part-of-jackets already made for you, we don't play that game. To make your jacket(s), we shall start from making pattern, cutting leather to lasting, stitching and finishing. This takes time and attention.

column1: <div style=""text-align: left

","We are MONT5 and we are here to give you leather jackets that are crafted to perfection using only the highest quality leather from the finest tanneries. All that at an affordable price tag! And we're doing this by cutting the middle man out and sharing the profits directly with the craftsmen.
And not only that we're giving you a personalized experience and a perfect fit with ZERO extra costs.
Just like the mountains these are timeless durable designs which are going to last you a lifetime and will never go out of style. These jackets do not break apart but get better with time.
We stand behind our claim of durability & quality so much so that we're offering you a life time warranty. If anything breaks EVER! Just send it back and we will fix it for you Free of cost.

Hispar is created with top grain 0.9 mm Nubuck leather, which is famous for being water repellent and weather resistance. It features a high collar with an adjustable collar strap. Snap button closure at the waist with two loops allowing a waist size. Hispar comes in black color with a black inner satin lining.

Inspired from the vintage Bomber Leather Jackets from world war II era, Rakaposhi is made with top grain calf leather (0.9 mm). Traditional stretchable waist and sleeve panels are there to give the user a perfect fit. Rakaposhi features a front YKK zipper closure, 7 pockets and an extra collar compartment. Rakaposhi is available in Ferret Brown with a brown satin inner lining.

Naltar is a modern take on the classic 50’s double rider jacket created with top grain calf leather (0.85mm) and polyester padding for protection (upper arm). The jacket comes with two adjustable buckle straps on the each side, which allows the user to adjust the fitting easily. The inner lining is black satin.

Deosai is a slim fit modern racer jacket made out of 0.75mm top grain calf leather. The jacket has three point adjustable collar with snap buttons for the neck. It has two functional zippers which isn’t only a design feature but you can adjust the fit with it. Deosai comes in Mocha brown with a brown inner satin lining.

Baltoro is made with the finest quality top grain 0.75mm Sheep Leather. Extremely lightweight, comfortable and yet durable. It features a banded collar, which gives the jacket a subtle look. Sleeve zippers enabling the user to adjust the opening. It comes in beige with a white satin lining.

Don't get us wrong, leather is expensive but it's not as expensive as luxury brands make you believe. Big budget brands spend on marketing, advertising, warehousing and pay off half a dozen middlemen. On top of which they charge you huge margin. We've slashed all the middle men out and are producing goods for you and shipping directly to your doorstep. That means a big price cut and a fair share to the craftsmen working on the product.

We believe in fair business practice that's why we not only have craftsmen on payroll but they are part of the team, they get a share in each sale on top of that going forward we want to be able to give them free health benefits, an education for their children and a pension plan.
All this while keeping the price low and with your help we can!
Here is what Alan Hood from US, has to say about working with Zia (the founder)

Short Summary
I'm not special nor better then anyone reading this, I'm just a fan of REAL Hip Hop concerned about it's future- E-STONE CEO All Things Possible LLC/ HHQ Clothing.

Hip Hop music is an art form born on the streets of New York City in the late 70's created by a culture of people who, for the most part, were not given equal footing in their quest for the 'American Dream' Nevertheless, these people were well apt at turning lemons into lemonade, one being Hip Hop, a refreshing drink that quenched the thirst of it's listeners world wide.

Unfortunately, things have changed. This amazing art form has been taken from the very people who created it and is now controlled by people who are apathetic to hip hop music, it's culture, and it's people. As a result, for a period of 20 years, Hip Hop has been raped by these very people to no end. These people produce and distribute a hip hop music filled with vile lyrics that promote the cultural degradation of a particular people, objectifying females as nothing more than flesh, promoting animalistic violence, and the dilution of lyrical content resulting in the death of REAL Hip Hop.
The effects of this poison (wrongly labeled as hip hop) can be seen every day amongst our citizenry:
This is NOT Hip Hop and is clearly the effects of garbage Hip Hop.
<div style=""text-align: center
column2: >  Years and years of lyrical frustration has resulted in this spectacle. A whole generation of Hip Hop fans have been duped. We must put an end to this.

column1: <div style=""text-align: center
In today's Hip Hop STRIPPERS are now granted the privilege to hold the microphone. Unfreakn' believable!
<div style=""text-align: center
Take a look for yourself. Warning: If you really love Hip Hop like we do at Hip Hop Quotables this will make you cry: http://youtu.be/KRU24IhfRGE
<div style=""text-align: center
<i><div style=""display: inline !important
It's time to take a stance and refocus Hip Hop back to the standards that were set by it's early pioneers. Standards that focused on lyrical content first and foremost.

column2: >Hip Hop pioneers from left to right: LL Cool J, Russell Simmons, Heavy D, and Jalil Hutchins of Whodini.

column1: Hip Hop Quotables is a brand new clothing line created to GUARD, EDUCATE, RESPECT, AND HONOR real Hip Hop and to abolish anything and anyone who desecrates this wonderful art form.
<figure style=""margin: 0px
column2: >

column1: It is our goal to showcase Hip Hop the way it was meant to be when it was established over 35 years ago, but not in the same manner. Rather then using a microphone and a funky beat, we will utilize a new platform in which to 'spit' our lyrics. This platform is readily accessible to people all over the world and is used in a multitude of ways to convey various statements. This platform being the world renown t-shirt!

Hip Hop Quotables will be the first lyrically branded clothing line with an emphasis on thought provoking lyrical content, exactly what is missing in todays Hip Hop. Instead of LISTENING to the lyrics you will WEAR the lyrics, which we feel is pretty dope!

This beautiful lyrically emblazoned 100% cotton t-shirt boldly displays our 'Iconic Logo' with one of our many amazing quotes, sure to raise awareness throughout the Hip Hop community, resting perfectly on top.
Ladies, don't worry we got you covered. We realize the importance of the female's perspective in hip hop which, unfortunately, is seldom seen nor heard, in today's hip hop.
All of our shirts come in various colors and sizes resulting in an amazing fashion statement complimented with bold thought provoking lyrics- something that's sorely missing in today's Hip Hop.

Here is another version of our 'World Wide Logo' rendered in a 'clean' look. It's dedicated to all of the Hip Hop fans across the world. It symbolizes our oneness and our unified love for REAL hip hop.

The Lyrical Legend Award consist of a meticulously sculpted brain that sits upon a notepad accompanied by the mighty pen. It's foundation consist of a sturdy black marble base which beautifully completes the symbolism. It's appearance may not be as elegant as other awards but it's meaning is invaluable to those who truly love and understand hip hop.

This award will be selected periodically and input from our fans will be allowed throughout the process. The Lyrical Legend award is not awarded based on popularity rather it is based on lyrical impact by any given artist whom we feel meets our criteria as a hip hop company and as our tagline purports- It's About The Lyrics®

• We are initially asking for $15,000. With $15,000 we well be able to create needed inventory to fulfill our Indiegogo orders consisting of caps, shirts, notepads, creative packaging, and hoodies but there are several more elements that will enable us to fully realize our vision for Hip Hop Quotables Clothing. If you guys really believe in what we are doing resulting in our funding exceeding our initial asking of $15,000 these elements will be executed to the fullest and really help HHQ Clothing in it's fight to save Hip Hop
column2: One shirt at a time, One cap at a time, One hoodie at a time.

column1: <ul><li>

Licensing- This is to attain permission to utilize quotes from the hip hop artist we want to showcase on our shirts. This fee can range from $500 to $2000 per license. We would like to secure licensing for 3 to 6 artist initially.
<ul><li>
Lyrical Legend Awards- This award will be made from the ground up. Modeling, casting, and metallic finish. Cost- $2,616
<ul><li>

Packaging Upgrade- When you receive your order from us we want you to realize you truly have something special and even worth collecting. To help achieve this, we would like to have hang tags that showcase bios of legendary hip hop artist printed on quality stock.
<ul><li>
Hip Hop Quotables Online hub/ store:

Our online presence is vital to our mission. We are creating a 'hub' where hip hop fans can interact via various forms of media. We have a bi-monthly talk show hosted by yours truly. We have our Independent Artist page featuring unknown hip hop artist whom we feel you SHOULD know. As well as our online store where you can purchase our items.
<ul>
• Creating our talk show will require 2 professional microphones.
• 1.  For on location interviews the SennheiserMD 46 Handheld Microphone with Microphone Flag ENG Kit $225
• 1. For in studio guest interviews the Rode Lavalier Microphone- $250 x 2

Any extra funding received past our initial goal of $15,000 will help create a substantial inventory as well as further development for various design changes in preparation for our world wide launch after all Indiegogo orders are completely fulfilled.
Our perks are just as unique as our company:
<div>

For the aspiring hip hop lyricist we offer must have tools of the trade by way of our Hip Hop Quotables Pen and Pad. Branded with our world wide logo and trademarked tagline, there is no better way to capture your thought provoking lyrics at a moments notice. Can be used to create grocery list as well if writing lyrics is not your thing.
<div>
If the pen is mightier then the sword that makes our Hip Hop Quotables pen the   'Excalibur' of pens! Unsheathe this magnificently crafted steel and start writing!
All color variations will be available for you to choose from once campaign is fully completed. We will contact you via email for size and color information.
<div>
Our caps are color coordinated to match our shirts and together they create a unique look that signifies a new movement within our hip hop culture. We will offer snap-back and fitted variations.
What if our goal is not reached?
<div>
If our goal is not reached we will conduct an economical assessment and if the money acquired is enough to adequately fulfill registered orders we will proceed and fulfill all orders.
<div><span style=""font-size: 24px

Have you ever wanted to be a part of a movement that really makes a difference? Not some 'event' that comes and goes like a traveling circus and the only difference made was the owners bank account. If so, then Hip Hop Quotables Clothing is the movement for you.

Sure, it's a clothing line with a cool concept but what makes Hip Hop Quotables powerful is the message it sends, just like Hip Hop did when it was first created back in the 80's when it was pure. A hip hop that caused people to question authority. A hip hop that made it's listeners proud of who they were. A hip hop that dared people to dream and better themselves. By supporting Hip Hop Quotables Clothing you can help bring back the beauty in hip hop unlike the garbage hip hop you see today via the internet and hear on radios across the globe.
<ul><li>

You can have full confidence in me knowing I will see this vision fulfilled and every penny of your money will not be wasted. This clothing line is a labor of love and my experiences working for Russell Simmons and Stan Lathon have prepared me for this journey.
<ul><li>

My belief is in people. I believe we have lost the understanding of how powerful we are when we are UNITED. Today you see corporations making billions of dollars at the expense of people and it seems people have accepted this as the norm, that no matter what, nothing can be done. Hip Hop Quotables will show and demonstrate the power of people united. Hip Hop did this in the 80's and it can do it again. Let's make it happen together once more!
<ul><li>

This is who I am. I remember watching a show about successful entrepreneurs and one guy, I forget his name, gave some advice I WILL NEVER FORGET. He said, and I'm paraphrasing, don't get into something you have no experience with. In other words, If you are a doctor don't invest in plumbing equipment. If you are a mechanic don't invest in pharmaceuticals. Metaphorically speaking, stay in your own lane, and that's exactly what i'm doing.
Risks &
As with anything not all things go according to plan and we realize this and have put in place contingencies... just in case.

Based in Los Angeles, Ca. gives us the advantage of being in the heart of the fashion industry. Downtown Los Angeles is home to the 'Garment District' and an amazing assortment of screen printing facilities, embroidery shops, apparel suppliers, as well as distributors.
We have relationships with several screen printing facilities here locally that are more then ready for full scale production.

By our calculations, a minimum backing of $15,000 will enable us to meet our initial demands and reinvest immediately to add another set of amazing components that will further establish our uniqueness and our mission to change Hip Hop for the better.

We have streamlined our offerings to shirts, caps, and our pen and pad accessory  with the capability of adding hoodies as a stretch goal. By keeping our offerings streamlined we have full confidence our orders can be fulfilled even in the case of unseen detriments.

Our main challenge is NOT fulfilling our orders, we have full confidence in that, but our goal of creating a MOVEMENT, via the message our products inherit, is what we are truly striving for. We believe that people UNITED creates power, something a lot of people fail to realize or don't believe in.

It's no secret today's Hip Hop has been manipulated by people who don't know or could care less about our Hip Hop Culture and is reason why Hip Hop is dying. 
By supporting Hip Hop Quotables we can change this and save Hip Hop.

Our clothing line does not represent any one particular individual, rather, it represents Hip Hop Culture as a whole. It represents the beauty of Hip Hop and understanding that the foundation of Hip Hop is it's lyrics, hence our tagline- IT'S ABOUT THE LYRICS. Without meaningful lyrics, that uplifts it's people, Hip Hop is truly dead and we just can't allow that.

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand not everyone can help in the form of money but there are other ways to contribute, the most important being- WORD OF MOUTH.

Please, if you are a hip hop fan, an activist, or a lover of culture, spread the word about this campaign to as many people as you possibly can. Feature it in blogs. Share it on Facebook. 'Tweat' about it on Twitter. If you need me for interviews, etc, I am always accessible. This would be equally appreciated as a monetary backing.

Once again, thanks for taking the time to read about HHQ Clothing, I know it was longer then usual but sometimes it's needed for something so big. Remember- IT'S ABOUT THE LYRICS! 

Thanks.

Packaging Upgrade- When you receive your order from us we want you to realize you truly have something special and even worth collecting. To help achieve this, we would like to have hang tags that showcase bios of legendary hip hop artist printed on quality stock.
Hip Hop Quotables Online hub/ store:

Our online presence is vital to our mission. We are creating a 'hub' where hip hop fans can interact via various forms of media. We have a bi-monthly talk show hosted by yours truly. We have our Independent Artist page featuring unknown hip hop artist whom we feel you SHOULD know. As well as our online store where you can purchase our items.
Creating our talk show will require 2 professional microphones.
1.  For on location interviews the SennheiserMD 46 Handheld Microphone with Microphone Flag ENG Kit $225
1. For in studio guest interviews the Rode Lavalier Microphone- $250 x 2

Any extra funding received past our initial goal of $15,000 will help create a substantial inventory as well as further development for various design changes in preparation for our world wide launch after all Indiegogo orders are completely fulfilled.
Our perks are just as unique as our company:

For the aspiring hip hop lyricist we offer must have tools of the trade by way of our Hip Hop Quotables Pen and Pad. Branded with our world wide logo and trademarked tagline, there is no better way to capture your thought provoking lyrics at a moments notice. Can be used to create grocery list as well if writing lyrics is not your thing.
If the pen is mightier then the sword that makes our Hip Hop Quotables pen the   'Excalibur' of pens! Unsheathe this magnificently crafted steel and start writing!
All color variations will be available for you to choose from once campaign is fully completed. We will contact you via email for size and color information.
Our caps are color coordinated to match our shirts and together they create a unique look that signifies a new movement within our hip hop culture. We will offer snap-back and fitted variations.
What if our goal is not reached?
If our goal is not reached we will conduct an economical assessment and if the money acquired is enough to adequately fulfill registered orders we will proceed and fulfill all orders.
The Impact

Have you ever wanted to be a part of a movement that really makes a difference? Not some 'event' that comes and goes like a traveling circus and the only difference made was the owners bank account. If so, then Hip Hop Quotables Clothing is the movement for you.

Sure, it's a clothing line with a cool concept but what makes Hip Hop Quotables powerful is the message it sends, just like Hip Hop did when it was first created back in the 80's when it was pure. A hip hop that caused people to question authority. A hip hop that made it's listeners proud of who they were. A hip hop that dared people to dream and better themselves. By supporting Hip Hop Quotables Clothing you can help bring back the beauty in hip hop unlike the garbage hip hop you see today via the internet and hear on radios across the globe.

You can have full confidence in me knowing I will see this vision fulfilled and every penny of your money will not be wasted. This clothing line is a labor of love and my experiences working for Russell Simmons and Stan Lathon have prepared me for this journey.

My belief is in people. I believe we have lost the understanding of how powerful we are when we are UNITED. Today you see corporations making billions of dollars at the expense of people and it seems people have accepted this as the norm, that no matter what, nothing can be done. Hip Hop Quotables will show and demonstrate the power of people united. Hip Hop did this in the 80's and it can do it again. Let's make it happen together once more!

This is who I am. I remember watching a show about successful entrepreneurs and one guy, I forget his name, gave some advice I WILL NEVER FORGET. He said, and I'm paraphrasing, don't get into something you have no experience with. In other words, If you are a doctor don't invest in plumbing equipment. If you are a mechanic don't invest in pharmaceuticals. Metaphorically speaking, stay in your own lane, and that's exactly what i'm doing.
Risks & Challenges
As with anything not all things go according to plan and we realize this and have put in place contingencies... just in case.

Based in Los Angeles, Ca. gives us the advantage of being in the heart of the fashion industry. Downtown Los Angeles is home to the 'Garment District' and an amazing assortment of screen printing facilities, embroidery shops, apparel suppliers, as well as distributors.
We have relationships with several screen printing facilities here locally that are more then ready for full scale production.

By our calculations, a minimum backing of $15,000 will enable us to meet our initial demands and reinvest immediately to add another set of amazing components that will further establish our uniqueness and our mission to change Hip Hop for the better.

We have streamlined our offerings to shirts, caps, and our pen and pad accessory  with the capability of adding hoodies as a stretch goal. By keeping our offerings streamlined we have full confidence our orders can be fulfilled even in the case of unseen detriments.

Our main challenge is NOT fulfilling our orders, we have full confidence in that, but our goal of creating a MOVEMENT, via the message our products inherit, is what we are truly striving for. We believe that people UNITED creates power, something a lot of people fail to realize or don't believe in.

It's no secret today's Hip Hop has been manipulated by people who don't know or could care less about our Hip Hop Culture and is reason why Hip Hop is dying. By supporting Hip Hop Quotables we can change this and save Hip Hop.

Our clothing line does not represent any one particular individual, rather, it represents Hip Hop Culture as a whole. It represents the beauty of Hip Hop and understanding that the foundation of Hip Hop is it's lyrics, hence our tagline- IT'S ABOUT THE LYRICS. Without meaningful lyrics, that uplifts it's people, Hip Hop is truly dead and we just can't allow that.
Other Ways You Can Help I understand not everyone can help in the form of money but there are other ways to contribute, the most important being- WORD OF MOUTH.

Please, if you are a hip hop fan, an activist, or a lover of culture, spread the word about this campaign to as many people as you possibly can. Feature it in blogs. Share it on Facebook. 'Tweat' about it on Twitter. If you need me for interviews, etc, I am always accessible. This would be equally appreciated as a monetary backing.

Once again, thanks for taking the time to read about HHQ Clothing, I know it was longer then usual but sometimes it's needed for something so big. Remember- IT'S ABOUT THE LYRICS! Thanks.",16.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","Los Angeles, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/hhqclothing/pica
0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><div>
Short Summary

It's easy to watch what's happening in American politics today and get fed up: with the government, with business people, with the system in general.  As we started paying more attention to what's happening with America's unemployment levels we started asking what we could do to help out.  The first question we asked was: what jobs are we outsourcing overseas that could be brought back home?

What we found out was truly inspiring.  It turns out, all those banners, hang tags, t shirts and hoodies that we've had printed in China can be done here for only a fraction more.  Same is true for the development and design of our packaging materials.  Using European and Asian partners to fill orders and distribute product for us is also unnecessary.  With a minimal investment in ONE American partner, we expect to bring between $30,000-$50,000 in annual service fees from overseas back to American soil.  No joke.

We're inspired by these findings, and we wanted to ask for the public's support on this initiative not only to help us cover this up-front investment, but also to help share this model with other companies, and inspire them to do the same.  If we sit around waiting for Uncle Sam to make American service providers more attractive, we could wait forever.  By directly supporting the partners we intend to work with, we can all make a little bit of difference in this economy.

You'll notice that all of the rewards being offered in this program are heavily discounted.  The Roman Mitts at $25 are selling for $62 on our website right now.  The Head Skis at $350 are selling for $600 in stores.  These discounts are our contribution to you for backing this project, and to the country that brought us freedom fries and Super Man.  Take advantage of these rewards, and this remarkable opportunity to make a difference in our economy.

We're a small company, but we make a strong effort to provide great gloves at reasonable prices.  We employ some of the best athletes in the world to help us test and develop gloves, and through that process have arrived at a truly remarkable product.
What We Need &
<div>

We need at least $25,000 to transition these jobs back home.  Some of this money will go as an investment directly to our new partner to help them retrofit their facitilites, and the rest will help us cover the costs of re-training our people and re-working our entire design and distribution processes.  The more money we raise, the less risky this campaign becomes, and the more sustainable the move back home.
<div>
WHO IS SIMON DUMONT?

If you're not familiar with who Simon is yet, don't be ashamed.  The world of pro skiers is a small world after all.  Simon has been trailblazing the sport of free-skiing for years now.  He's one of the most decorated skiers in the sports, with numerous metals in events like X-Games, The Dew Tour, and many, many others.
This video showcases a recent feat of Simon's on the slopes:
http://youtu.be/dUqsznQyyz0

Suffice it to say, Simon needs his ski setup (head to toe) to be the best of the best in order to last in these cold harsh conditions.  Midway through his ski career, Simon realized that one part of his body was consistently under-served: his hands.

Simon has recruited a team of some of the best skiers in the world to represent the brand and help him figure out how to build a better glove.  He rounded the team out by bringing on expert advisers in business, in production, and in Marketing.  Today, Empire Attire employs a small team of full time employees in Boulder, CO and sells gloves in more than a dozen countries around the globe.  For more information about us, please check out our website here: www.empireattire.com.
Perks Explored

Our rewards are flexible.  If you want Simon to sign your gloves or skis consider it done.  Before any of this product ships we'll send out a survey asking for size, color and other preferences.  During that time, you'll be able to give us special instructions if you need anything else.  If you want to know if something is possible, just email us at info@empireattire.com and put ""Kickstarter"" in the subject line of the email.
Stickers- $2
T-Shirt Roulette- $8
Hoodie Roulette- $18
The Pipe III Glove- $20
Roman Mitt or NY Glove- $25
Team Pipe Glove Tan- $28
Women's Winter Glove- $40
Pro Model Watch- $80
Head's Caddy Park Ski- $400
Vip Pass to the Dumont Cup - $3000
Contact us for details.
Freeskier's Training Package - $5000

Our best reward by far.  Contact us for more details.  Know that the video edit that you take home from this package will be produced by the same guys that brought you this movie: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1_Epw88bEx4
RISKS AND CHALLENGES

As a company, the biggest challenge is knowing that we're going to pay up to 15% more for these services by using a local partner. This is financially risky, but its a risk we're willing to take to make this happen. We know that the quality of our products will improve with this move, and we hope to be able to absorb these additional costs without passing them on to consumers. At the end of the day, we hope that if our long term prices rise 5% we won't get a backlash from the customers that make all of this possible. This is an experiment, and like all experiments, it faces some challenges and risks which are unpredictable. The more money we raise in this campaign, the less risky the investment. We've got a few people working for us that are working on sweat and tears right now. If we raise enough, we can boost their salaries too... can we say 'stimulus bonus package'!!!???

column11: > in 2008, the limited edition Pi Watch was a great success in stainless steel. We now want to relaunch it in different colors and need your support for that.
column15: >The Pi Watch was designed by Ben McCarthy for WORKSHOPPED in 2008 and released for our WORKSHOPPED 08 exhibition as a limited edition designer piece.
column16: >""In designing Pi, I was aiming for purity, simplicity and

column1: honesty in the materials. The watch is constructed from stainless steel,
which is heavy, resilient, and industrially beautiful.""
dimensional dial indicates the hours via creases in the pressed metal. The
crown, for adjusting the time, is accessed from the back of the watch, and is
intelligently concealed within the thickness of the case, leaving the outer
form clean and accentuating the purity of the watch design.
column4: >The custom molded strap has a unique interaction with the round casing to maximize comfort and increase waterproofing.
column7: >Pi uses a two hand Japanese made movement
column8: >, and is waterproof to 30 meters - or 3 atmospheres. Pi is pure and simple in design and is versatile to suit its wearer’s lifestyle and surrounding.
column9:
>THE DESIGNER:

Ben McCarthy was born and raised in Sydney, Ben Graduated from Industrial design at UNSW in 2003. In 2005 the British Council awarded Ben a grant and facilitated a work placement with Tom Dixon in London.  For the next 18 months he was based in London working on the in house furniture range, as well as projects for Habitat and Artek of which Tom is Creative Director.
column11:
/>

In January 2007 Ben moved to Hong Kong to take up a position as Senior Designer for Michael Young Ltd and is now based in Hong Kong.

In 2007 Ben exhibited Slight Light at 100% design Tokyo, while the Launch Stool received several awards from Home Beautiful Products of the Year Awards.

Together with Ben McCarthy, Workshopped will be relaunching the Pi Watch and moving it into a full production phase. In addition to the original silver watch, we are excited to present two new additions to the Series. a stunning Gold on Black and a very sleek Black on Black.


TIMELINE:


WE NEED YOU:
column12:
>

To bring the Pi Watch into its production phase we need to raise

column1: $16,000.00 to cover <span>re-tooling and production funds. This amount will
be enough to produce the watch in high numbers to ensure that we can get the Pi

Watch to you at a reasonable price.
If we
are not able to reach our desired goal, all funding will still go ahead to the
production of the new Pi Watch. Every dollar counts!
column3:
>WORKSHOPPED is an Australian design company that strives to identify great Australian design and bring it to local and international attention. Starting with 5 designers in a small but well received exhibition in 2001, Workshopped has grown to work with over 650 designers from many walks of life.


WORKSHOPPED is a pioneer of a unique and fast growing movement that nurtures and encourages emerging designers.

Please click here to visit our website - www.workshopped.com.au


Thanks you for supporting Australian design and please help us by sharing this page and spread the word!

column1: honesty in the materials. The watch is constructed from stainless steel,
which is heavy, resilient, and industrially beautiful.""                                                                                     - Ben McCarthy

dimensional dial indicates the hours via creases in the pressed metal. The
crown, for adjusting the time, is accessed from the back of the watch, and is
intelligently concealed within the thickness of the case, leaving the outer

form clean and accentuating the purity of the watch design.The custom molded strap has a unique interaction with the round casing to maximize comfort and increase waterproofing.Pi uses a two hand Japanese made movement, and is waterproof to 30 meters - or 3 atmospheres. Short Summary

Hello. My name's Ben Zacharias, I'm 23, happily married to my beautiful wife Amanda and have an amazing almost 2 year old son. I'm from Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada and I've dreamed of starting my own T-Shirt business since I was a little kid, but I just never thought I'd be able to. But recently things changed, and I've taken the first steps towards doing what I've always wanted to. I spent all my savings and ordered a couple shirt styles and some hats. But because I placed such a small order I ended over paying for the shirts and hats and now I have to sell them for a lot more than I was expecting just so I can make a small profit. So now I want to place a bulk order and get the prices down on my shirts. I see way to many companies charging $30 or more for a shirt and I want to go the opposite direction and keep my shirts as cheap as possible. Currently the shirts I'm selling are going for $22.99 and I still think that's too much. So if I can get some funding to help my company, then I can supply shirts to everyone at a much better price. So I'm sure you're wondering what's going to happen with your money once I get it. And it's good that you're thinking about that because it would be silly to just give your money away without knowing where it's going. Which reminds me that all you amazing supporters will be getting gifts, but we'll get to that in a bit. First off all, I want to use the money to order some more shirts and hats in bulk so that I can get my costs down, and save you money in return. With the funds I raise I'll be able to get 8-10 more shirt styles in stock and 3-4 more hat styles. And when I add in the money I can get on my own and from the sales of what I currently have, I'm hoping to bring in even more. And I'll also be placing an order for a whole bunch of stickers because I know everyone loves stickers. If I don't manage to reach my goal though I'll use whatever I manage to raise to order as much as I can,and use the profits from what I currently have to sell to cover as much of the remaining amount as I can. So now let's talk about the perks of being an amazing person and helping out a young entrepreneur. I can only give away stickers for small donations and of course tell you how grateful I am and how amazing you are, but for donations of $20 and up I'll be giving away T-Shirts and Hats and Tote Bags.
The Impact

So now you're thinking, ""I like this guys shirts, and attitude, but why should I give him my money?"" Well first off, don't you remember that you get awesome gifts out of it? But if that isn't good enough let me try to persuade you more. Besides the fact that I'll be supplying awesome shirts and hats to amazing people at a much lower price than the competitors. I'll also be selling belts, jewelry, shoelaces, socks, sweatpants, yoga pants, sweaters, watches, sunglasses, shoes and much more at unbeatable prices. But without this funding to help my business grow, it will take me a lot longer to get to where I want to be and to be able to stock all of these products. Although I do have a small amount of jewelry, shoelaces and belts being shipped that will be for sale in my online store soon, but that's not what we're worrying about right now. Sorry, I'll try not to get distracted again. I want to run a business where my customers are friends, and yes, I know how cheesy that sounds. But I'm tired of contacting businesses and being ignored because nobody cares. I want to hear feedback from my customers and I want to grow this business around that so that everyone is happy.
Risks &
column2:
Challenges

Of course there's going to be risks with every business. To  be honest I had to return my first batch of hats because the embroidery was badly done on  them. But that's what I'll do for this business. I'll make sure everything meets my very high standards of quality before it gets shipped, and if it doesn't I'll send it right back to the factory to get fixed. You'll never have to worry about quality when you plave an order.

column1:
Other Ways You Can Help

Not able to donate? That's fine too. If you can spread the word about No Rest Apparel and this campaign then you're still doing me a huge favour. Although, if you don't donate, don't be afraid to stop by our online store and pick up a shirt because that money will go towards this too. So you can check out www.facebook.com/norestapparel or www.norestapparel.com or use the Indiegogo tools. I'm honestly not sure what those are because I've never done this before, but if you can find them then feel free to use them.

But that's what I'll do for this business. I'll make sure everything meets my very high standards of quality before it gets shipped, and if it doesn't I'll send it right back to the factory to get fixed. You'll never have to worry about quality when you plave an order.

Other Ways You Can Help Not able to donate? That's fine too. If you can spread the word about No Rest Apparel and this campaign then you're still doing me a huge favour. Although, if you don't donate, don't be afraid to stop by our online store and pick up a shirt because that money will go towards this too. So you can check out www.facebook.com/norestapparel or www.norestapparel.com or use the Indiegogo tools. I'm honestly not sure what those are because I've never done this before, but if you can find them then feel free to use them.",0.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","winnipeg, Canada",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/more-t-shirts-from-no-rest-apparel/pica
0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><h3 style=""margin-left:40px
column4:
>

Max and I formed Toc Watch from our desire to liberate our entrepreneurial spirit. Toc19 is the culmination and expression of this.
column8:
>Toc19: Sapphire Glass Caseback With Exposed Hand Wound Seagull Movement

 

We are two friends who decided it was time to allow our creativeness to determine our future. We believe in individuality, boldness and achieving what you aspire to. Therefore, working at something that fulfils you can become your lifestyle.
column17:
>

We wanted to stay true to what influenced the design, the Bauhaus Design Movement (est. 1919). Our watch incorporates its principles of simplicity and function. In honour of this era, these dial editions will be limited to only 1919 pieces.
column22:
>

From the offset, Toc wanted to focus on form and function, so delivering a simple yet stylish watch combined with quality materials was vital. The Toc19 is the only model in our initial launch, with dial colour and strap variations the only difference. This allowed us focus on the most important elements which was the substance and materials used. 

Toc have designed a bespoke custom case from scratch. The case is made from 316L surgical grade stainless steel.
column27:
> 

Sapphire Crystal is the 2nd hardest material known to man (2nd only to Diamond) and much harder than Gorilla Glass. Therefore, this seriously scratch proof Sapphire Crystal Glass was the only real option to showcase the Toc19 and its movement.
column46:
> 

Two of the dials have a smooth finish: Retro Cream and Carbon Black. The four other dials are finished with a stunning sunray pattern that reflects light at every angle: Crimson Red, Graphite Grey, Emerald Green and Silver
column98:
> 

We guarantee you get the Toc19 of your choice by allowing you to combine any dial colour with any strap style you like. Build the Toc19 your way.
column104:
>

The hand wound movement is a thing of beauty so we decided to showcase it through the Exhibition Case which is covered by Scratch Proof Sapphire Crystal. The mechanical movement is the Seagull ST3621. It’s reliable and beautiful. You will find yourself mesmerised by the movement of the spring as it powers the watch.

Turn the Toc19 over to see the engraved custom steel.
column109:
> 

The Toc logo and Dublin automatically draw your attention but look closely at the special numbering etched into your watch. This is your limited edition Toc19 with your limited edition number reminding you how special it is. Limited to only 1919 of these combined dial colours. That’s special.
column110:
>

All straps are made from Italian leather. Toc also makes a point of etching its name into the buckle as well as branding each leather strap

When the campaign ends, you can then choose the strap you like the most.
column129: >Strap: Red Brown Crocodile Style Leather
column132:
>

The case is designed completely from scratch. Every measurement considered and debated on, from the size of the crown, the thickness of the lug, to its perfect weight
column138:
>

When was the last time that you wished you could make a change? Not just any change, a life altering change?

column1: <div style=""margin-left:200px
<div><div class=""campaignStoryVideoWrapper""><iframe src=""https://www.youtube.com/embed/iHhdveICw48?autohide=1&amp

column34:
>

International Backers

We ship Toc Watches worldwide. Please note that you might be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable in your country.

Estimated Delivery  

We expect to ship all Toc19 orders in November 2017. In manufacturing, there's always a risk that suppliers do not fulfil orders on time. Our manufacturer is very professional and organized. We are confident that the production, assembly and testing process will run very efficiently. We aim to deliver ahead of time. While we do not expect this deadline to move, it is a complex process with many moving parts, therefore there is always the risk the estimated shipment month may shift. If at any time you would like an update, please either check the ""Updates"" section of our Kickstarter Campaign, or feel free to email us at info@thetocwatch.com. We'll update you frequently about our progress, and if there are any blips along the way, we'll let you know!

Need Help? Ask us anything you want

If you have questions at any time, during or after the campaign has concluded, you can always reach us at info@thetocwatch.com
column35:
>

All Toc19 watches include a 5 years limited warranty.
column37:
>

0,"

** Please note there are some technical issues viewing the story on your mobile - please use the Indiegogo app or view on your computer/laptop - Indiegogo is trying to get this fixed asap**

Whilst working in the fashion industry I got confronted with excessive waste and the consequences of mass production on nature and people. It made me question who I want to be as a fashion designer and what I stand for.

In Australia I started surfing. I’ve met so many likeminded people in the water that have inspired me to start something that matters. Being close to nature made me realise I want to contribute in a positive way. The sustainable component of Lemon Spicy makes our swimwear more than a product. You are part of a story, a mission, and a movement anyone can join.

Supporting Lemon Spicy makes you part of an exciting initiative that is not just swimwear, but a community of likeminded people that are ready for positive change. We need YOU to make this happen.

 

>
column7:
​

All pieces are fully lined and therefore have great shape retention and maximum durability. All tops and one pieces have removable padding for extra protection and support during water activities.

​

 -

Our swimwear is made from Italian fabric made with Econyl®, a recycled fiber made from ghost fishing nets and other post-consumer waste. 

Thanks to its innovative construction and presence of Xtra Life Lycra®, our fabric is more chlorine resistant than your average swimwear fabric.

It has excellent UV protection and is suncream resistant.

What are ghost fishing nets?

Fishing nets which are discarded and abandoned at the bottom of our seas and which kill thousands of marine creatures every year. 

Recovered fishing nets are not sent to the landfill, but they are recycled: by means of a regeneration process they are turned into new raw materials which can be used to create brand new products such as socks, swimsuits, carpets and other textile items. This way, the pollution decreases with every product manufactured.

What is Xtra Life Lycra®​?

Xtra Life Lycra® Fiber resists fabric breakdown more than 5 times longer than your average chlorine-resistant elastane. Deterioration in swimsuits is mainly determined by elastane breakage, which weakens the fabric and causes a loss of shape and fit. Swimwear garments using Xtra Life LYCRA® Fiber have no significant fiber breakage even after many hours of exposure.

Features and benefits of Lemon Spicy swimwear fabric

• Sustainable
• Smooth and soft
• Extra strength
• Outstanding quality
• Shape retention
• Maximum durability
• UPF 50+ sun protection

For my work I have visited many garment factories in Asia and realised the work circumstances are often far from good. Ethical garment manufacturing is hard to come across, but more relevant to consumers and awareness is growing. Taking care of the people that make the clothing in addition to making great high quality swimwear is very important to me.

I have picked my manufacturer based on Lemon Spicy's ethics and high standards to ensure that the factory has responsible labour, health and safety practices. Last July I visited my swimwear manufacturer, which is a small factory that has been around for 10 years and is specialised in start-up swimwear brands. The people that make the swimwear take pride in their work, are highly skilled and get paid by the hour, not by piece. It was very heartwarming to meet such a great team and I am very proud to work with them.

Hi, I’m Roos, a 27 year old fashion designer born in the Netherlands. I did a 4 year Bachelor in Fashion design and have a Master degree in Fashion Design. In between doing my 2 year masters degree I took a break and moved to Sweden to work as a design assistant for Acne Studios and H&
column8:
M. After earning my Master’s degree I left to travel to Australia. Bondi Beach in Sydney caught my eye and stole my heart. For the last 3.5 years I have been working as a fashion designer for Australian brands SABA and JAG.

Of course we’re aiming for success and if we reach our goal we will place the swimwear order straight away. Other product perks will be fulfilled in October 2017. Transparency is key so see below timeline to know what’s happening and when.

As with every new product there can be risks and challenges in the manufacturing process. Through my work as fashion designer I have learnt how to eliminate as many errors as possible upfront. I will always keep you updated of new developments.

Remember, I’ve got years of industry experience designing fashion. I’ve worked for some amazing fashion brands and have put months of work into Lemon Spicy making sure this project is a success. If you would like to see Lemon Spicy succeed as much as I would, then pick your favourite perk now and I look forward to make it happen with you. Thanks for your support!

You might not be able to financially contribute, but that doesn’t mean I can’t use your help.

Please help spread the word and make some noise about this campaign!

Use the IndieGoGo share tools in the top right of the menu to share this campaign via social media.

We would love to have you joining the Lemon Spicy community.

Find us here:

Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/lemonspicysocial / @lemonspicysocial

Website: http://www.lemonspicysocial.com

Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/lemonspicysocial

0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><h3>

Luxury eyewear should not only be made from precious metal, but sustainable materials which possess high quality.

 

Find us here: HYPEBEAST, GadgetFlow, Trendhunder, Superior Magazine, We Love Glasses, New Labels Only, Inspo Magazine, Not Just A Label.  

 

Split into three modern designs: Horyuji, Angkor and Stonehenge, Slate Soul a range of durable eyewear inspired by Eastern architecture and Western heritage.

 

 

Its name comes from the oldest wooden architect in the world, a Buddhist temple located in Japan. The circular frame design is inspired by ""Ensō"" in Buddhism. ""Ensō"" is a hand drawn circle that symbolises enlightenment, strength, elegance, the universe, and mu (the void). Horyuji is therefore made with warmer colours of Slate and Oak wood to bring a peaceful feeling.

Early Bird Price: €109 / $119 • Save €111 / $119 off RRP  
Estimated Delivery: November 2017  
Width: 140mm / Height: 51mm / Leg Length: 142mm / Bridge: 20mm
The rectangular shape and classical alignment of Stonehenge qualify it as the most understated but unique model of our collection.
<div>

Early Bird Price: €109 / $119 • Save €111 / $119 off RRP 
Estimated Delivery: November 2017 
Width: 150mm / Height: 49mm / Leg Length: 150mm / Bridge: 20mm

It shares partially the name of the mysterious stone heritage built over 1000 years ago in Cambodia. The semi rimless presentation shows its wild and extravagant characteristics.

 
Early Bird Price: €109 / $119 • Save €111 / $119 off RRP 
Estimated Delivery: November 2017 
Width: 152mm / Height: 58mm / Leg Length: 150mm / Bridge: 18mm
 

 

Inspired by the architectural style in which a single piece of work incorporates a mixture of elements from East &
column2:
West to create designs that are new and original. Designs are influenced by the observations about Eastern heritages made of wood and Western ones made of stone. The durability of buildings with its relation to embody energy in technologies and materials has become an important feature of architecture, same as for our sunglasses.

The high quality shale stone are cut into 1mm thick layers with a technology named Foliation. It has been widely used in Coal mining industry until it's brought to fashion industry lately in Germany.

The slate layer is then combined with two high quality wood veneers under high pressure to form the frame. This structure makes our sunglasses more durable, more elastic, and not as easily broken as using a whole piece of wood.

We use CNC machine to ensure the precision detail and it's the most eco-friendly way as it maximises yield of materials.

Every pair of sunglasses is sanded with 3 different grades of sandpaper and coated with high quality wax.

For the key of every optical products, lenses, we use Zeiss, one of the highest quality manufacturers of lenses in the world. All lenses are UV400(100% UVA/UVBA) with infused polarised filters, which highly protect your eyes under the sunlight. 

 

Have you ever experienced sunglasses slipping down your nose? Or have a deep mark on the bridge of your nose after long term usage? 

It's because the sunglasses are too heavy. We usually don't feel it at the time we just put on the sunglasses, yet it caused us problems after we wearing the sunglasses for some time.

You think it's okay cause the mark will fade away later on? NO! Continued usage of heavy spectacles will cause pigmentation. So.. yup, Slate Soul sunglasses solves it.

 

 

 

1. Materials Inspection. We inspect the slate and wood veneers in terms of smoothness, thickness, colour and the weight once we received them.

2. Frame Test. After the frame is finished, we check the hinges, balance of the frame. We will proceed to lens assembly only if all parts are perfectly done.

3. Quality Check. We basically check every details in this stage. Including the smoothness, the cleanness of the frames, etc.

 

15 Days return guarantee

While we manufacture our sunglasses to the highest standard of quality.  We understand that it may not be perfect fit to everyone. If you feel that the sunglasses doesn’t match your expectation, simply contact us and we will give you 100% refund in 15 days, start from the delivery date.

1 Year Warranty 

We believe in quality of our products, so we back it up with 1 year warranty. If you experience any manufacturer defect within the first year, simply contact us and get our full back up. 

The reason why we set a stretch goal is because the Minimum Order Quantity (MOQ) of Angkor is relatively high as it involves more procedures and parts than the other two models do. Once we hit $16,000, Angkor will be unlocked and we will send a survey to all backers who claimed our perks before for one time amendment.

Wils Fabrik team is formed by 5 international young people across Europe and Asia. We’re passionate and determined to create high quality and sustainable products. We’re thankful for having the opportunity to pursue what we love. We sincerely wish you would support our project because it means a lot to us, and we meant it. Thank you.

 

Risks and challenges

Low budget: Although we're doing our best in presenting the project to all people we know, but we don't have much budget to be placed on marketing. We're very confident about our products and we need your help to spread this conscious fashion idea to people who care about fashion and our earth. We believe world of mouth is the key to build a sustainable brand and your shout out is our oxygen.

Delivery time: There's always a risk that manufacturers do not fulfil on time. But we're already a 3 year old company so that we will be working very closely with our manufacturers to ensure that everything is moving forward smoothly. However, if by chance there's any unanticipated delays, we promise to keep you informed.

Find us here:

Official Website

Facebook

Instagram

Twitter

For further questions, please feel free to contact us at info@wilsfabrik.com OR you can contact us via following social media channels:

Press

Press Page

 

Photos

3 of the above photos are taken by Billy, MetroPop.
column3:
>Thank you for support!

However, if by chance there's any unanticipated delays, we promise to keep you informed.Find us here:Official WebsiteFacebookInstagramTwitterFor further questions, please feel free to contact us at info@wilsfabrik.com OR you can contact us via following social media channels:PressPress Page Photos3 of the above photos are taken by Billy, MetroPop. Thank you for support!",37.0,0,"1 Campaign
