Rumoe's story began in January 2016, when a group of devoted watch enthusiasts aimed to create The Perfect Watch!

We found ourselves surrounded by luxury timepieces that all had one thing in common, highly priced! We felt it must be possible to combine luxurious elegance of the highest quality with timeless design. Simply a watch that makes a statement. An affordable statement.

Rumoe - The affordable statement

One and a half years has passed and we can today proudly announce that we have managed to design and create the watch of our dreams!

Introducing - Rumoe Nobel Royal:

Nobel Royal is the proud name of our prémiere Rumoe editon and therefore a tribute to Swedish history and its timeless excellence.

1: Rumoe Nobel Royal Rose Gold &
column2:
White Dial/Brown Leather Strap

The first model is the fabulous Rose Gold &
column3:
White Dial with a brown calf leather strap and a smooth butterfly buckle. Its timeless elegance and beauty externalise the very combination of class and simplicity.

2: Rumoe Nobel Royal Stainless Steel &
column4:
Black Dial/Black Crocodile Patterned Leather Strap

Our second Nobel Royal is a delicate timepiece for the one who understands style. Whether you want to dress up or dress down the combination steel &
column5:
black goes with everything. Its timeless beauty is indisputable.

3: Rumoe Nobel Royal Rose Gold &
column6:
Black Dial/Black Leather Strap

The third model is the flawless Rose Gold &
column7:
Black Dial edition with a beautiful black calf leather strap and a smooth butterfly clasp. Works perfectly as a dress watch but also as a casual every day watch.

4: Rumoe Nobel Royal Stainless Steel &
column8:
White Dial/Brown Crocodile Patterned Leather Strap

Our fourth model has maybe the classiest appereance of them all. The Nobel Royal in stainless steel &
column9:
white dial has a black crocodile patterned calf leather strap with a smooth butterfly clasp. This watch frankly breathes of elegance and is a perfect timepiece for the discreet person.

On the back case of all our four models you see a dazzling silhouette of Stockholm – The Capital of Sweden - and a Swedish King pointing his sword towards The Church of Knights, in Swedish called ""Riddarkyrkan"".

 

""Riddarkyrkan"" is actually Stockholms oldest preserved building and also the church where all swedish monarhcs are buried by tradition.

 
 
The creation of Rumoe was under big influence of our Swedish lifestyle
 
 
Living in Sweden makes you accustomed to a high standard, which is why you always expect everything in society to spin like a wheel. Excellence, quality and beauty are common words among us Swedes and were obvious ingredients for our watch.  
 
Stockholm City Hall - where the The Nobel Prize gala is held every year
 
Another important ingredient is our noble history.
 
The great Swedish King Gustaf II Adolf

column1: Sweden was once among the greatest war powers in Europe but the things we are most proud of is our long history of peace, our curiosity of the world around us and our sense of inventions.
This heritage lives on among Swedes and is celebrated every year with the Nobel Prize
Alfred Nobel (1833-1896)

The name Nobel Royal is not just a tribute to the Swedish kings but also an honour to the greatest Swedish engineer ever: Alfred Nobel - he was, and still is, without any doubt one of our biggest prides abroad and a great ambassador for Stockholm and Swedish excellence.
The appereance of Rumoe was of greatest relevance but at least as important when designing Rumoe, was the quality.

Rumoe Nobel Royal is equipped with Seiko Caliber NH35 automatic movement with 24 jewels and a power reserve of 41 hours.
This work horse has a very smooth rotor and works quietly.

There are many benefits with an automatic watch but the fact that you don't need to use a battery is maybe the biggest advantage. Batteries can also sometimes cause fluid leakage, which can in the worst case scenario make vital parts rust.
Seiko Caliber NH35 also offers - Hacking and Manual winding.
Notice how the minute hand slides when using an automatic movement.
Rumoe is equipped with a butterfly clasp on all the models because of its great comfort and easy use.
All our straps are made out of calf leather. The calf leather itself is valuable because of its softness, fine grain, and durability.
We offer four different models:
Refresh your Rumoe with extra straps that are easy to change
The buckle:
Unbuckled - Buckled

A watch isn’t just an item that tells time. It's also a precious accessory that should be taken good care of. That's why each Rumoe comes in a black, uncluttered box made out of high quality piano lacquered wood.
Why a Rumoe watch? Let us tell You!
We could make a long list but these are the most important benefits:
I: Rumoe combines class with simplicity in design. You would be the owner of a luxurious timepiece!

II: No need for batteries with an automatic movement.
Like most luxury watch brands, will Rumoe Nobel Royal also run purely on the natural movement of your arm. No need for batteries. You provide the energy!

III: Quality, Safety and Security are key factors to us. During our voyage we have secured a manufacturing partner that we feel 100 % confident can always provide at the highest level. We offer our customers A TWO YEARS WARRANTY!

IV: The affordability. A watch like ours would normally cost a lot more. We are able to keep the price low as there are no intermediaries. Your watch will be shipped to our factory in Sweden for a last quality control and then forwarded to you.
We hope to get your trust &
column2: that you want to make a pledge. These would be the rewards:

column1:
Why we think it's important for you as a backer to know that we are a registered trademark. 

If you do not register a trademark and there happens to be a registered owner of a similar mark, that owner will have an indefinite period of time to find us and sue us for infringement. In that case we must give up all profits earned by the use of the unregistered mark
column2: and pay other damages, including punitive damages, fines, and attorneys' fees. For a start-up or a Kickstarter project that could potentially mean facing bankruptcy.

column1: This is why we have Exclusive Rights of the trademark 'Rumoe' so you can feel safe backing this project!

Our ambition is that you will be a 100% satisfied. As you understand this is a high ambition and very hard to achieve in reality, but we are prepared. We take this very seriously and expect you to be satisfied when receiving your Rumoe. If you still find your Rumoe to be different from what was promised, we will refund or replace it.
Risks and challenges:

There are no risks as we see it - only one big challenge. 
Our intention is to have a 100% satisfaction rate.

We offer a two year warranty for your Rumoe. We have secured a first class supplier, who always delivers on time. 
We will remain open, transparent and keep you updated throughout the journey.
Welcome aboard and thank you for your support!

FLECTR is the world´s first wheel reflector which combines outstanding aerodynamics with
state-of-the-art reflection while being virtually weightless and indestructible.
Eye-catching and paper-thin FLECTR fits every type of spokes like a glove. Forget about heavy, bulky plastic parts!

zoom

One year ago we started to draw the rough concept for this
reflector. After visits of photometric institutes, countless hours of CAD
modelling and evaluation under real conditions, we have finally achieved
what we set out to do, for us and for all bikers out there: We have created a
new-generation spokes reflector, its name is FLECTR.

High grade reflection.
FLECTR´s advanced reflection technology meets the high standards of police and rescue vehicles in the U.S. and Europe.
Sleek understatement. A small silver flag – that´s it.

Aerodynamic efficiency.
FLECTR´s shape and profile are tested up to flow velocities of 100 mph / 160 Km/h without flapping, moving and noise.

Zero-weight design.
With a weight of only 0.024 oz / 0.7 gram FLECTR does not affect the dynamic balance of the wheel in sharp contrast to others.

Easy assembly.
Just remove the foil carrier, center the
reflector on the spoke vertex and press both side panels gently
together. Tool-free and easy.
zoom

column2: >

column1: <i>FLECTR
has passed flow velocity tests of up to 100 mph / 160 Km/h without flapping,
moving and noise. zoom
We appreciate your support and hope you
find our project valuable. Please choose from the following rewards - just

for you, your family or for your whole commnunity:


Where others let you down: FLECTR offers impeccable functionality also in wet conditions. zoom
<figure style=""margin: 0px
<figure style=""margin: 0px
After month of research, sourcing of
materials and technical planning, we have started with the first tests mid of
2015. We have tested the design for quite some time under various circumstances
and changing climate conditions. Not until the end of last winter, did FLECTR
prove to us that it is functioning under all conditions.
<figure style=""margin: 0px
We are the “Outsider” team, a group of people who are outdoor and water sports
enthusiasts and, most of all, active bikers enjoying a good ride on our
mountain and racing bikes. Together we have spent hundreds of hours working on
our bikes, optimizing and enhancing look and performance. Every passionate
biker seeks the optimal support of his or her bike. Trail seekers look for
stability, commuters want an easy and comfortable use, while racing cyclists
have sleepless nights over the best possible configuration of their lightweight
racing machines. Agreed, the requirements are multifaceted, as is the accessory
market trying to serve all those needs, nevertheless there are specific bike
parts, where no tangible progress seems to be made. Without being unfair, most
conventional spokes reflectors do their job, but all of them come with a
downside and there is not even an alternative for flat spokes or sport tires.
We all know that conventional spokes reflectors are heavy, bulky and
aerodynamic-wise, they are a millstone around one´s neck, respectively one´s
bike. They easily become useless in wet conditions and dirt. They get stolen,
they fall off, they break. And one thing is sure: They are anything but sleek
and stylish. That’s reflecting (no pun intended :-) the current market
situation and explains why cyclists do without spokes reflectors, although it
means a huge compromise from a safety perspective. <b>This realization
initiated our project.
<figure style=""margin: 0px
<figure style=""margin: 0px
Compatiblity: round &
0.024 oz / 0.7 gram each Dimensions: 0.79“x2.00“ / 20x50 mm Reflection
technology: cube corner prismatic reflector Reflectors: metalized
prisms Material: flexible thermoplastics Assembly: self adhering,
tool free assembly
<figure style=""margin: 0px
can be mounted in various scenarios - you choose your style!
<figure style=""margin: 0px

<li>
mid of May: end
of campaign
<li>
end of May:
receiving backer´s contributions &amp
<li>
till mid of June:
surveying backer´s delivery addresses
<li>
till end of June: final production, quality check &
* We are exetremly sorry, but due to various reasons we have to exclude some
countries from participation of our campain. Some for the reason, that our
carrier can´t guarantee a trustworthy delivery, while with others we are
already in an evaluation- and approval process. We are shure to deliver these
countries in future.
After the campaign has ended we will process
everything fast and professionally. You will receive a survey invitation
on the deposited e-mail account via backerkit.com. The survey just takes three minutes of your
time and ensures a carefree and proper shipment of your pledge. After your
conseignment has been shipped you receive a tracking information via e-mail.
As FLECTR is a valuable good, we will
deliver all conseignments insured and trackable. Together with DHL Deutsche
Post Group we are able to offer a reliable and well-priced solution. Your
reward will be send as registered priority letter and requires
signature on receipt. Please keep in mind that you are responsible for
customs charges maybe if required by your country for importing goods.
zoom
Until now we have managed to bear all costs
of research, evaluation and prototyping. <b>Now - and with your help – we would
like to make FLECTR being a viable and affordable product for cyclists all over
the world. So we need your support for partial financing a first production
run including tooling costs. And of course manufacturing and shipping your
pledges. Project status: <b>FLECTR is completely engineered and
manufactured in Germany - actually just an hour away from our workshop. We
have a well established relation to our suppliers and are able to take a look
at the production process at any time.
A stylish look on a classic urban bike  zoom
Thanks for taking the time to look at our project.
We really appreciate your support and hope you find value in our project! Further questions? Don´t hesitate to contact us.
<figure style=""margin: 0px
<h3>Risks &amp
As soon as our campaign is successfully
funded, we are going to make sure everything is happening according to our
plan. The supply chain, manufacturing and logistics are set up and ready to go.
We have accurately checked the technical feasibility of our product and have
the certainty of being able to bring FLECTR to your home. So we do not see any
direct risks or challenges. In general we are committed to do everything in our
power to deliver your FLECTR on time and keep you informed about all further
processes in regular campaign updates.

My name is Christopher Lee Huffman, creator of Spot Monkey Media. I'm a freelance graphic designer, but more importantly, a fan of professional wrestling. Like millions of others, I've loved professional wrestling since I was a child. My dad likes to think my Uncle Kurt got me into it, but they both played equal parts. Again, this is a common story, so I'll save you from the boring parts.

I believe the most compelling part of professional wrestling is the sense of community. I've met some of my best friends through simply sharing the love of professional wrestling. From the tape-trading scene in the 90s to the dreaded 'IWC', wrestling fans continue to be one of the most dedicated hardcore fanbases in modern culture.

I've had the opportunity to work with some of the top names in the independent wrestling circuit, such as Arik Cannon (MTV's Wrestling Society X), Darin Corbin (CHIKARA), and Christian Rose (DREAMWAVE Wrestling). My work has appeared everywhere from iPPV to the world famous First Avenue Nightclub.

Now, I want to create for the lifeblood of professional wrestling: the fans.

If the goal is met, Spot Monkey Media will shift its primary focus on the production of creative and innovative clothing for wrestling fans. We will continue to accept commissions for custom design work.

Your pledge will fund the production of the first line of Spot Monkey Media shirts. From branded tees (see above) to official wrestler designs, Spot Monkey Media will bring you quality, affordable apparel to add to your everyday wardrobe. After the funding goal is reached, shirts will be available for preorder at our website: http://spotmonkey.portfoliobox.me

Click to view a basic breakdown of planned spending if our goal is met.
column5:
>As wrestling fans, we all share the same passion, whether you've stepped into a ring, bought a ticket to a show (or subscribed to a particular service for $9.99), or spent your Monday nights screaming passionately at strangers on Wreddit.

Spot Monkey Media doesn't represent a movement, it represents a passion for professional wrestling and we have a mission to do it with pride. Let's #CreateOurLegacy.
column6:
/>

Based in Paris and founded in 2012, Very French Gangsters is a young company that specializes in high end designer eyeglasses for children and teenagers.

Timeless design, quality of the material and skilled craftmanship led to the production of a distinct stylish collection targeted towards a growing market of young fashion conscious individuals.

What we are seeking through the Indiegogo community is to raise funds to export our brand to the United States for the benefit of the young Americans and to extend our line to Adults.

Thanks for helping with Indiegogo !

Karoline &
The Very French Gangsters idea is born from our mutual passion about eyewear, and our desire to offer children a larger choice of eyewear.
Everyday, we devote all our energy and creativity to propose eyewear children loves to wear.
Eyewear that does not compromise style or comfort.

column2: >100% handmade in France according to criteria of excellence.

column1: Our frames and hair-clips are made of cellulose acetate.
Cellulose acetate is hypoallergenic, made from a renewable resource (natural cotton and wood fibers), lightweight and very strong.

Selection and cutting of acetate plates, shaping of the frames, product assembly, polishing, marking, adjustments, quality control…No less than thirty different stages, rigorous control and meticulous precision are required to produce each and every pair of Very French Gangsters eyeglass.
Our ""blue blocker"" lenses provide 100% UV protection while filtering blue light glare effectively. These lenses, filter category 3 and bisphenol-A free improve both contrast and color perception.
We guarantee the comfort and perfect fitting of our product with the use of flex hinges and adjustable tips.
Manufacturing processes and techniques evolve through technological progress, but the human skills and know how remain.
(Our products are compliant with local and international safety standards.)
A MULTI GENERATIONAL BRAND

Building on its early success, selling children eyeglasses, Very French Gangsters has launched this spring new lines : Eyewear for adults and fancy hair-clips for mums and daughter, positionning the brand to a whole new level.
One of our new line of hairclips for mothers &
column2: daughters, already won the prestigious prize awarded by Milk Magazine at PLAYTIME, the last kids fashion exhibition on 2014.

column1: Our caimpaigns create buzz with a new tone and impactful visuals. Very French Gangsters has positioned istelf as a trend setter of eyeglasses for children in the French and international press, generating excitement from journalists and buyers alike at every new announcement.
We are sure Americans will love our products

What encourages us to expand in the United States are the numerous demands we have received from different states to distribute our product range. This is why we need your help to fund our adventure so that Very French Gangsters can exist close to where you live for your children to enjoy.
Check our latest campaign that drew a ton of attention shot in the beautiful VENICE BEACH of Los Angeles.
At Very French Gangsters we have an American dream.
Please help us reach for the stars !

Karoline &

","Based in Paris and founded in 2012, Very French Gangsters is a young company that specializes in high end designer eyeglasses for children and teenagers.Timeless design, quality of the material and skilled craftmanship led to the production of a distinct stylish collection targeted towards a growing market of young fashion conscious individuals.What we are seeking through the Indiegogo community is to raise funds to export our brand to the United States for the benefit of the young Americans and to extend our line to Adults.Thanks for helping with Indiegogo !Karoline & Anne.
The Very French Gangsters idea is born from our mutual passion about eyewear, and our desire to offer children a larger choice of eyewear.
Everyday, we devote all our energy and creativity to propose eyewear children loves to wear.
Eyewear that does not compromise style or comfort.
All our models are designed specifically for children to fit perfectly their  morphology.
All our models are 100% handmade in France according to criteria of excellence.
Our frames and hair-clips are made of cellulose acetate.
Cellulose acetate is hypoallergenic, made from a renewable resource (natural cotton and wood fibers), lightweight and very strong.

Selection and cutting of acetate plates, shaping of the frames, product assembly, polishing, marking, adjustments, quality control…No less than thirty different stages, rigorous control and meticulous precision are required to produce each and every pair of Very French Gangsters eyeglass.
Our ""blue blocker"" lenses provide 100% UV protection while filtering blue light glare effectively. These lenses, filter category 3 and bisphenol-A free improve both contrast and color perception.
We guarantee the comfort and perfect fitting of our product with the use of flex hinges and adjustable tips.
Manufacturing processes and techniques evolve through technological progress, but the human skills and know how remain.
(Our products are compliant with local and international safety standards.)
A MULTI GENERATIONAL BRAND

Building on its early success, selling children eyeglasses, Very French Gangsters has launched this spring new lines : Eyewear for adults and fancy hair-clips for mums and daughter, positionning the brand to a whole new level.
One of our new line of hairclips for mothers & daughters, already won the prestigious prize awarded by Milk Magazine at PLAYTIME, the last kids fashion exhibition on 2014.

Our caimpaigns create buzz with a new tone and impactful visuals. Very French Gangsters has positioned istelf as a trend setter of eyeglasses for children in the French and international press, generating excitement from journalists and buyers alike at every new announcement.
We are sure Americans will love our products

What encourages us to expand in the United States are the numerous demands we have received from different states to distribute our product range. This is why we need your help to fund our adventure so that Very French Gangsters can exist close to where you live for your children to enjoy.
Check our latest campaign that drew a ton of attention shot in the beautiful VENICE BEACH of Los Angeles.
At Very French Gangsters we have an American dream.
Please help us reach for the stars !
Thanks for your help with Indiegogo.
Karoline & Anne.

Each of our shootings was signed by renowned photographers. By adding their personal touch, they allowed Very French Gangsters to sign campaigns striking and original that made the buzz in the French and international media.

How to choose the right sunglasses size ?

As the age group should be considered as an indication, the best way to choose the right size is to determine the face width. Thus, measure the distance between the right and left temples. Based on this measurement, choose the size, taking into account that the eyeglass face width must be bigger that the face width in order to avoid discomfort.
For example, with a distance between temples of 4,7 in, choose size 2 for the Very Boss

Over 15 Million Dogs in the US alone suffer from Anxiety Issues ~ Yet an easy, all natural solution is available! Will you help me to help pets world wide?
DO THEY REALLY WORK?
YES! Here is what customers are saying:
<ul>

• We tried EVERYTHING ~ Nothing worked until we found this!  This is 4 1/2 year old Zeuss. This is during a thunderstorm with his new ""pretty"" on. He has been scared to death for the last two Monsoons of the storms. We have tried the Thundershirt, Lavender mists, lavender sprayed on his bed and even prescription drugs. Nothing really allowed him to get to this level of comfort.....until this bandana!!! We didn't want to keep him drugged up with the prescription meds for the entire Monsoon season....this product is fantastic because it is around their neck with the calming scents that smell sooo good too. Thank you for such a great product!!! You have a new customer for life!!!! Reviewed by:  Charlie LaCross Cole from Phoenix, Arizona.  on 9/7/2014

• Bogie tries to put it on all by himself!  My Bogie LOVES his aromatherapy bandana, when it storms or there are firecrackers he will try to put his head in it on his own. Once on, he curls up in the nearest lap and is OUT, calm, sleepy and relaxed. Love this product! Reviewed by:  Barbara from Seminole.  on 9/4/2014

• STORM BANDANA REVIEW  Purchased one for my 5-yr old German Shepherd who is terrified of thunder storms. While I have to admit he is a bit of a ""Drama Queen,"" this product has brought him much needed relief. To see him stop shaking and crying after only a few minutes is wonderful. He's still afraid, but is able to handle the noise and pressure of the storm much better. We also have 2 cats who LOVE the fragrance coming from his bandana so much that they sit under his chin every time he has it on. The whole family of 4-legged friends benefits by this wonderful product. Thank you!!! on 8/15/2014
<ul><li>

Worked Great for Dog Aggression The TLC scarf works amazing. I am a dog trainer in Chicago and have been using the scarf to help my aggression and anxiety cases. One case really stands out - the dog had aggressive behaviors and anxiety towards one family member in particular. Along with working with a veterinarian and adding the TLC scarf to bring his anxiety level down the dog had major improvements. It was the first time in 6 months that this family member had been in the same room with the dog without any growling or aggression. This is a great product!!! Reviewed by: K King from Illinois. on 8/11/2014
<ul><li>

Anxiety Bandana I have a large dog that is terrified of thunder. He has ruined 3 wooden doors trying to escape the noise. A friend purchased one of these bandanas for my dog, and I won't be without it. After monsoon season here in Tucson, when I went to remove the bandana, he was really upset. He loves it. Really worth getting one of these to comfort a nervous dog. Reviewed by: Winnie Baran from Tucson AZ. on 7/1/2014
<ul><li>
<b><i>It     is ALL About Our Dogs &amp
column2: Keeping Them Calm! Tara looks GORGEOUS in her storm bandana. She is such a good watchdog and barks at thunder. From day 1 whenever it rains in Tampa (every day) I put her bandana on and she calms down and stops. I love the smell of the herbs as well! Last night the thunder woke her up I simply put on her bandana and she went back to sleep and slept through the rain! THANK YOU THANK YOU. I need to get more bandanas in different colors. After all it IS all about our dogs and keeping them calm and Stylish! Reviewed by: Annie from Tampa, Fl. on 6/14/2014

column1: <ul><li>

THEY REALLY WORK! Mollie has been a very nervous dog when it rains, thunders or anything else upsets her out of the norm. Well, last weekends hail storm was a bad one in our area, I put her bandana on and I am telling the truth when I say she calmed right down no more shaking, panting, or needed me to hold her she curled up and was calm. THEY REALLY WORK, i just ordered another one for her sister Koko........... Pretty colors too, Mollie loved it Reviewed by: Sandy English from Norfolk, Virginia. on 5/13/2014
<ul><li>

Storm Anxiety Bandana's are Amazing! We've tried numerous products for our mixed breed dog who starts to shake uncontrollably when a thunderstorm starts to brew. As soon as we put the bandana on her, she stopped shaking. Immediately. It was incredible. No anxiety the whole thunderstorm. Can't thank you enough for finally providing a product that calms her! Reviewed by: Paul K from Wesley Chapel, Fl. on 3/30/2014
<ul><li>

DOG OWNER We have a 100 lb. Labradoodle who is petrified of storms. We picked up one of the Storm Bandanas this past Sunday and got to put it to the test immediately, as we had a whole day of thunderstorms on Monday. As usual, our dog Fenway began pacing, hyperventilating and crying. Literally as soon as we put the storm bandana around his neck, you could visually see him gradually calm down. The storm bandana worked way beyond our expectations. We had tried the Thunder Shirt in the past with no luck at all so we're thrilled that the storm bandana worked as advertised! Reviewed by: STEVE KIP from LUTZ, FL 33549. on 3/19/2014
<ul><li>

Works Way Better Than the Thunder Shirt I wanted to let you know I have tried a thunder shirt and other items on my dog, but the Storm Bandanna has been the only thing that works. I use it for thunderstorms, fireworks, and long car rides. She tends to shake and pant a lot, then when i put it on her, she calms down slowly. Many times falls asleep. We have it in the same spot, and everyone in the house knows where her ""thunder scarf"" is. Everyone needs one!! Reviewed by: Amanda from Copley, OH 44321. on 3/10/2014
<ul><li>

Thought My Dog Had Died Brought home a bandana for Sydney. As it turned out, a storm blew through that very night. She used to shake like crazy from fear, but in her later years would just pant loud enough to wake me up. So I got up, tied her calming bandana around her neck, &
column2: I'm not kidding - in five minutes there was no sound at     all...I thought she may have passed, because that had NEVER happened     before. Checked &amp
column3: found her sleeping peacefully. The lightening continued but the panting had stopped! I thought, ""No WAY"". This bandana works. Thanks for an amazing product! Reviewed by: Tim Paull from Sugarcreek, OH 44681. on 2/13/2014

column1: DO YOU HAVE A PATENT?
They are currently in patent pending status with a provisional patent that includes their design, as well as proprietary herbal blend.
ARE THEY BEING SOLD IN STORES?
Yes, I currently have them in about a dozen stores &
column2: also sell them at local outdoor markets as well as online at www.stormbandana.com The Storm Bandana retails for about $26. The Herb Refresh Pouch is being sold for $8.

column1: <h4><i>ANY PICS OF THE PRODUCTS &amp
Yes!... Here are the Rewards for your Support for which I am SO grateful! NOTE: Please include Size &
column2: Color Choice for your Bandana(s). I will also need a picture of your Pet if you choose the $300-$500 options, so my artist may design your Pin or Ornament.

column3:
/>

WHY ARE YOU PASSIONATE ABOUT YOUR PRODUCT'S POTENTIAL?

column1: I've
been so rewarded already, knowing I've helped well over 1000 scared pets &amp
their owners just this past year with my Pet Storm Anxiety Bandana ~ such an easy, safe, drug free, &amp
column2: completely natural solution to a very real problem: pet

column1: fear &amp
column2: the unfortunate destruction of owner property that often results

column1: from this issue.  There are billions of dogs world wide with anxiety who NEED these, &amp
column2: because the herbs that calm these pets eventually wane &amp
column3: need repurchased, even one bandana-wearing-dog in a household may be a repeat customer for many years, so not only am I excited knowing I will make a difference &amp
column5: well being of pets world wide, but I'm also looking forward to the HUGE financial rewards for marketing this 'consumable' product!!!  It's not a matter of 'if' but 'when' at this point :)))

column1: SO ...  ARE THESE SORT OF LIKE THE THUNDERSHIRT?
I get asked this question every single week, so I wanted to include it here... Yes, in that they both serve to relieve pet anxiety, though theirs works on the principle of acupressure &
column2: mine through aromatherapy, so we are very different in design &amp
column3: how we work to calm pets. Fact is, with all

column1: due respect to the ThunderShirt designers, my Storm Anxiety Bandana is not only LESS EXPENSIVE &amp
column2: MUCH EASIER TO PUT ON, but a bonus is that it's also SUPER CUTE, plus MAKES YOUR DOG  &amp
column3: HOME SMELL WONDERFUL! PLEASE ~ I NEED YOU to donate generously &

column1: OKAY, GOT IT ...  BUT HOW, EXACTLY DO THEY WORK?

If you 'google' Lavender, Chamomile, or Peppermint Dog, you will find much information on how all three of these herbs have been used to help calm anxiety. Through many hours of research I discovered that combining the 3 together produced an amazingly effective cord of defense, or 'triple whammy' for relieving pet fear &
column3: whether due to storms, fireworks, car rides, unfamiliar company, visits to the vet or groomer, or separation anxiety from the pet's owner(s).  When these 3 combined, essential herbal aromas travel through the pet's olfactory system, the brain's alpha waves increase, allowing the pet to be able to place 'scary' immediate thoughts like 'I don't understand! What's that loud noise?' or 'Oooh no, I don't like this car or that strange person in my house' , etc. in the background, while relaxation takes precedent. These allow pets to CHILL OUT naturally... Ahhhhh.

column1: NOTE: If you watch the video above, you will see two dogs yawning &
column2: settling into their owner's arms - this is the lovely, relaxing effect my herbal bandanas have on them - &amp
column3: it never gets old for me :))))

column1: <h4><i>AWESOME! I'M BEGINNING TO SEE YOUR VISION... SO, HOW MUCH DO YOU NEED &amp
column2: WHAT WILL YOU BE USING MY MONEY FOR?

column1: I'm asking for $17,000 with the option of partial funding:
$2200 - Accountant, Web Designer, Seamstresses, &
$1500 - Grand Marc Die Cutting Machine &
$3300 - Non-provisional Patent
$2000 - Material &
$8000 - Marketing fund for 8 months through July 2015.
<h4><i>WHERE DO YOU SEE THIS GOING &amp
Ultimately, I desire a to take these world wide... the NEED for them is firmly established &
column2: the market is ripe! I currently lack the funds to take these to the level they need to be internationally... however, in reaching my goal here through Indiegogo, I will be able to hire the staff necessary to market &amp
column3: sell these through my current company, TLC in a greater, more concentrated way than I've been able to do so far ~ My goal is to place these in pet stores, green dog online stores, animal hospitals &amp
column4: rescues, etc. in every state in America - a very good foundation to build upon. I will produce these only as a 'Made in USA' product &amp
column5: look forward to bringing as much income to local workers as I possibly can.

column1: WHAT RISKS OR CHALLENGES DO YOU FEEL MAY HINDER YOU?
<i>On a large scale I believe the biggest challenge lies in educating pet owners that their hope
lies not in drugging their pets, but relieving their fears naturally. This may well require many infomercials &amp
column2: concentrated target marketing efforts. ...  As far as immediate challenges - finding quality seamstresses who are as talented &amp
column3: dependable as they claim to be. There is nothing difficult about my design, but I am very particular about quality control. Every bandana must look professional &amp
column4: retail ready. Gathering the best team of workers is vital to my success, &amp
column5: I have been blessed to have my original products still being sewn &amp
column6: sold after a decade being in business, so overcoming obstacles &amp
column7: moving forward is second nature to me at this point!

column1: <h4><i>I'M ON BOARD &amp
column2: LOVE YOUR IDEA, BUT ALSO LACK FUNDS... SO?

column1: No worries! Welcome to my world, lol! Seriously, anything you can do simply to get the word out about these would be SO appreciated. Anyone can also just go online &
column2: purchase one for their anxious pet, so please tell your friends who have dogs (or cats, or ponies, or husbands) with issues, thanks! www.stormbandana.com

column1: .... Also, Indiegogo has some great tools for sharing great ideas right here!

As soon as we put the     bandana on her, she stopped shaking. Immediately. It was incredible. No     anxiety the whole thunderstorm. Can't thank you enough for finally     providing a product that calms her! Reviewed by: Paul K from Wesley Chapel,     Fl. on 3/30/2014

DOG     OWNER We have a 100 lb. Labradoodle     who is petrified of storms. We picked up one of the Storm Bandanas this     past Sunday and got to put it to the test immediately, as we had a whole     day of thunderstorms on Monday. As usual, our dog Fenway began pacing,     hyperventilating and crying. Literally as soon as we put the storm bandana     around his neck, you could visually see him gradually calm down. The storm     bandana worked way beyond our expectations. We had tried the Thunder Shirt     in the past with no luck at all so we're thrilled that the storm bandana     worked as advertised! Reviewed by: STEVE KIP from LUTZ, FL 33549. on     3/19/2014

Works     Way Better Than the Thunder Shirt I wanted     to let you know I have tried a thunder shirt and other items on my dog,     but the Storm Bandanna has been the only thing that works. I use it for     thunderstorms, fireworks, and long car rides. She tends to shake and pant     a lot, then when i put it on her, she calms down slowly. Many times falls     asleep. We have it in the same spot, and everyone in the house knows where     her ""thunder scarf"" is. Everyone needs one!! Reviewed by: Amanda     from Copley, OH 44321. on 3/10/2014

Thought     My Dog Had Died Brought home a bandana for     Sydney. As it turned out, a storm blew through that very night. She used     to shake like crazy from fear, but in her later years would just pant loud     enough to wake me up. So I got up, tied her calming bandana around her     neck, & I'm not kidding - in five minutes there was no sound at     all...I thought she may have passed, because that had NEVER happened     before. Checked & found her sleeping peacefully. The lightening     continued but the panting had stopped! I thought, ""No WAY"". This     bandana works. Thanks for an amazing product! Reviewed by: Tim Paull from     Sugarcreek, OH 44681. on 2/13/2014
DO YOU HAVE A PATENT?
They are currently in patent pending status with a provisional patent that includes their design, as well as proprietary herbal blend.
ARE THEY BEING SOLD IN STORES?

Yes, I currently have them in about a dozen stores & also sell them at local outdoor markets as well as online at www.stormbandana.com The Storm Bandana retails for about $26. The Herb Refresh Pouch is being sold for $8.
ANY PICS OF THE PRODUCTS & PERKS?

Yes!... Here are the Rewards for your Support for which I am SO grateful! NOTE: Please include Size & Color Choice for your Bandana(s). I will also need a picture of your Pet if you choose the $300-$500 options, so my artist may design your Pin or Ornament.
WHY ARE YOU PASSIONATE ABOUT YOUR PRODUCT'S POTENTIAL?
I've
been so rewarded already, knowing I've helped well over 1000 scared pets &
their owners just this past year with my Pet Storm Anxiety Bandana ~ such an easy, safe, drug free, & completely natural solution to a very real problem: pet
fear & the unfortunate destruction of owner property that often results

from this issue.  There are billions of dogs world wide with anxiety who NEED these, & because the herbs that calm these pets eventually wane & need repurchased, even one bandana-wearing-dog in a household may be a repeat customer for many years, so not only am I excited knowing I will make a difference & contribution to the health & well being of pets world wide, but I'm also looking forward to the HUGE financial rewards for marketing this 'consumable' product!!!  It's not a matter of 'if' but 'when' at this point :)))
SO ...  ARE THESE SORT OF LIKE THE THUNDERSHIRT?

I get asked this question every single week, so I wanted to include it here... Yes, in that they both serve to relieve pet anxiety, though theirs works on the principle of acupressure & mine through aromatherapy, so we are very different in design & how we work to calm pets. Fact is, with all

due respect to the ThunderShirt designers, my Storm Anxiety Bandana is not only LESS EXPENSIVE & MUCH EASIER TO PUT ON, but a bonus is that it's also SUPER CUTE, plus MAKES YOUR DOG  & HOME SMELL WONDERFUL! PLEASE ~ I NEED YOU to donate generously & spread the word! Funding, Marketing, & Publicity ALL NEEDED!
OKAY, GOT IT ...  BUT HOW, EXACTLY DO THEY WORK?

If you 'google' Lavender, Chamomile, or Peppermint Dog, you will find much information on how all three of these herbs have been used to help calm anxiety. Through many hours of research I discovered that combining the 3 together produced an amazingly effective cord of defense, or 'triple whammy' for relieving pet fear & anxiety
column2: whether due to storms, fireworks, car rides, unfamiliar company, visits to the vet or groomer, or separation anxiety from the pet's owner(s).  When these 3 combined, essential herbal aromas travel through the pet's olfactory system, the brain's alpha waves increase, allowing the pet to be able to place 'scary' immediate thoughts like 'I don't understand! What's that loud noise?' or 'Oooh no, I don't like this car or that strange person in my house' , etc. in the background, while relaxation takes precedent. These allow pets to CHILL OUT naturally... Ahhhhh.

column1: NOTE: If you watch the video above, you will see two dogs yawning & settling into their owner's arms - this is the lovely, relaxing effect my herbal bandanas have on them - & it never gets old for me :))))
AWESOME! I'M BEGINNING TO SEE YOUR VISION... SO, HOW MUCH DO YOU NEED & WHAT WILL YOU BE USING MY MONEY FOR?
I'm asking for $17,000 with the option of partial funding:
$2200 - Accountant, Web Designer, Seamstresses, & Graphic Artist fees
$1500 - Grand Marc Die Cutting Machine & 6 size dies for faster production
$3300 - Non-provisional Patent
$2000 - Material & supplies plus herbs
$8000 - Marketing fund for 8 months through July 2015.
WHERE DO YOU SEE THIS GOING & HOW ARE YOU GETTING THERE?

Ultimately, I desire a to take these world wide... the NEED for them is firmly established & the market is ripe! I currently lack the funds to take these to the level they need to be internationally... however, in reaching my goal here through Indiegogo, I will be able to hire the staff necessary to market & sell these through my current company, TLC in a greater, more concentrated way than I've been able to do so far ~ My goal is to place these in pet stores, green dog online stores, animal hospitals & rescues, etc. in every state in America - a very good foundation to build upon. I will produce these only as a 'Made in USA' product & look forward to bringing as much income to local workers as I possibly can.
WHAT RISKS OR CHALLENGES DO YOU FEEL MAY HINDER YOU?
On a large scale I believe the biggest challenge lies in educating pet owners that their hope

lies not in drugging their pets, but relieving their fears naturally. This may well require many infomercials & concentrated target marketing efforts. ...  As far as immediate challenges - finding quality seamstresses who are as talented & dependable as they claim to be. There is nothing difficult about my design, but I am very particular about quality control. Every bandana must look professional & retail ready. Gathering the best team of workers is vital to my success, & I have been blessed to have my original products still being sewn & sold after a decade being in business, so overcoming obstacles & moving forward is second nature to me at this point!
I'M ON BOARD & LOVE YOUR IDEA, BUT ALSO LACK FUNDS... SO?

No worries! Welcome to my world, lol! Seriously, anything you can do simply to get the word out about these would be SO appreciated. Anyone can also just go online & purchase one for their anxious pet, so please tell your friends who have dogs (or cats, or ponies, or husbands) with issues, thanks! www.stormbandana.com
.... Also, Indiegogo has some great tools for sharing great ideas right here!",10.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","Gulfport, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/pet-storm-anxiety-bandana-calms-dogs-in-minutes/pica

Choose your subject!

CHECK OUR GALLEY!

Choose your favourite movie, contribute with a perk and wait to receive your Minimal T-Shirt!
column7:
/>

About this project

My dream is to start up a new t-shirt brand with minimal graphic art from famous movies. I need to set up a list of international feature films easily to recognize and contact some artists on web in order to have rights for publications and distribution or eventually find someone who can help me creating them.

Why Minimal?

Sometimes show less than everything is better! Graphics looks great and every movie is recognizable by a particular object or a text!

Why do I need this money


I will use this money to start this project and to print some t-shirts as test! Please help me! 

- 1000 $ goal (2-4 different subjects)

- 1500 $ goal (4-6 different subjects)

- 2000 $ goal (7-8 different subjects)

You can help me also by sharing my project and telling people about Minimal Graph Art !

I'll appreciate it!

column7: >Replenish your water level before you feel thirsty.

column1: <h3>Stretch and take a break from time to time when using computer or

watching TV.
Early to bed and early to rise.
I take care of my family, my friends

and myself.
I am developing healthy habits and
re-energizing everyday with the help of QButton.
What about you?
<div>
<div>
Good water-drinking habit
In order
for human cells and organs to function properly, we need an adequate amount of
water in our bodies. Since nearly all activities cause people to lose water,
it's essential to replenish our water levels.
QButton
posted on your cup helps to manage your drinking plan. It monitors the motion
of your cup and recommends you proper drinking time. If you have not drunk water in a
certain time, like an hour, it will remind you, by ringing a short piece of music gently in your mobile phone.
If you have, on the other hand, it will be quite, not like traditional alarm. QButton has a motion sensor in it so your cup knows when you have lift it up.
There are people drinking little water, because they are busy or just no such habit. When thirsty, it is already late for your body
to replenish water. We all know it takes 8 cups of water a day to maintain good health, it's simple yet easy to forget.
The scientific way of replenish water is to drink more often, not much a time, like drinking Chinese tea, it is very good for health.
<h4>Sit less,
Stand up, take a break and stretch
<div>
<span style=""background-color: initial
Our eyes are
uncomfortable when we stare at the computer screen too long.  Our neck and back are painful when we sit in
a same position all the time.  We even
gain weight if watching TV series in the sofa . Ergonomic problems always link
with the poor live habits.
QButton posted
on your chair helps to improve it and manage your rest plan. It monitors the
movement of your chair and recommends you proper rest time.
Stretch
your arms, back, legs, and neck. Take a break and a deep breath. Repeat several
times. It only takes one minute but has an instant fix. When you sit back down,
you’ll have the clear head and fresh feeling needed to power through the tough
task in front of you.
<div>
Sleep earlier
Always feel tired when go to bed late, immersing in online games, internet, video? Staying
up late in the night is a way to torture our body with high blood pressure and

cholesterol. These put our hearts at risk. Inadequate sleep will curb our ability to think creatively, cope up with stress and concentrate. All these stress factors will have a negative impact on our performance.

QButton posted on
your pillow reminds you when it’s time to bed, like when you were a child your mum did.
Now you have plenty time for breakfast and be energized every day!<span style=""color: rgb(106, 106, 106)
<h3><b>Care
for your family
Remind your parents to take medicine on time
Remind your kid to brush teeth every day.
<div>
Remind your kid to take break when watching TV or playing
games
<div>
There are many other things QButton can do, for example, if you stick it to your wallet, key, bag etc, it can remind you prevent losing belongs
column2: or put it to your shoes or wrist it can tell your sports data, or it can simply be a real button for start any software<span style=""background-color: initial
column3: >.  since there are some other people do it, we are not doing it. if you have interest, please join our data open program, get access to the sensor data and make interesting usage.

column1: <div>
How it work
1, Post it on target, QButton has a motion sensor inside to detect the movements of the object.
2,  Connect with phone APP, QButton has bluetooth 4.0 BLE inside.
Then it will collect and analyze data,
set up alarms in your phone accordingly, all automatic.
Specification
<div>
Diameter: 28mm
Thickness: 3.8mm
Battery Life: 1 year replaceable
Battery Type: CR1216 coin cell
Connectivity: Bluetooth 4.0 BLE
Device Compatibility: iPhone 4s &
column3: later, and Android devices with 4.3 or above, with bluetooth 4.0.

column1: <div>
Show of our work process
Idea Brain Storming
Make samples and testing for various targets
About Us
We worked
for and accumulated rich experiences from great companies such as Intel,
Microsoft, Google, Cisco etc.  Now we team
up and represent QuickEmbed Technology Co., Ltd, a design house, providing customized
design services and solutions on embedded systems for about 10 years.
Just an example, we, together with ABM technology, a French company, had a
successful product launch of mPad in Europe recently, which is a convenient and
efficient device in banking for data processing and information collection.
Why QButton?
In today's
increasingly competitive society, the tempo of people's living is speeding up.
More and more people find it hard to adapt themselves to the fast pace of life.
With the enormous stress of fast living, people become more time-driven and
rushed than ever before. Some people are distressed by ""quick rhythm
syndrome"", which adversely affects the health psychologically and
physiologically.
We lost
ourselves, we forget good healthy habits, we don’t provide health tips to parents
and children. The health of us is at risk in the modern life.
We
definitely need to have a promising plan to improve our health and reduce the
pressure. How? We came to the idea of “QButton”, an interesting and efficient way
to help us to make best use of every simple thing, such as cups, chairs,
pillows, etc.
We are
surrounded by the exciting wearable devices, but they are sometimes expensive
and not comfortable. With QButton, we do not need to wear anything.  It’s just like the intimate reminder from our
families and friends.  We can now easily
develop our own healthy habits and give tips to our beloved.  We decelerate the pace of life by the things
with QButton. They are around us, feeling us and embracing us.  We are not alone in the modern society with
Qbutton.
We hope
QButton will bring us an enjoyable way of healthy habits. We hope it will bring
us a healthier and brighter life by feeling the world and being nice to
ourselves.
QButton
is not a product that never changes. It’s being continuously improved. We
appreciate your inputs to make the idea of QButton more practical.  We also appreciate your feedback to make our
dream come true and deliver QButton to those who need it worldwide.
What we offer you
We have
finished the prototype, samples made and being tested, the prototype now:
Can read/write motion sensor.
Can connect, send/receive data by bluetooth.
APP drafted.
Bluetooth and mcu config, sleep and wake up to be implemented.
Detail data analysis software to be implemented.
Approx.
$30,000 required for batch production. This is the way that we can make it cost
down and affordable for daily use.
However,
we cannot make the launch and batch production successfully without your
valuable feedback.
Your great supports will ultimately benefit the QButton community worldwide.
We have
several perks for your enthusiasm, passion for healthy life and support to
us.  You will get discounts afterwards
with earlier delivery and free shipment.
Also we offer more stick patterns for you to choose.
What's more, we have a data open program by which you can access to the sensor data and use it for your own usage. You can also tell us your idea and let us do it for you.
We will
try our best to make QButton happen. But, if the project failed, your money may
not be full returned due to the investment during R&amp
will definitely make the whole process transparent to every investor if in that
case.
Challenges
·
R&
column2: D challenges: We have experiences on hardware

column1: and software for embedded systems. We are now doing research on the bluetooth
protocol stack issue to avoid unexpected risks and to make QButton more stable. Also power consumption optimization is challenge, we will optimize it according to each usage model one by one.
·
Certification challenges: The certificates,
bluetooth, FCC, CE, etc., are not on the current agenda of first batch shipment because the certification process is time and resources consuming. We will achieve them later.
Other Ways You Can Help
·
Share information to your friends, via your
facebook, twitter, linkedin.
·
Use Indiegogo share tools to influence and
let others hear your voice on the campaign.

Boot Wrap.

I am a graduate of mechanical engineer and average salaried executive.Thats me!!

 I used to go office by bike and its really bad when my shoes get wet on rainy season. I believe its not just my problem, most of all sporty people facing the same problem while they jogg at morning, or they go riding in wet season (Rainy or snowy). 
If you help us to make this product in mass volume, I am sure it will help you as well as my kind of professional.


Features and natures.
• It's the thinnest rubber product which is made with eco friendly material (Natural rubber).
• Its prevent water to wet your shoes.
• It rolls over to cover your boot.
• Easy to remove and store, you can use it many times!!,
• Material is so durable.
• As being transparent rubber your shoes are still visible from outside.
• We can also make in variant colors so it matches with your suite.
I request all sporty people to contribute this campaign to make this product made in volume so it reaches to everyone who are facing this problem. Now the design and prototyping is completed.
The prototype is well fit and gives all  expected comfort, durability, safety, convenience and aesthetic.

Now we need to make molds for mass production. This campaign will help us to produce in affordable price, and need your help in funds for packaging, marketing and distribution too.  So please consider our request in your wish list.
You will be thinking to have this product when..
Jogging just the day after heavy rain, and you have only one jog shoes!!
Riding Bike on Rainy Season. Especially when you are on the way to work!!
Riders who dare to ride any time.
column3:
/>

For white room applications where hygiene is a concern.

column1: Your help.

I invite/ request all backers to contribute to achieve manufacturing this product so it becomes common and economic. We also seek your suggestion to improve naming, branding, and product specs. By reaching the goal of funding we have to make more molds and increase production with durable material, and should spend money for better material, packaging, marketing and distribution.  Further to the success of this project, more automatic production lines has to be set up for increasing volume of production and to reduce pricing.
For each backers we assure minimum of 6 pairs by end of February 2015.

column3:
/>

If you like this product idea, and if you feel its a worth product for those who have only  one pair shoes (like me), then please help us to become successful in this campaign.

column1: <span style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 0)
To make it most environment friendly, we are using brown paper packaging.
As far as we are not providing any manual to guide you how to wear it, we would like to give all of our user a hint of how it can be weared by packaging itself.
<div>In a single package you will get 3 pair with 3 different colors, (Clear, Black &amp
<div>
Risks &
column2:
Challenges

The first lot of production is planned only for making 1 million products and if demand increases, we have to make fully automated factory including packaging automation. A high level of investment will be required for further production enhancement.

The challenge, I foresee  this product might become a replacement of conventional footwear by doing R&
column3:
D of durable material, and aesthetics design. Which will make easier for user to wear and make more cheaper solution for footwear. 


Other Ways You Can Help

If you find anything special in this product then please help me to reach this to peoples who need this. Please share and promote this as much as you can.

column1: • Please share us on Facebook, twitter, and indiegogo share tools.
• Please talk to your colleagues who wear wet shoes.
• Discuss about this idea to your native joggers.
• Share about this product to your co riders.

And thank you in advance for reading this and helping me in my efforts.

The prototype is well fit and gives all  expected comfort, durability, safety, convenience and aesthetic.

Now we need to make molds for mass production. This campaign will help us to produce in affordable price, and need your help in funds for packaging, marketing and distribution too.  So please consider our request in your wish list.
You will be thinking to have this product when..
Jogging just the day after heavy rain, and you have only one jog shoes!!
Riding Bike on Rainy Season. Especially when you are on the way to work!!
Riders who dare to ride any time.For white room applications where hygiene is a concern.
Your help.

I invite/ request all backers to contribute to achieve manufacturing this product so it becomes common and economic. We also seek your suggestion to improve naming, branding, and product specs. By reaching the goal of funding we have to make more molds and increase production with durable material, and should spend money for better material, packaging, marketing and distribution.  Further to the success of this project, more automatic production lines has to be set up for increasing volume of production and to reduce pricing.
For each backers we assure minimum of 6 pairs by end of February 2015.
If you like this product idea, and if you feel its a worth product for those who have only  one pair shoes (like me), then please help us to become successful in this campaign.
Packaging.
To make it most environment friendly, we are using brown paper packaging.
As far as we are not providing any manual to guide you how to wear it, we would like to give all of our user a hint of how it can be weared by packaging itself.
In a single package you will get 3 pair with 3 different colors, (Clear, Black & Brown).

Risks & ChallengesThe first lot of production is planned only for making 1 million products and if demand increases, we have to make fully automated factory including packaging automation. A high level of investment will be required for further production enhancement.The challenge, I foresee  this product might become a replacement of conventional footwear by doing R&D of durable material, and aesthetics design. Which will make easier for user to wear and make more cheaper solution for footwear. Other Ways You Can HelpIf you find anything special in this product then please help me to reach this to peoples who need this. Please share and promote this as much as you can.
Please share us on Facebook, twitter, and indiegogo share tools.
Please talk to your colleagues who wear wet shoes.
Discuss about this idea to your native joggers.
Share about this product to your co riders.
And thank you in advance for reading this and helping me in my efforts.",7.0,0,"2 Campaigns

True North

Clothing Is based on the idea of finding that someone or something that always points you in the right direction. No matter how much your situation changes for better or worse your 'True North' will be there to guide you and put you on the right track.

column3: >SealDry makes fabric repel liquid rather than absorb it, and it doesn't affect the look or feel of fabric it's applied to. We’ve all had a favourite shirt ruined by an accidental juice spill, or a permanently stained couch after an overzealous wine-and-30 Rock night. Most of our team lives in Vancouver, so we're used to getting soaked in the rain. <span style=""line-height: 1.45em
column4: >Fabric is everywhere: our clothes, our homes, in the car, but as a material it has a flaw: it absorbs liquids.

column3: >SealDry is a spray-on superhydrophobic coating that uses nanotechnology to make fabric repel liquid rather than absorb it. When liquid comes into contact with fabric coated with

column1: SealDry, it beads up and rolls right off the surface.

column3: >Watch our videos to see it in action. Any questions? Want to get on our mailing list? john@sealdry.co

>We're trying to raise $5,000 so that we can place the first production run of SealDry. That's the amount we have to sell to achieve scale and begin our bulk production and bottling. We've used flexible funding because if we miss our goal, we'll produce our perks bottles in the lab individually, so either way, you'll get your bottle of SealDry!

column4: >These are just a few of the things that you can protect with SealDry. We love hearing from people with creative and innovative ways to use it.

column5: >Protect shirts, pants, dresses and delicate, hard-to-clean garments

column3: >Protect shoes and boots from spills, rain and puddles.
column5: >Treat your purse or bag to protect the contents from rain.

column4: >Protect car seats and carpet or motorcycle riding gear.

column3: >Protect your chairs, couch cushions, throw pillows and outdoor patio furniture.
>Protect your placemats, tablecloths, gardening gloves, bedding and mattresses.
>Protect winter gloves and hats, backpacks, uniforms, tents and sleeping bags.

column2: >Protect your phone sleeve, laptop case, suitcase, overnight bag and toiletries.

>As you can probably tell from the videos, this product has the potential to change the way you think about dozens of life's little problems. Caught in the rain? Spill coffee on your shirt at work? These are things that SealDry protects against.

column1: We've gotten SealDry this far in the lab, but now we need your help to get the product manufactured and get feedback on it in everyday use. The product was developed in the U.S, and will be manufactured and bottled in the U.S. When our project ends, we will have the product manufactured and shipped to a third-party bottling and fulfilment company, where it will be packaged and shipped out to our backers. We set a very safe goal, to deliver by March 2014, but we are aiming to ship out all of the perks in less than half of the 3 months we've allowed. As a rule, it's always best to under-promise and over-deliver. Once you've used the product in your everyday life, we'll send out a follow-up email for some feedback, which we hope you'll provide.

column2: >After months of experimenting with different solvents and concentrations, we developed a formula that doesn't affect the look or feel of the fabric, and is cost effective. Then we went to work developing a more expensive formula that achieved even better results. Since the cost of the stronger formula is high, we decided to offer both.

>For maximum strength SealDry, we double the concentration of the active ingredient, for a coating that provides even stronger liquid repellence than Original SealDry. This formulation costs more to produce so it's offered at a higher price. Everything in our videos was coated with Maximum Strength SealDry.

column1: When SealDry is sprayed onto fabric and dries, silica nano particles ranging from 2 to 200 nanometers are assembled together in clusters on the fibers of the fabric. To give that scale some perspective, a single human hair is about 60,000 nanometers in diameter.  To learn more about how incredibly small these particles are, check out this very neat tool that allows you to see the scale of everything: http://htwins.net/scale2/
<font><font>

The surface of the SealDry coating has a two-tier roughness— the first tier in the micrometer scale and the second tier in the nanometer scale. The first tier in the micrometer scale has a root mean square (RMS) roughness ranging from 0.2 to 5 micrometers corresponding to the size of the larger particles and the second tier in the nanometer scale with a RMS roughness ranging from 2 to 200 nm.

What that means is that particles clustered together on the fiber of the fabric create a rough surface on a very small scale. Because of the surface tension of liquid, the liquid can't lay flat on this rough surface, so it beads up, and rolls off, like a lotus leaf in nature.

column2: >We'll update this section as you ask new questions. Contact john@sealdry.co with any questions.
>What type of fabric can I use it on?
>Any type of fabric, natural, synthetic or a blend: cotton, polyester, silk, velvet, leather, canvas etc.
>Yes it is, SealDry is non-toxic and is safe to use on your clothes and around the house.

>No, SealDry makes fabric extremely repellent to liquids by creating a barrier around the fibres of the fabric, but on certain types of fabric, some liquid can still enter the spaces between the treated fibres, when applied with enough force. Because of that, SealDry is not a waterproof coating, but an extremely water repelling one.
>Could using it on my _______ damage it?
>SealDry dries clear and doesn't affect the feel of fabric, but always test SealDry first on a small inconspicuous area and let it dry.
>Does SealDry leave a white haze when dry?
>No! SealDry dries clear so you can't tell it's there unless you spill.
>In lab tests, we've had the coating last up to 50 wash and dry cycles. Durability in everyday life will depend on the fabric it's applied to and how it's used.

column1: Spray SealDry evenly onto your fabric until it's completely saturated (more is more) and allow it to air dry for a full 24 hours.
Always allow 24 hrs to dry to ensure the treatment will be effective.

Thank you for backing our project and supporting this amazing new technology! What will you SealDry?

column1: ","People are talking about SealDry:
http://www.examiner.com/article/sealdry-will-change-the-traveler-world

SealDry makes fabric repel liquid rather than absorb it, and it doesn't affect the look or feel of fabric it's applied to. We’ve all had a favourite shirt ruined by an accidental juice spill, or a permanently stained couch after an overzealous wine-and-30 Rock night. Most of our team lives in Vancouver, so we're used to getting soaked in the rain. Fabric is everywhere: our clothes, our homes, in the car, but as a material it has a flaw: it absorbs liquids.
SealDry is a spray-on superhydrophobic coating that uses nanotechnology to make fabric repel liquid rather than absorb it. When liquid comes into contact with fabric coated with
SealDry, it beads up and rolls right off the surface.
Watch our videos to see it in action. Any questions? Want to get on our mailing list? john@sealdry.co

We're trying to raise $5,000 so that we can place the first production run of SealDry. That's the amount we have to sell to achieve scale and begin our bulk production and bottling. We've used flexible funding because if we miss our goal, we'll produce our perks bottles in the lab individually, so either way, you'll get your bottle of SealDry!
These are just a few of the things that you can protect with SealDry. We love hearing from people with creative and innovative ways to use it.
Protect shirts, pants, dresses and delicate, hard-to-clean garments
Protect shoes and boots from spills, rain and puddles. Treat your purse or bag to protect the contents from rain.
Protect car seats and carpet or motorcycle riding gear.
Protect your chairs, couch cushions, throw pillows and outdoor patio furniture.
Protect your placemats, tablecloths, gardening gloves, bedding and mattresses.
Protect winter gloves and hats, backpacks, uniforms, tents and sleeping bags.
Protect your phone sleeve, laptop case, suitcase, overnight bag and toiletries.

As you can probably tell from the videos, this product has the potential to change the way you think about dozens of life's little problems. Caught in the rain? Spill coffee on your shirt at work? These are things that SealDry protects against.

We've gotten SealDry this far in the lab, but now we need your help to get the product manufactured and get feedback on it in everyday use. The product was developed in the U.S, and will be manufactured and bottled in the U.S. When our project ends, we will have the product manufactured and shipped to a third-party bottling and fulfilment company, where it will be packaged and shipped out to our backers. We set a very safe goal, to deliver by March 2014, but we are aiming to ship out all of the perks in less than half of the 3 months we've allowed. As a rule, it's always best to under-promise and over-deliver. Once you've used the product in your everyday life, we'll send out a follow-up email for some feedback, which we hope you'll provide.

After months of experimenting with different solvents and concentrations, we developed a formula that doesn't affect the look or feel of the fabric, and is cost effective. Then we went to work developing a more expensive formula that achieved even better results. Since the cost of the stronger formula is high, we decided to offer both.

For maximum strength SealDry, we double the concentration of the active ingredient, for a coating that provides even stronger liquid repellence than Original SealDry. This formulation costs more to produce so it's offered at a higher price. Everything in our videos was coated with Maximum Strength SealDry.
Testing Various Formulations

When SealDry is sprayed onto fabric and dries, silica nano particles ranging from 2 to 200 nanometers are assembled together in clusters on the fibers of the fabric. To give that scale some perspective, a single human hair is about 60,000 nanometers in diameter.  To learn more about how incredibly small these particles are, check out this very neat tool that allows you to see the scale of everything: http://htwins.net/scale2/

The surface of the SealDry coating has a two-tier roughness— the first tier in the micrometer scale and the second tier in the nanometer scale. The first tier in the micrometer scale has a root mean square (RMS) roughness ranging from 0.2 to 5 micrometers corresponding to the size of the larger particles and the second tier in the nanometer scale with a RMS roughness ranging from 2 to 200 nm.

What that means is that particles clustered together on the fiber of the fabric create a rough surface on a very small scale. Because of the surface tension of liquid, the liquid can't lay flat on this rough surface, so it beads up, and rolls off, like a lotus leaf in nature.
We'll update this section as you ask new questions. Contact john@sealdry.co with any questions.
What type of fabric can I use it on?
Any type of fabric, natural, synthetic or a blend: cotton, polyester, silk, velvet, leather, canvas etc.
Is it safe?
Yes it is, SealDry is non-toxic and is safe to use on your clothes and around the house.
Does it make fabric completely waterproof?

No, SealDry makes fabric extremely repellent to liquids by creating a barrier around the fibres of the fabric, but on certain types of fabric, some liquid can still enter the spaces between the treated fibres, when applied with enough force. Because of that, SealDry is not a waterproof coating, but an extremely water repelling one.
Could using it on my _______ damage it?
SealDry dries clear and doesn't affect the feel of fabric, but always test SealDry first on a small inconspicuous area and let it dry.
Does SealDry leave a white haze when dry?
No! SealDry dries clear so you can't tell it's there unless you spill.
How durable is the coating?
In lab tests, we've had the coating last up to 50 wash and dry cycles. Durability in everyday life will depend on the fabric it's applied to and how it's used.
Is SealDry patented?
Yes it is.
Spray SealDry evenly onto your fabric until it's completely saturated (more is more) and allow it to air dry for a full 24 hours.
Always allow 24 hrs to dry to ensure the treatment will be effective.
Thank you for backing our project and supporting this amazing new technology! What will you SealDry?",23.0,3,"1 Campaign

","iRejoy: The World's First and Only Powerbank
with Massager to recharge all your needs.

We are excited to introduce to the ladies a product that’s become a necessity in our daily life. These days, everything needs to be charged. Rather it’s our electronic devices or... well... Ourselves... Internally :)
Imagine if one product could do it all.
Well, everything that you imagined is real. We designed a product to aide in the constant use and short battery life of smartphones, tablets and all USB devices….
Then we designed a personal massaging feature unlike anything you have every felt.
iRejoy
The World's First and Only Powerbank with a built-in Massager to recharge all your needs in an Elegant, minimalist design.
A Powerbank has become an indispensable necessity with constant use of smartphones and tablets. We designed a portable, light, fast charging external battery for any of your USB devices.
Then we designed a wireless personal massaging feature. So much power packed in a small portable tube.
• Beautiful and ergonomic floral design
• Crafted with an Hypo-allergic, Anti -bacterial, non porous, odorless, soft touch silicone
• Best medical grade skin-like silicone
• 1 year warranty
iRejoy is a massager that’s portable and small enough to be carried inside a purse and practical enough not to keep locked up in your closet.
Because Stress happens anytime , anywhere . The iRejoy is simple to operate.
The massaging feature can be activated by pressing the power button twice consecutively. Each press after will switch between the 10 Massaging Modes.
Press and hold for 3 secs to turn off the device. Your electronics can be charged instantly once it’s plugged into the USB port with a press of the power button.
With Tension from being hunched over a computer at work melts away. Relax your tired muscles, release healing endorphins, and tap into your bodies natural ability to rejuvenate itself with massage.
Our unique product targeted at female promotes wellness, health and stress management through technology.

Bio of Designer

FAQ:
How
long it takes to fully charge the Powerbank Massager
It will take 2 to 2.5 hours to fully charge
the Powerbank Massager.
What
is the indication status of the LED light
The blue light would flash when charging and stay in blue when full
charge. It would show red light when battery is under 20% and would stop the
vibration and turn off automatically.
Do
we ship internationally and what are the shipping costs
All shipping in the US is free of charge. International
Shipping is $25. Shipment does not include extra customs duties and taxes
associated with your country.
How
to operate the Massager
Press the button once to
turn it on, press one more time to start the Massager. There are total 10
massaging modes and you can change it by pressing the button consecutively.
Press the button continuously for about 3 seconds to turn off.
What
can the Powerbank Massager Charge
Works with all iPhone/iPod/iPad/Samsung/HTC/Blackberry and
other Smartphones and tablets that need to be charged via USB.
How
to recharge your Powerbank massager
You can
connect the Powerbank massager to any USB AC Wall Charger or USB computer port
through the supplied MICRO USB cable.
NOTE: During the recharging of the Powerbank Massager, the
LED Power indicator will start flashing. When FULL, it will be remain blue.
When battery level is below 20%, LED will turn red and Massager function will
be disabled.
How
to use your Powerbank Massager as an USB Portable Charger
Use the included USB to micro cable or cable that is
provided by your smartphone or tablet manufacturer and connect it to the USB
port of the Powerbank massager. Your device will start charging after pressing the power button once. If you want to
stop charging, you can unplug your device from the Powerbank Massager.
Still
have questions?
No worries. Email us at sales@irejoy.com We will be more than happy to assist you.

Short Summary

Beddie intends to simplify the process of buying bed and bath linen products for individual interest in personalized bedding and bath linen. The idea is to provide premium quality, fashionable, easy-access welcome packs at your doorstep with a click of a button.

This is made possible by the partners' network of production facilities and transportation links from the Middle east and Southeast Asia.  We intend to receive our textiles from reputable companies that have an already outstanding portfolio consisting of large hotel chains and retailers around the world.
Your contribution will help us kick start Beddie in order to initiate delivery of great customizable products made to your taste and essential to your needs.
The Impact
We are not only here to start a new business but to also have an impact on the society. Our aim is to be a socially responsible company.

With the help of your contributions, we intend to donate bed sheets,duvets,blankets and pillows to orphanages, hospitals and disaster stricken societies in southeast Asia.

Risks &
We have identified to main risks and challenges:
- Gaining popularity among emerging communities within the London metropolitan area.
<div>- Competition from local outlets. e.g.: Primark, Marks&amp
We plan to market ourselves starting at City University London (Where Beddie was born!)

Social Media: We aim to make the most out of social media by providing our customers' with the tools necessary to customise their own products. We will do this by directly engaging with potential customers through design competitions. These competitions will have exciting prizes in the form of giveaways and discounts.
We take pride in labeling our products as easily accessible. With a few clicks of a button, customers would go online, design, order, have it delivered.

We provide our customers with the tools necessary to design and customise their products, because of this, we do not collaborate with any reputable designer.  

Other Ways You Can Help

help us gain popularity and word of mouth by sharing our Facebook page : https://www.facebook.com/Beddie-671321766341755/?fref=ts
and instagram page: beddielondon
Website: www.beddie.net
